atk-abh03a:16_1: Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīnañhi vasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:16_12: ayaṃ cuddasahi padehi nikkhittā nayamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:16_13: Ayañhi iminā saṅgahādikena nayena dhātukathā dhammā vibhattāti dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:16_14: Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattā mūlamātikātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:18_2: manasikāroti ayaṃ pañcavīsādhikena padasatena nikkhittā abbhantaramātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:18_3: Ayañhi “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti evaṃ avatvā saṅgahādinā nayena vibhajitabbe khandhādidhamme
atk-abh03a:18_4: sarūpato dassetvā dhātukathāya abbhantareyeva ṭhapitattā abbhantaramātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:18_5: Khandhādipadānaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīmātikāya asaṅgahitattā pakiṇṇakamātikātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:20_4: catūhi vippayogoti ayaṃ catūhi padehi nikkhittā nayamukhamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:20_5: Ayañhi sabbesupi pañcakkhandhādīsu ceva kusalattikādīsu ca mātikādhammesu,
atk-abh03a:20_6: tīhi khandhāyatanadhātupadeheva saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca yojetabbo.
atk-abh03a:20_7: Tathā catūhi arūpakkhandhehi sampayogo ca vippayogo ca.
atk-abh03a:20_8: Etāni imesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṃ nayānaṃ mukhānīti dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamukhamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:22_1: visabhāgoti ayaṃ dvīhi padehi nikkhittā lakkhaṇamātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:22_4: tathā sampayogavippayoganayo yojetabboti sabhāgavisabhāgalakkhaṇavasena saṅgahādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā lakkhaṇamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:24_1: Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikāti ayaṃ chasaṭṭhi tikapadāni,
atk-abh03a:24_2: dve ca dukapadasatāni saṅkhipitvā nikkhittā bāhiramātikā nāma.
atk-abh03a:24_4: manasikāro”ti evaṃ dhātukathāya abbhantare avatvā “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī”ti evaṃ dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattā bāhiramātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:25_0: Evaṃ mātikāya pañcadhā ṭhitabhāvaṃ viditvā idāni ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīsu saṅgaho tāva jātisañjātikiriyāgaṇanavasena catubbidho. Tattha –
atk-abh03a:25_9: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:25_10: “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi jātiyā ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:25_18: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:25_19: “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā saṃvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi sañjātiṭhānena nivutthokāsena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:25_26: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma.
atk-abh03a:25_27: Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā.
atk-abh03a:30_1: Idāni pañcakkhandhādivasena nikkhittamātikaṃ ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīhi nayamātikāpadehi saddhiṃ yojetvā
atk-abh03a:30_2: dassetuṃ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:30_5: tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:30_7: Yasmā ca “sabhāgo visabhāgo”ti evaṃ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā,
atk-abh03a:30_8: tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:30_11: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:30_14: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti,
atk-abh03a:30_17: Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:31_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a:31_1: Vissajjane panassa yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā,
atk-abh03a:31_7: “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī”tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā,
atk-abh03a:31_15: “pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehī”ti evaṃ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni.
atk-abh03a:33_1: Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ ekena khandhenāti ekena rūpakkhandheneva,
atk-abh03a:33_2: ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:33_4: Asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:33_9: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṃ na saṅgayhati.
atk-abh03a:33_16: Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṃ dassetvā “dvādasāyatanānī”ti abhedatova pucchāvissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:34_3: Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṃ,
atk-abh03a:37_2: “avijjā katihi khandhehī”ti pucchaṃ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhenāti evaṃ vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:37_3: Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:37_7: Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito.
atk-abh03a:37_9: Aññeneva hi ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito,
atk-abh03a:37_13: Tattha kammabhavo phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṃ ekato dassito.
atk-abh03a:37_15: Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā “ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:38_8: Ekatalavāsikānañhi sesabrahmānaṃ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-abh03a:40_6: Cittaṃ pana cetanānantaraṃ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:40_7: Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:40_9: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṃ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:42_1: Evaṃ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:42_3: Sattahi dhātūhīti cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇadhātūhi ceva manodhātudhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi ca.
atk-abh03a:42_4: Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṃ tāhiyeva.
atk-abh03a:42_5: Vipākadhammadhammā pana saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikehi saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā.
atk-abh03a:42_7: evaṃ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yena yena padena saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:42_8: taṃ taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṃ gahetvā vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:45_1: Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:45_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:45_4: khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṃ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:45_5: tassa khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:45_8: So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:45_11: Evaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:45_12: Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṃ arūpena asammissaṃ,
atk-abh03a:50_2: Pañhavasena hi imasmiṃ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā eko pañho kato,
atk-abh03a:50_9: sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:50_13: aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:51_2: Tasmiṃ saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:51_9: tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:52_2: yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena asaṅgahito nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:52_4: Ettha pana catūhi khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi.
atk-abh03a:52_6: Dvādasahi dhātūhīti yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi.
atk-abh03a:53_3: Itthindriyapurisindriyesu pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṃ dve āyatanāni,

atk-abh03a:54_4: Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni teheva ca dvīhi,
atk-abh03a:54_5: manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:54_6: Navahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātudhammadhātūhi saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:55_4: Dhātuyopi tesaṃyeva ekekena saddhiṃ satta viññāṇadhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:56_4: Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a:56_8: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava dhātuyo saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:56_10: Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni dve āyatanāni,
atk-abh03a:56_15: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:57_3: Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:61_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi saṅgahitaṃ,

atk-abh03a:66_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.

atk-abh03a:68_2: Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.

atk-abh03a:71_3: Tasmā taṃ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṃ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.

atk-abh03a:207_6: Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakehi
atk-abh03a:207_8: Tattha ariye vimokkheti kilesehi ārakattā ariyeti saṅkhaṃ gate lokuttaravimokkhe.
atk-abh03a:207_10: bāhirānañhi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjantassa samayopi atthi asamayopi.
atk-abh03a:207_11: Maggavimokkhena vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi.
atk-abh03a:207_14: tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa maggaphalapaṭivedho nāma na hotīti natthi.
atk-abh03a:207_15: Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-abh03a:207_18: Bhajāpiyamāno pana samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena samayavimuttabhāvaṃ bhajeyya.
atk-abh03a:208_5: Tena saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā rūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho.
atk-abh03a:208_8: Arūpena sahagatānaṃ tena saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā arūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho.
atk-abh03a:208_9: Na nikāmalābhīti pañcahākārehi aciṇṇavasitāya icchitākārena aladdhattā na nikāmalābhī.
atk-abh03a:208_12: Yo āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento upacāraṃ pāpento appanaṃ pāpento cittamañjūsaṃ labhanto dukkhena kicchena
atk-abh03a:208_13: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto taṃ sampadaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:208_16: Samāpattiṃ appetvā addhānaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:208_17: Ekaṃ dve cittavāre vattetvā sahasāva vuṭṭhātīti attho.
atk-abh03a:209_0: Yatthicchakanti yasmiṃ okāse samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati.
atk-abh03a:209_1: Yadicchakanti kasiṇajjhānaṃ vā ānāpānajjhānaṃ vā brahmavihārajjhānaṃ vā asubhajjhānaṃ vāti yaṃ yaṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati.
atk-abh03a:209_4: yattha yattha yaṃ yaṃ samāpattiṃ yattakaṃ addhānaṃ samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi icchati,
atk-abh03a:209_5: tattha tattha taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ tattakaṃ addhānaṃ samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:209_6: Candaṃ vā sūriyaṃ vā ulloketvā ‘imasmiṃ cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti paricchinditvā
atk-abh03a:209_7: jhānaṃ samāpanno yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:210_1: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃvidho puggalo kuppadhammoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:210_2: Idaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino puthujjanassa sotāpannassa sakadāgāminoti tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:210_3: Etesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā na suvikkhambhitā,
atk-abh03a:210_8: Na garukamokkhadhammo panesa appamattakenapi kiccakaraṇīyena vā vattabhedamattakena vā nassati.
atk-abh03a:211_2: Tasmiṃ piṇḍāya gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe dārakā pariveṇe kīḷitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:211_3: Thero āgantvā ‘pariveṇaṃ sammajjitabba’nti cintetvā asammajjitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘samāpattiṃ appessāmī’ti nisīdi.
atk-abh03a:211_5: ‘kiṃ nu kho āvaraṇa’nti sīlaṃ āvajjanto appamattakampi vītikkamaṃ adisvā ‘vattabhedo nu kho atthī’ti
atk-abh03a:211_6: olokento pariveṇassa asammaṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā sammajjitvā pavisitvā nisīdanto samāpattiṃ appentova nisīdi.
atk-abh03a:212_2: Akuppadhammoti idaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino anāgāmissa ceva khīṇāsavassa cāti dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:212_3: Tesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā suvikkhambhitā suvikkhālitā;
atk-abh03a:212_4: tena tesaṃ bhassasaṅgaṇikārāmādikiccena vā aññena vā yena kenaci attano anurūpena pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppati,
atk-abh03a:212_6: Sukkhavipassakā pana sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmikhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ duke na labbhanti;
atk-abh03a:212_8: Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā imasmimpi duke saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:212_11: lokuttaradhammassa pana sakiṃ paṭividdhassa kuppanaṃ nassanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:213_2: Kevalañhi idha puggalassa pamādaṃ paṭicca dhammānaṃ parihānampi aparihānampi gahitanti idaṃ pariyāyadesanāmattameva nānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:215_3: Sace anurakkhatīti sace anupakāradhamme pahāya upakāradhamme sevanto samāpajjati.
atk-abh03a:216_0: Ime dvepi samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ paṭibalā.
atk-abh03a:216_2: Cetanābhabbo hi upakārānupakāre dhamme na jānāti.
atk-abh03a:216_9: So te sevanto samāpattito na parihāyati.
atk-abh03a:217_0: Yathā hi dve khettapālā eko paṇḍurogena sarogo akkhamo sītādīnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:217_4: Tassa divā sukamorādayo khettaṃ otaritvā sālisīsaṃ khādanti,
atk-abh03a:217_5: rattiṃ migasūkarādayo pavisitvā khalaṃ tacchi taṃ viya chetvā gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:217_6: So attano pamattakāraṇā puna bījamattampi na labhati.
atk-abh03a:217_8: So attano appamattakāraṇā ekakarīsato cattāripi aṭṭhapi sakaṭāni labhati.
atk-abh03a:218_2: Sarogassa attano pamādena puna bījamattassapi alabhanaṃ viya cetanābhabbassa upakārānupakāre dhamme ajānitvā
atk-abh03a:218_3: upakāre pahāya anupakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā parihānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:218_4: Itarassa attano appamādena ekakarīsamattato catuaṭṭhasakaṭauddharaṇaṃ viya anurakkhaṇābhabbassa upakārānupakāre
atk-abh03a:218_5: dhamme jānitvā anupakāre pahāya upakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā aparihānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:218_6: Evaṃ cetanābhabbato anurakkhaṇābhabbova samāpattiṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ balavataroti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:219_3: Etāni hi phalakkhaṇe pahīnāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:219_4: Ayaṃ pana phalakkhaṇepi na hotīti dasseti.
atk-abh03a:219_6: Maggakkhaṇasmiñhi tesaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:219_8: Ettāvatā vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno thūlabālaputhujjanova idha kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:220_2: yesaṃ dhammānanti yesaṃ gotrabhuñāṇena saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:220_4: Avakkanti hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti.
atk-abh03a:220_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ nibbānārammaṇena ñāṇena sabbaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ puthujjanamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-abh03a:220_6: puthujjanapaññattiṃ atikkamitvā ariyasaṅkhaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyamaṇḍalaṃ ariyapaññattiṃ okkamanato gotrabhūpuggalo
atk-abh03a:221_3: Sattapi sekkhā puthujjanā ca bhāyitvā pāpato oramanti pāpaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh03a:221_12: tesu dukkhaṃ anubhavanto kathaṃ bhavissasī’ti duggatibhayaṃ bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:221_16: Tānipi bhāyitvā puthujjano pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:221_17: Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana tayo sekkhā duggatiṃ atītattā sesāni tīṇi bhayāni bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karonti.
atk-abh03a:221_18: Maggaṭṭhakasekkhā āgamanavasena vā asamucchinnabhayattā vā bhayūparatā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:221_19: Khīṇāsavo imesu catūsu bhayesu ekampi na bhāyati.
atk-abh03a:221_22: Kiṃ pana so upavādampi na bhāyatīti?
atk-abh03a:222_9: Tesu hi manussā acchandikabhāvaṃ paviṭṭhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:222_14: Okkamitunti etaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattasaṅkhātaṃ niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ pavisituṃ tattha patiṭṭhātuṃ abhabbā.
atk-abh03a:223_2: Evamimasmiṃ duke ye ca puggalā pañcānantariyakā,
atk-abh03a:224_4: Sabbepi hete nirayassa atthāya niyatattā niyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:224_5: Aṭṭha pana ariyapuggalā sammābhāvāya uparūparimaggaphalatthāya ceva anupādāparinibbānatthāya ca niyatattā niyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:224_7: Yathā ākāse khittadaṇḍo pathaviyaṃ patanto ‘aggena vā majjhena vā mūlena vā patissatī’ti na ñāyati;
atk-abh03a:224_8: evameva ‘asukagatiyā nāma nibbattissantī’ti niyamābhāvā aniyatā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:225_3: Te hi phalatthāya paṭipannattā paṭipannakā nāma.
atk-abh03a:225_5: Phalapaṭilābhato paṭṭhāya hi te phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpannāpi phale ṭhitāyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:226_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:226_10: Tattha yo caṅkamantova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti padumatthero viya;
atk-abh03a:226_11: ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero viya;
atk-abh03a:226_12: nisinnova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a:226_13: nipannova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti –
atk-abh03a:227_0: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāti –
atk-abh03a:228_17: Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:228_18: Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:228_21: Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:229_6: arahattamagge cattārīti ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati.
atk-abh03a:229_7: Imāya vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānaṃ samaṃ hoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:230_6: Neva tāvāti yāva esa maggasamaṅgī puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ na sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a:230_9: Kappavināso hi nāma mahāvikāro mahāpayogo koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷassa jhāyanavasena mahālokavināso.
atk-abh03a:230_10: Ayampi evaṃ mahāvināso tiṭṭheyya vāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:230_11: Sāsane pana dharamāne ayaṃ kappavināso nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:230_13: Gatakoṭike hi kāle kappavināso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:230_14: Evaṃ santepi satthā antarāyābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āhari –
atk-abh03a:230_16: maggasamaṅgino pana phalassa antarāyo na sakkā kātu”nti.
atk-abh03a:230_17: Ayaṃ pana puggalo kappaṃ ṭhapento kittakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyyāti?
atk-abh03a:230_25: Imaṃ panatthaṃ bāhirāya āgantukūpamāyapi evaṃ dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:230_26: Sace hi sotāpattimaggasamaṅgissa matthakūpari yojanikaṃ ekagghanaselaṃ tivaṭṭāya rajjuyā bandhitvā olambeyya,
atk-abh03a:230_29: tasmimpi chinne abbhakūṭaṃ viya ākāse tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a:230_30: na tveva tassa puggalassa maggānantaraphalassa antarāyaṃ kareyyāti.
atk-abh03a:230_33: Na kevalaṃ pana sotāpattimaggaṭṭhova kappaṃ ṭhapeti,
atk-abh03a:230_35: Tena bhagavā heṭṭhā gahitañca aggahitañca sabbaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakapuggalehi imaṃ tantiṃ āropesi –
atk-abh03a:232_5: Arahatā pana arahattaphalakkhaṇe tisso sikkhā sikkhitā.
atk-abh03a:232_8: Khīṇāsavā aññassa santike sīlādīnaṃ sikkhitattā sikkhitaasekkhā nāma.
atk-abh03a:232_10: Sesapuggalā neva sikkhanti na sikkhitāti nevasekkhānāsekkhā.
atk-abh03a:233_2: paṭhamaṃ pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇāni nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ pattopi,
atk-abh03a:233_3: paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇanibbattakopi tevijjoyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:233_4: Suttantakathā pana pariyāyadesanā abhidhammakathā nippariyāyadesanāti imasmiṃ ṭhāne āgamanīyameva dhuraṃ.
atk-abh03a:233_5: Tasmā paṭhamaṃ dve vijjā nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ pattova idha adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:234_2: pubbe ananussutesūti pacchimabhave saccappaṭivedhato pubbe aññassa kassaci santike assutapubbesu.
atk-abh03a:234_3: Tato purimapurimesu pana bhavesu sabbaññubodhisattā buddhasāsane pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ
atk-abh03a:234_4: āruyha kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ āhacca ṭhapenti.
atk-abh03a:234_6: Tadā hi tathāgato pūritapāramittā aññassa santike sāmaṃ ananussutesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammesu “idaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:234_7: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti attapaccakkhena ñāṇena cattāri saccāni abhisambujjhati.
atk-abh03a:235_1: Sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvanti sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:235_2: Buddhānañhi sabbaññutaññāṇassa ceva dasabalañāṇassa ca adhigamanato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kātabbaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:235_3: Yathā pana ubhatosujātassa khattiyakumārassa abhisekappattito paṭṭhāya ‘idaṃ nāma issariyaṃ anāgata’nti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:235_5: Evameva buddhānaṃ arahattamaggassa āgamanato paṭṭhāya ‘ayaṃ nāma guṇo na āgato,
atk-abh03a:235_8: sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā āgatā paṭividdhā paccakkhakatāva honti.
atk-abh03a:235_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃ pāramīpūraṇasiddhānubhāvena ariyamaggena paṭividdhasabbaññuguṇo puggalo sammāsambuddhoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:236_2: pubbe ananussutesūti pade pubbe vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:236_3: Paccekabuddhopi hi pacchimabhave anācariyako attukkaṃsikañāṇeneva paṭividdhasacco sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:237_2: aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:237_4: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā khīṇā honti.
atk-abh03a:237_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:237_6: Ayañhi dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
atk-abh03a:237_10: maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttoti ubhatobhāgehi dve vāre vimutto”ti.
atk-abh03a:242_0: Vatvā suttaṃ āharitvā “nāmakāyato ca rūpakāyato ca suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti āha.
atk-abh03a:242_2: “samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimutto maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti.
atk-abh03a:242_4: ‘tiṇṇampi vāde kāraṇaṃ dissatī’ti tiṇṇampi vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:243_1: maggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto.
atk-abh03a:243_2: So catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:243_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattassa anāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:243_4: Tattha purimā cattāro samāpattisīsaṃ nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a:243_5: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.
atk-abh03a:243_6: Nanu ca arūpāvacarajjhānampi upekkhācittekaggatāhi duvaṅgikaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi,
atk-abh03a:243_7: tasmā tampi padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pattena ubhatobhāgavimuttena bhavitabbanti?
atk-abh03a:243_12: tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti.
atk-abh03a:243_13: Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttaṃ rūpakāyato cāti tadeva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:244_3: So sukkhavipassako catūhi jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:244_4: Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī na hoti.
atk-abh03a:244_5: Teneva na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:244_6: Arūpāvacarajjhānesu pana ekasmiṃ sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hotīti.
atk-abh03a:245_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo kāyasakkhīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:245_7: So sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:246_6: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhe ‘dukkhasacca’nti yāthāvasarasato pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:246_11: Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti vūpasammanti appavattiṃ gacchanti;
atk-abh03a:246_15: tena taṃ ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:246_18: Tattha tathāgatappaveditāti mahābodhimaṇḍe nisīdatvā tathāgatena paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭīkatā.
atk-abh03a:246_22: Tesu anena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:246_23: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo diṭṭhippattoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:246_27: Diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sacchikataṃ passitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhappatto.
atk-abh03a:247_2: no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassāti yathā diṭṭhippattassa āsavā parikkhīṇā,
atk-abh03a:247_4: Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi.
atk-abh03a:247_5: Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti?
atk-abh03a:247_7: Diṭṭhippato hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:247_8: Saddhāvimutto pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:247_11: Diṭṭhippattassa hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati.
atk-abh03a:247_12: Saddhāvimuttassa vipassanāñāṇaṃ no tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
atk-abh03a:248_0: Yathā hi dvīsu taruṇesu sippaṃ dassentesu ekassa hatthe tikhiṇo asi,
atk-abh03a:248_2: Tikhiṇena asinā kadalī chijjamānā saddaṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:248_4: Tattha tikhiṇena asinā saddaṃ akarontiyā eva kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya diṭṭhippattassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa tikhiṇasūravippasannabhāvo.
atk-abh03a:248_5: Kuṇṭhena asinā saddaṃ karontiyāpi kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya saddhāvimuttassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa atikhiṇaasūraappasannabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:248_7: āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:249_1: “etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:249_2: Diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati.
atk-abh03a:249_3: Tasmā yathā nāma atikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:249_8: Yathā pana sunisiteneva asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:249_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhāvimuttoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:250_5: Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:250_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo dhammānusārīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:250_8: So hi paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
atk-abh03a:250_10: Phale pana patte diṭṭhippatto nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:251_3: Saddhā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti saddhāvāhītipi vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:251_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhānusārīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:251_9: Phale pana patte saddhāvimutto nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:251_18: Eko ca matthakaṃ pāpuṇanto ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti,
atk-abh03a:251_22: sabbe te ime dve dhamme dhuraṃ katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi ṭhānehi vimuccanti.
atk-abh03a:251_23: Tesu yo bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samathavasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ
atk-abh03a:251_24: padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:251_26: Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma.
atk-abh03a:252_0: Aparo paññameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:252_2: Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma.
atk-abh03a:252_6: Aparo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhivasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:252_12: Tena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti.
atk-abh03a:252_13: Aparo saddhameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:252_18: Tena saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti.
atk-abh03a:252_19: Ime satta puggalā loke aggadakkhiṇeyyā nāmāti.
atk-abh03a:253_4: tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
atk-abh03a:254_14: iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno,
atk-abh03a:254_15: svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vā”ti.
atk-abh03a:255_1: Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnanti phalakkhaṇe sotāpanno adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:256_4: Upari tīhi maggehi avassaṃ bujjhissatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-abh03a:256_5: Deve ca manusse cāti devalokañca manussalokañca.
atk-abh03a:256_7: Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ parivaṭumaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:256_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo sattakkhattuparamo nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:256_9: Ayaṃ pana kālena devalokassa kālena manussalokassa vasena missakabhavena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:257_3: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato hi paṭṭhāya nīce kule upapatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:257_5: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave.
atk-abh03a:257_9: Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi pana kolaṃkolova hoti.
atk-abh03a:258_3: Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:258_9: Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:258_11: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:259_0: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
atk-abh03a:259_5: Tattha ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vāde ‘paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:259_6: upari tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannā’ti vacanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:259_7: ‘Paṭhamamaggo niyametī’ti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:259_8: ‘Upari tayo maggā niyamentī’ti vāde ‘aṭṭhamamagge anuppanneyeva upari tayo maggā uppannā’ti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:259_9: ‘Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyametī’ti vādo pana yujjati.
atk-abh03a:259_10: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-abh03a:260_8: nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-abh03a:260_11: yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:260_12: yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh03a:260_14: Missakabhavavaseneva panettha sattakkhattuparamakolaṃkolā mānusakabhavanibbattakoyeva ca ekabījī gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:260_20: ‘ahaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ nibbattessāmī’ti evaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sattakkhattuparamādibhāvaṃ pattāpi
atk-abh03a:260_21: paṭipadāvasena dvādasevāti ime catuvīsati sotāpannā ihaṭṭhakanijjhānikavaseneva imasmiṃ ṭhāne kathitāti
atk-abh03a:261_4: Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
atk-abh03a:261_5: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:261_10: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:261_12: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ lokuttarakusalaniddese vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:261_13: Imassa pana sakadāgāmino ekabījinā saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti?
atk-abh03a:262_3: Yassa imāni pañca bandhanāni appahīnāni honti,
atk-abh03a:262_4: so bhavagge nibbattopi gilitabaḷiso maccho viya dīghasuttakena pāde baddhakāko viya tehi bandhanehi ākaḍḍhiyamāno
atk-abh03a:262_5: kāmadhātuyaṃyeva pavattatīti pañca bandhanāni orambhāgiyānīti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:262_11: Anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha anāvattanasabhāvo.
atk-abh03a:262_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃvidho puggalo paṭisandhivasena puna anāgamanato anāgāmī nāma vuccati.
atk-abh03a:263_2: upapannaṃ vā samanantarāti upapannasamanantarā vā hutvā.
atk-abh03a:263_3: Appattaṃ vā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ appattaṃ vā hutvā ariyamaggaṃ sañjanetīti attho.
atk-abh03a:263_4: Vāsaddavikappato pana vemajjhaṃ pattantipi attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:263_6: Upariṭṭhimānaṃ saṃyojanānanti upari pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ vā kilesānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:263_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo āyuvemajjhassa antarāyeva parinibbāyanato antarāparinibbāyīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:264_2: atikkamitvā vemajjhaṃ āyuppamāṇanti āyuppamāṇaṃ vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā.
atk-abh03a:264_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo avihesu tāva kappasahassappamāṇassa āyuno pañcakappasatasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh03a:264_6: vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā chaṭṭhe vā kappasate sattamaṭṭhamanavamānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ dasameyeva vā kappasate
atk-abh03a:264_7: ṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato upahaccaparinibbāyīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:265_2: asaṅkhārena appadukkhena adhimattapayogaṃ akatvāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbānadhammoti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
atk-abh03a:265_3: Sasaṅkhārena dukkhena kasirena adhimattapayogaṃ katvāva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanadhammoti sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī.
atk-abh03a:266_2: uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti uddhaṃsoto.
atk-abh03a:266_3: Uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto.
atk-abh03a:266_5: Avihā cuto atappaṃ gacchatītiādīsu avihe kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:266_6: Tatrāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:266_7: Tatrāpi cattāri kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:266_8: Tatrāpi aṭṭha kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:267_0: Imesaṃ pana anāgāmīnaṃ pabhedajānanatthaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīcatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:267_1: Tattha yo avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-abh03a:267_2: Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:267_5: Yo pana ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:267_8: Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāyati,
atk-abh03a:269_1: divasaṃ santattānampi hi ārakaṇṭakavipphalikanakhacchedanānaṃ ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā uppajjitvāva nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_4: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_7: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā nivattamānā pathaviyaṃ anupahaccatalā hutvā parinibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_10: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā ākāsaṃ ullaṅghitvā pathaviyaṃ patitvā upahaccatalā hutvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_13: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā paritte tiṇakaṭṭhe patitvā taṃ parittaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ jhāpetvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_16: Tato mahantatare ayomukhe haññamāne papaṭikā vipule tiṇakaṭṭhapuñje patitvā taṃ vipulaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapuñjaṃ jhāpetvā nibbāyati –
atk-abh03a:269_20: tattha mahantesu tiṇakaṭṭhapuñjesu jhāyamānesu vītaccitaṅgāro vā jālā vā uppatitvā kammārasālaṃ jhāpetvā
atk-abh03a:269_24: Yasmā pana ārakaṇṭakādibhedaṃ khuddakampi mahantampi ayokapālameva,
atk-abh03a:269_25: tasmā sutte sabbavāresu ayokapālantveva vuttaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-abh03a:270_12: Tañca khvassa padaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:270_13: Tassa na sabbena sabbaṃ mānānusayo pahīno hoti,
atk-abh03a:270_14: na sabbena sabbaṃ bhavarāgānusayo pahīno hoti,
atk-abh03a:270_15: na sabbena sabbaṃ avijjānusayo pahīno hoti.
atk-abh03a:270_16: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti.
atk-abh03a:270_19: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:271_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:272_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā anupahacca talaṃ nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:273_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā upahacca talaṃ nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:274_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā paritte tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:274_10: aggimpi janetvā dhūmampi janetvā tameva parittaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:275_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā vipule tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:275_9: tameva vipulaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:276_7: divasaṃ santatte ayokapāle haññamāne papaṭikā nibbattitvā uppatitvā mahante tiṇapuñje vā kaṭṭhapuñje vā nipateyya,
atk-abh03a:276_9: tameva mahantaṃ tiṇapuñjaṃ vā kaṭṭhapuñjaṃ vā pariyādiyitvā gacchampi daheyya,
atk-abh03a:276_11: gacchampi dahitvā dāyampi dahitvā haritantaṃ vā pathantaṃ vā selantaṃ vā udakantaṃ vā ramaṇīyaṃ vā bhūmibhāgaṃ āgamma anāhārā nibbāyeyya;
atk-abh03a:277_2: Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo arahāti ettha pana dvādasa arahanto veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh03a:277_5: Tattha suññatavimokkhena vimuttakhīṇāsavo paṭipadāvasena catubbidho hoti;
atk-abh03a:277_8: Iti ime dvādasa arahanto viya dvādaseva sakadāgāmino,
atk-abh03a:277_10: aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāminoti ettakā puggalā ito muccitvā bahiddhā nuppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:280_2: Evaṃ puggalaṃ pucchitvāpi dhammena puggalaṃ dassetuṃ tattha katamo kodhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:280_6: Ayaṃ kodho appahīnoti ayaṃ ettako kodho vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.
atk-abh03a:281_2: iminā ahirikenāti iminā evaṃpakārena ahirikadhammena samannāgato.
atk-abh03a:282_4: Vacchakasālāya hi anto baddho antoyeva sayitavacchako viya idhaṭṭhakasotāpannasakadāgāmino.
atk-abh03a:282_7: Anto baddho pana bahi sayitavacchako viya rūpārūpabhave sotāpannasakadāgāmino.
atk-abh03a:282_10: Bahi baddho bahi sayitavacchako viya rūpārūpabhave anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:282_13: Bahi baddho pana antosayitavacchako viya idhaṭṭhakaanāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:284_8: Puttadhītaro pana mātāpitaro paṭijaggantā abhivādanādīni tesaṃ kurumānā katavedino nāma.

atk-abh03a:298_2: Yasmiṃ patiṭṭhitena sakkā bhaveyya arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,

atk-abh03a:299_5: rajjābhisekānaṃ dvinnaṃ setacchattānaṃ abhāvā na evaṃ hoti –

atk-abh03a:313_12: Dve dve vā kariyamāne sīlasamādhayo ādi,

atk-abh03a:315_3: Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:315_5: Udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggahaṇakālo.

atk-abh03a:315_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo puthupaññoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:316_6: Yathā hi cheko vaḍḍhakī dabbasambhāratthaṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭho na ādito paṭṭhāya sampattasampattarukkhe chindati,
atk-abh03a:316_10: puthujjanā pana adabbatāya na gahitāti veditabbā.

atk-abh03a:318_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo pathaviyaṃ lekhā viya kujjhanabhāvena aciraṭṭhitikato pathavīlekhūpamoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:319_9: Sandhiyatīti ṭhānagamanādīsu kāyakiriyādīsu kāyena samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:319_11: Sammodatīti uddesaparipucchādīsu vacīkiriyāsu vācāya samodhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:319_12: Vippavāsagatopi piyasahāyako viya piyatarabhāvaṃ upetīti attho. Apica –
atk-abh03a:319_13: kiccakaraṇīyesu tehi saddhiṃ āditova ekakiriyabhāvaṃ upagacchanto saṃsandati.
atk-abh03a:319_16: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo udakalekhā viya khippaṃ saṃsandanato udakalekhūpamoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:320_3: taṃ tāva upamaṃ dassetuṃ tayo potthakātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:320_10: So hi navabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā jiṇṇabhāvaṃ appatto majjhe paribhogakālepi dubbaṇṇo ca dukkhasamphasso ca appagghoyeva ca hoti.
atk-abh03a:320_12: Jiṇṇakāle pana aḍḍhamāsakaṃ vā kākaṇikaṃ vā agghati.
atk-abh03a:321_0: Navoti upasampadāya pañcavassakālato heṭṭhā jātiyā saṭṭhivassopi navoyeva.
atk-abh03a:321_2: Dussīlassa hi parisamajjhe nisinnassa nittejatāya sarīravaṇṇopi na sampajjati,
atk-abh03a:321_4: Ye kho panassāti ye kho pana tassa upaṭṭhākā vā ñātimittādayo vā etaṃ puggalaṃ sevanti.
atk-abh03a:321_5: Tesaṃ tanti tesaṃ puggalānaṃ cha satthāre sevantānaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ viya,
atk-abh03a:321_6: devadattaṃ sevantānaṃ kokālikādīnaṃ viya ca taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
atk-abh03a:321_7: Majjhimoti pañcavassakālato paṭṭhāya yāva navavassakālā majjhimo nāma.
atk-abh03a:321_10: Kiṃ nu kho tuyhanti tuyhaṃ bālassa bhaṇitena ko atthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:322_2: kāsikavatthaṃ nāma tayo kappāsaṃsū gahetvā kantitasuttena vāyitaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ.
atk-abh03a:322_5: Jiṇṇakāle pana aṭṭhapi dasapi sahassāni agghati.
atk-abh03a:323_0: Tesaṃ taṃ hotīti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhādayo sevantānaṃ viya taṃ sevanaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hoti.
atk-abh03a:323_1: Sammāsambuddhañhi ekaṃ nissāya yāvajjakālā muccanakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:323_2: Tathā sāriputtattheramahāmoggallānatthere avasese ca asītimahāsāvake nissāya saggaṃ gatasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:323_3: Yāvajjakālā tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ paṭipannasattānampi pamāṇaṃ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a:323_4: Ādheyyaṃ gacchatīti tassa mahātherassa taṃ atthanissitaṃ vacanaṃ yathā gandhakaraṇḍake kāsikavatthaṃ ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbataṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:323_5: evaṃ uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ hadaye ca ādhātabbataṃ ṭhapetabbatampi gacchati.
atk-abh03a:324_14: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘suppameyyo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:324_15: Yathā hi parittassa udakassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati;
atk-abh03a:324_16: evameva imehi aguṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa sukhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati.
atk-abh03a:325_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ‘duppameyyo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:325_4: Yathā hi mahāsamuddassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati;
atk-abh03a:325_5: evameva imehi guṇaṅgehi samannāgatassa dukkhena pamāṇaṃ gayhati.
atk-abh03a:326_2: Yathā hi ākāsassa na sakkā pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ,
atk-abh03a:327_4: Na payirupāsitabboti na santike nisīdanavasena punappunaṃ upāsitabbo.
atk-abh03a:327_5: Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:327_7: so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo.
atk-abh03a:327_10: Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
atk-abh03a:327_11: Attano atthāya eva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo.
atk-abh03a:328_2: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:328_3: Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati.
atk-abh03a:328_4: Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati.
atk-abh03a:328_5: Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattinī bhavissati,
atk-abh03a:328_7: Dvīsu hi sīlavantesu ekena sīlassa vaṇṇe kathite itaro anumodati;
atk-abh03a:328_8: tena tesaṃ kathā phāsu ceva hoti,
atk-abh03a:328_10: Ekasmiṃ pana dussīle sati dussīlassa sīlakathā dukkathāti neva sīlakathā hoti,
atk-abh03a:328_16: rattiṃ vā divasaṃ vā atikkantampi na jānanti.
atk-abh03a:329_1: Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca karitvā.
atk-abh03a:329_4: Paripūressāmīti taṃ atirekasīlaṃ puggalaṃ nissāya attano aparipūraṃ sīlarāsiṃ paripūraṃ karissāmi.
atk-abh03a:329_5: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme
atk-abh03a:329_6: sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-abh03a:330_3: Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-abh03a:330_5: Evamevanti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:330_6: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhamanīahi viya dussīlapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:330_7: Guthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi
atk-abh03a:330_8: tassa kiriyāya kāraṇabhāvo sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahino gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddassa
atk-abh03a:331_2: Bhiyyoso mattāya cicciṭāyatīti tañhi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāti saddaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:331_4: Evamevanti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-abh03a:331_5: Appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ vuttakāle ‘mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadatī’ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-abh03a:331_10: na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamānopi atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:331_19: Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappentassa sītaṃ vūpasammati,
atk-abh03a:331_21: Tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo,
atk-abh03a:333_2: sīlesu paripūrakārinoti ete ariyasāvakā yāni tāni maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāni,
atk-abh03a:333_6: tehi ca vuṭṭhānato sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:333_7: taṃ paripūraṃ samattaṃ karontīti ‘sīlesu paripūrakārino’ti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:333_10: samādhiṃ paññañca bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ kattabbaṃ taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti
atk-abh03a:333_11: samādhismiṃ paññāya ca mattaso kārinoti vuccanti.
atk-abh03a:333_12: Iminā upāyena itaresupi dvīsu nayesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:335_5: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjatipi,
atk-abh03a:335_11: Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni,
atk-abh03a:335_15: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti,
atk-abh03a:335_23: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:336_4: Tena daṭṭhabboti tena paññāpanena so satthā rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā lābhīti daṭṭhabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:336_6: Sammāsambuddho satthā tena daṭṭhabboti tena titthiyehi asādhāraṇena paññāpanena ayaṃ tatiyo satthā sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:336_7: Titthiyā hi kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññapentā rūpabhavaṃ vakkhanti.
atk-abh03a:336_12: Sammāsambuddho pana kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ pahānaṃ anāgāmimaggena paññapeti.
atk-abh03a:336_14: Ime tayo satthāroti ime dve janā bāhirakā,
atk-abh03a:337_3: Attānaṃ saccato thetato paññapetīti “attā nāmeko atthi nicco dhuvo sassato”ti bhūtato thirato paññapeti.
atk-abh03a:341_4: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo yasmā sayaṃ katena ca dussīlyena samannāgato yañca samādapitena kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:342_1: Sappurisena sappurisataroti attanā katena susīlyena samannāgatattā yañca samādapito karoti.
atk-abh03a:344_1: Kalyāṇoti kusalakammapathasaṅkhātena dasavidhena kalyāṇadhammena samannāgato suddhako bhadrako.
atk-abh03a:346_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa sadosattā,
atk-abh03a:347_1: Sāvajjena bahulanti yassa sāvajjameva kāyakammaṃ bahu hoti,
atk-abh03a:347_7: Yo gāmadhammatāya vā nigamadhammatāya vā kadāci karahaci uposathaṃ samādiyati,
atk-abh03a:347_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo tīhi dvārehi āyūhanakammesu sāvajjasseva bahulatāya anavajjassa appatāya vajjabahuloti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:348_0: Yathā hi ekasmiṃ padese dubbaṇṇāni duggandhāni pupphāni rāsikatānassu,
atk-abh03a:348_1: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh03a:348_3: Yathā pana ekasmiṃ padese atimuttakavassikapāṭalāni rāsikatānassu,
atk-abh03a:348_4: tesaṃ upari tahaṃ tahaṃ dubbaṇṇaduggandhāni badarapupphādīni patitāni bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh03a:348_6: Catuttho pana tīhipi dvārehi āyūhanakammassa niddosattā,
atk-abh03a:349_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ ‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
atk-abh03a:349_7: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo ugghaṭitaññūti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:350_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṅkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe bhājiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo vipañcitaññūti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:351_0: 150. Uddesādīhi netabboti neyyo. Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti.
atk-abh03a:352_2: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti na tena attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:353_6: Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttaṃ paṭibhānamassāti no muttappaṭibhāno.
atk-abh03a:353_11: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pariggahetvā yuttapayuttakāraṇameva katheti.
atk-abh03a:354_1: pucchānantarameva yena vā tena vā vacanena paṭibāhati,
atk-abh03a:354_2: vīmaṃsitvāpi ca yuttaṃ na pekkhati catunikāyikapaṇḍitatissatthero viya.
atk-abh03a:354_3: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho pañhapariyosānampi nāgameti,
atk-abh03a:354_5: Vacanatthaṃ panassa vīmaṃsiyamānaṃ katthaci na laggati.
atk-abh03a:355_3: So kira pañhaṃ puṭṭho sīghameva katheti,
atk-abh03a:356_2: na yena vā tena vā paṭibāhituṃ sakkoti tibbandhakāranimuggo viya hoti lāḷudāyitthero viya.
atk-abh03a:357_3: Asahitañcāti kathento ca pana na atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:357_4: Parisā cassa na kusalā hotīti sotuṃ nisinnaparisā cassa yuttāyuttaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ siliṭṭhāsiliṭṭhaṃ na jānātīti attho.
atk-abh03a:357_9: itare pana dhammakathikānaṃ antare paviṭṭhattā evaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh03a:358_3: Tattha gajjitvā no vassanabhāvo nāma pāpako.
atk-abh03a:358_4: Manussā hi yathā devo gajjati ‘suvuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti bījāni nīharitvā vapanti.
atk-abh03a:358_5: Atha deve avassante khette bījāni khetteyeva nassanti,
atk-abh03a:358_6: gehe bījāni geheyeva nassantīti dubbhikkhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:358_8: Manussā hi ‘imasmiṃ kāle dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī’ti ninnaṭṭhānesuyeva vappaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:358_9: Atha devo vassitvā sabbabījāni mahāsamuddaṃ pāpeti,
atk-abh03a:359_0: Bhāsitā hoti no kattāti ‘idāni ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmi,
atk-abh03a:360_0: Kattā hoti no bhāsitāti ‘ganthadhuraṃ vā pūressāmi vāsadhuraṃ vā’ti na bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:360_4: Eko hi ‘asukadivase nāma dānaṃ dassāmī’ti saṅghaṃ nimanteti,
atk-abh03a:360_8: Aparo saṅghaṃ animantetvāva sakkāraṃ katvā ‘bhikkhū ānessāmī’ti na labhati,
atk-abh03a:361_2: gādhaṃ kattā no vasitāti attano āsayaṃ bilaṃ kūpaṃ khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:361_7: Vasitā no gādhaṃ kattāti sayaṃ na khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:361_13: Imāya pana upamāya upamitesu puggalesu paṭhamo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:361_15: Yathā pana sā tattha na vasati,
atk-abh03a:361_18: tathā ayampi pariyattivasena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā catusaccadhammaṃ na paṭivijjhati,
atk-abh03a:361_20: Dutiyo yathā sā mūsikā gādhaṃ na khaṇati,
atk-abh03a:361_22: Yathā pana parena khatabile vasantī jīvitaṃ rakkhati;
atk-abh03a:361_23: evaṃ parassa kathaṃ sutvā catusaccadhammaṃ paṭivijjhitvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vasaṃ atikkamati.
atk-abh03a:362_2: āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇīti anto āmaṃ bahi pakkasadisaṃ.
atk-abh03a:362_3: Pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇīti anto pakkaṃ bahi āmasadisaṃ.
atk-abh03a:362_5: Tattha yathā ambe apakkabhāvo āmatā hoti,
atk-abh03a:363_7: Upamitapuggalesu panettha anto guṇasāravirahito tuccho bāhirasobhanatāya pihito puggalo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:364_2: udakarahado tāva jaṇṇumattepi udake sati paṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇattā vā bahalattā vā udakassa apaññāyamānatalo uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:364_3: Tiporisa catuporisepi pana udake sati acchattā udakassa paññāyamānatalo gambhīro uttānobhāso nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:364_5: Puggalopi kilesussadabhāvato guṇagambhīratāya ca abhāvato guṇagambhīrānaṃ sadisehi abhikkamādīhi yutto uttāno gambhīrobhāso nāma.
atk-abh03a:365_2: balībaddo tāva yo attano gogaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti ubbejeti,
atk-abh03a:365_5: Puggalopi attano parisaṃ ghaṭṭento vijjhanto pharusena samudācaranto,
atk-abh03a:365_6: paraparisāya pana soraccaṃ nivātavuttitaṃ āpajjanto sakagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo nāmāti.
atk-abh03a:365_8: Niddesavāre panettha ubbejitā hotīti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegappattaṃ karoticceva attho.
atk-abh03a:366_2: āsīviso tāva yassa visaṃ āsuṃ āgacchati sīghaṃ pharati;
atk-abh03a:367_1: Ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitā hotītiādīsu ananuviccāti atulayitvā,
atk-abh03a:368_4: Tatra kālaññū hotīti yamidaṃ kālenāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:368_7: tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇatthāya “imasmiṃ kāle pucchitenāpi mayā na kathetabbā,
atk-abh03a:368_10: Upekkhako viharatīti majjhattabhūtāya upekkhāya ṭhito hutvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:369_2: yo uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti,
atk-abh03a:369_3: taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ na paṭilabhati,
atk-abh03a:369_4: taṃ sandhāya yassa puggalassa uṭṭhahatotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:369_5: Tatūpari devāti tato upari brahmakāyikādayo devā.
atk-abh03a:369_8: Puññavato cāti idaṃ puññavante khattiyabrāhmaṇādayo ceva bhummadeve ādiṃ katvā nimmānaratipariyosāne deve ca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:369_10: Nerayikā pana neva uṭṭhānena ājīvaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-abh03a:369_11: nāpi nesaṃ puññaphalena koci ājīvo uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:370_17: Evaṃ puggalo tamo hoti tamaparāyaṇoti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiññeva kālaṃ
atk-abh03a:370_18: katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalepi kappe saṃsarati.
atk-abh03a:370_21: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:371_0: Ettha ca nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vātiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-abh03a:371_5: Na lābhītiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca.
atk-abh03a:372_0: Apicettha tividhāya kulasampattiyā paccājātiādikena jotinā yuttato joti,
atk-abh03a:372_3: Khattiyamahāsālakule vātiādīsu khattiyamahāsālāti khattiyā mahāsārā mahāsārappattā khattiyā.
atk-abh03a:372_4: Yesañhi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:372_5: tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti,
atk-abh03a:372_8: diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-abh03a:372_11: kahāpaṇakumbho vaḷañjatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-abh03a:372_21: Dassanīyoti aññaṃ kammaṃ pahāya divasampi passitabbayutto.
atk-abh03a:373_2: diṭṭhadhammikāya vā samparāyikāya vā sampattiyā virahito oṇato. Nīco,
atk-abh03a:374_2: rukkho tāva pheggusāraparivāroti vanajeṭṭhakarukkho sayaṃ pheggu hoti,
atk-abh03a:375_12: Parathomanāyāti parehi thutivasena gāthādiupanibandhanena vuttāya thomanāya.
atk-abh03a:377_1: imesu hi catūsu puggalesu rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:377_3: Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:377_4: Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:377_5: Dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:377_7: Sabbasatte ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:377_9: Pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:377_11: Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā,
atk-abh03a:377_13: Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo,
atk-abh03a:378_0: Etasmiṃ catuppamāṇe lokasannivāse buddhesu appasannā mandā,
atk-abh03a:378_2: Rūpappamāṇassa hi buddharūpato uttari pasādāvahaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:378_3: Ghosappamāṇassa buddhānaṃ kittighosato uttari pasādāvaho ghoso nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:378_4: Lūkhappamāṇassa kāsikāni vatthāni mahārahāni kañcanabhājanāni tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike sabbasampattiyutte
atk-abh03a:378_6: uttari pasādāvahaṃ aññaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:378_7: Dhammappamāṇassa sadevake loke asādhāraṇasīlādiguṇassa tathāgatassa sīlādiguṇato uttari pasādāvaho añño sīlādiguṇo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:378_8: Iti bhagavā imaṃ catuppamāṇikaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ muṭṭhinā gahetvā viya ṭhitoti.
atk-abh03a:379_9: parapuggalaṃ “tayāpi sīlasampannena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā yathā sīlaṃ samādiyati,
atk-abh03a:379_13: Etesu pana catūsu paṭhamo vakkalittherasadiso hoti.
atk-abh03a:380_6: Uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti,
atk-abh03a:380_9: Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati.
atk-abh03a:380_10: Uccāraṃ vā katvā hatthasmiññeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhatīti dasseti.
atk-abh03a:380_12: Tasmā tesaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento evaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:380_15: Tena hi ‘tiṭṭha bhaddante’ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti natiṭṭhabhaddantiko.
atk-abh03a:380_16: Tadubhayampi hetaṃ titthiyā “etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti na karonti.
atk-abh03a:380_18: Uddissakatanti “imaṃ tumhe uddissa kata”nti evaṃ ārocitabhikkhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:380_19: Na nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati,
atk-abh03a:381_0: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā diyyamānaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:381_5: Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:381_8: Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhati. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:381_10: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati.
atk-abh03a:381_12: Purisantaragatāya ratiantarāyo hotīti na gaṇhāti na saṅkittīsūti saṅkittetvā katabhattesu.
atk-abh03a:381_13: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti,
atk-abh03a:381_15: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho ‘piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī’ti upaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-abh03a:381_16: tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:382_1: Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā ‘imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā’ti mānussakā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
atk-abh03a:382_2: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-abh03a:382_3: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:382_8: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati.
atk-abh03a:383_8: nīvārā nāma tāva araññe sayaṃ jātā vīhijāti.
atk-abh03a:384_15: yāni kānici tantāvutānaṃ vatthānaṃ kesakambalo tesaṃ patikuṭṭho akkhāyatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:385_1: Gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
atk-abh03a:385_2: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti.
atk-abh03a:385_6: sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī”ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.
atk-abh03a:387_6: Ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:387_7: Kaṇḍuvamānoti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno.
atk-abh03a:387_11: vacchopi setakova sace kabarā vā, rattā vā,
atk-abh03a:387_14: So evamāhāti so rājā evaṃ vadeti.
atk-abh03a:387_17: Barihisatthāyāti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.
atk-abh03a:388_5: Anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti sītībhūto.
atk-abh03a:389_0: Imaṃ pana puggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ –
atk-abh03a:389_2: Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato –
atk-abh03a:389_13: Suṇāti gahapati vāti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisati?
atk-abh03a:389_15: Yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:389_16: Brāhmaṇakulā pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:389_17: Hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-abh03a:389_18: Gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti.
atk-abh03a:389_19: Te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-abh03a:389_20: Itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā nāma na bahukā,
atk-abh03a:389_22: Iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.
atk-abh03a:390_0: Aññatarasmiṃ vāti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ.
atk-abh03a:390_2: Tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatīti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammassāmimhi tathāgate “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a:390_4: Sambādho gharāvāsoti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-abh03a:390_9: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsāde ca devavimānādīsu ca supihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati,
atk-abh03a:391_2: Rajopatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato.
atk-abh03a:391_6: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:391_7: Ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:391_9: Idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ –
atk-abh03a:391_10: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni
atk-abh03a:391_11: vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya”nti.
atk-abh03a:391_12: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivāṇijjādikammaṃ “agāriya”nti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:391_17: Appaṃ vāti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:392_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca.
atk-abh03a:392_6: Samāpannoti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.
atk-abh03a:392_7: Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyātiādīsu pāṇātipātādikathā heṭṭhā vitthāritā eva.
atk-abh03a:392_9: Paṭivirato hotīti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova hoti.
atk-abh03a:392_10: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-abh03a:392_12: sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vināsanabhāvato ‘sattha’nti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:392_13: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-abh03a:392_19: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-abh03a:393_6: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:394_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-abh03a:395_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-abh03a:395_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati,
atk-abh03a:395_8: Jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
atk-abh03a:395_17: Asinā sīse chindantepi dve kathā na katheti.
atk-abh03a:395_21: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:395_23: Asukenā’ti vutte ‘mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:395_31: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-abh03a:396_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito sutvāti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ,
atk-abh03a:396_2: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-abh03a:396_4: evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta’ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā.
atk-abh03a:396_8: evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta’ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-abh03a:396_15: Te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:396_17: Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-abh03a:397_2: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī.
atk-abh03a:397_9: Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:397_16: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:397_17: Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-abh03a:397_18: tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati.
atk-abh03a:397_19: Na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:398_4: aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā.
atk-abh03a:398_10: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti.
atk-abh03a:398_15: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyasatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:398_17: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:398_18: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccanāpanādivasenapi pavattānaṃ
atk-abh03a:398_20: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā yuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti.
atk-abh03a:398_27: Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-abh03a:398_29: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-abh03a:399_3: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamacchamaṃsānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh03a:399_8: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:399_12: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-abh03a:399_14: Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati taṃ khettaṃ.
atk-abh03a:400_1: Gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:400_4: Tasmā dūteyyapahīṇagamanānaṃ anugoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:400_11: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:400_13: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-abh03a:400_15: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:400_17: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-abh03a:401_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti,
atk-abh03a:401_3: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ pavisitvā suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā’ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-abh03a:401_4: Tato tehi ‘kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo’ti vutte ‘vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā’ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:402_2: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena ‘saṇikaṃ āsiñcā’ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:402_3: Dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-abh03a:402_5: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:402_6: Dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-abh03a:402_8: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-abh03a:403_2: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:403_4: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
atk-abh03a:403_9: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto,
atk-abh03a:403_12: Tena hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho,
atk-abh03a:403_16: evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghaṇako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti.
atk-abh03a:403_17: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-abh03a:404_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-abh03a:404_5: Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:404_6: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ ‘sāciyogo’ti vadanti.
atk-abh03a:405_6: Yañhi himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-abh03a:405_12: Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:406_1: So santuṭṭho hotīti so catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti.
atk-abh03a:406_4: Samādāyeva pakkamatīti aṭṭhavidhaṃ bhikkhu parikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati.
atk-abh03a:406_5: “Mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”ti saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti.
atk-abh03a:406_6: So jiyā muttasaro viya yūthā pakkanto,
atk-abh03a:406_7: mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto ekova tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:412_5: sakuṇo nāma “asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti.
atk-abh03a:412_7: idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti tesaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh03a:412_8: Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-abh03a:412_9: na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti.
atk-abh03a:412_10: Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:412_12: Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati,
atk-abh03a:413_1: So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:413_6: Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:414_1: So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu
atk-abh03a:415_2: Yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi,
atk-abh03a:415_4: tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:415_5: Araññe adhivatthā devatā “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā”ti bheravaṃ saddaṃ sāventi.
atk-abh03a:415_7: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-abh03a:415_10: So hi attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
atk-abh03a:415_11: Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-abh03a:415_12: Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.
atk-abh03a:415_15: yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti ettake ṭhāne yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:416_1: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:416_3: Arahattamaggo hi āsavānaṃ vināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:416_8: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:416_16: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:417_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:417_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:417_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-abh03a:417_9: Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto ‘khīṇā jātī’tiādīni pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:417_10: Vusitanti vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
atk-abh03a:417_12: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma.
atk-abh03a:417_14: Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:417_15: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-abh03a:417_20: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti “idāni puna etthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ natthī”ti pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:418_2: appahīnoti vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.
atk-abh03a:419_3: Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassāti niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano citte uppannassa cetosamathassa.
atk-abh03a:419_4: Adhipaññādhammavipassanāyāti adhipaññāsaṅkhātāya khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattāya vipassanāya.
atk-abh03a:420_6: Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotīti paññattaṃ vītikkamanto na karoti.
atk-abh03a:420_7: Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi.
atk-abh03a:420_12: Kiṃ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma.
atk-abh03a:421_1: Anāgāmīti kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampanīyacittatāya ca tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma.
atk-abh03a:421_7: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:422_2: appakaṃ sutaṃ hotīti navaṅge satthusāsane kiñcideva thokaṃ sutaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:422_4: na dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammapaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hoti.
atk-abh03a:423_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ sotāpanno sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā ‘samaṇamacalo’ti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:423_7: Sakadāgāmī pana rajjanakilesassa atthitāya samaṇapadumoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:423_8: Rattaṭṭho hi idha padumaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:423_9: Anāgāmī kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa rajjanakilesassa natthitāya samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:423_10: Paṇḍaraṭṭho hi idha puṇḍarīkaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:423_11: Khīṇāsavo ca thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo nāmāti vutto.
atk-abh03a:426_1: tatrāti tesu “ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapuggalesu.
atk-abh03a:426_13: “Ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato.
atk-abh03a:426_14: Tasmā āpattivītikkamavasena ārabhati ceva tappaccayā vippaṭisārī ca hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:427_0: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti.
atk-abh03a:427_2: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:427_6: Evaṃ santepi idha maggakiccavasena phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:427_18: suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca bhāvetū”ti.
atk-abh03a:427_19: Amunā pañcamena puggalenāti etena pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena.
atk-abh03a:427_20: Samasamo bhavissatīti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:428_0: Ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:428_3: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vuṭṭhitattā na vippaṭisārī hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:428_4: Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ nāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:428_5: vinayapaññattiyaṃ pana akovidattā anāpattiyaṃ āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī hoti.
atk-abh03a:428_6: Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sakiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pacchā kiñcāpi nāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:428_7: vippaṭisāraṃ pana vinodetuṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:428_8: Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti neva āpattiṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:428_12: So hi “kiṃ me imasmiṃ buddhakāle parinibbānena,
atk-abh03a:428_13: anāgate metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti.
atk-abh03a:428_14: Sopi “kimatthaṃ āyasmā pamatto viharati puthujjanassa nāma gati anibaddhā.
atk-abh03a:428_15: Āyasmā hi metteyyasammāsambuddhassa sammukhabhāvaṃ labheyyapi na labheyyāpīti arahattatthāya vipassanaṃ bhāvehī”ti ovaditabbova.
atk-abh03a:429_3: So cīvarādīni labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati.
atk-abh03a:429_5: Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati –
atk-abh03a:429_9: Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā pacchā gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti,
atk-abh03a:430_4: eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ‘asāruppo eso’ti katheti,
atk-abh03a:430_6: Puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā ‘sāruppo aya’nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti “asukena nāma ‘asāruppo
atk-abh03a:430_7: aya’nti amhākaṃ kathita”nti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:430_9: Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena “asāruppo esa bhikkhu,
atk-abh03a:430_10: nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yutto”ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimasseva kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:431_0: Loloti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālaṭṭhitikattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo.
atk-abh03a:431_4: Ettha pana punappunaṃ bhajanavasena saddhāva bhatti.
atk-abh03a:431_7: Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotīti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:431_10: assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāno muhuttena pasīdati,
atk-abh03a:432_0: Mando momūhoti aññāṇabhāvena mando avisadatāya momūho. Mahāmūḷhoti attho.
atk-abh03a:433_3: Rajagganti hatthiassādīnaṃ pādappahārabhinnāya bhūmiyā uggataṃ rajakkhandhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:433_4: Na santhambhatīti santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:433_6: Dhajagganti hatthiassādipiṭṭhesu vā rathesu vā ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ aggaṃ.
atk-abh03a:433_13: Sahati sampahāranti dve tayo pahāre patvāpi sahati,
atk-abh03a:433_18: Laddhappahārānaṃ pahārajagganatthañceva katakammānaṃ visesaṃ ñatvā ṭhānantaradānatthañca issariyasukhānubhavanatthañca.
atk-abh03a:434_1: Idāni yasmā satthu yodhājīvehi kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:434_2: imasmiṃ pana sāsane tathārūpe pañca puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ opammaṃ ābhataṃ,
atk-abh03a:435_2: Na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretunti brahmacariyavāsaṃ anupacchijjamānaṃ gopetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:435_4: Kimassa rajaggasminti kiṃ tassa puggalassa rajaggaṃ nāmāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:437_1: Abhinisīdatīti abhibhavitvā santike vā ekāsane vā nisīdati.
atk-abh03a:438_1: Viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvāti gahitaṭṭhānato tassa hatthaṃ viniveṭhetvā ceva,
atk-abh03a:439_4: attano pana mandattā momūhattā aññāṇeneva piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:439_5: Pāpiccho icchāpakatoti piṇḍapātikassa me sato “ayaṃ piṇḍapātiko”ti catupaccayasakkāraṃ karissanti. Lajjī,
atk-abh03a:439_7: Evaṃ pāpikāya icchāya ṭhatvā tāya pāpicchāya abhibhūto hutvā piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:439_8: Ummādavasena piṇḍāya caranto pana ummādā cittavikkhepā piṇḍapātiko nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:439_9: Vaṇṇitanti idaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ nāma buddhehi ca buddhasāvakehi ca vaṇṇitaṃ pasatthanti piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:439_13: ‘iti santuṭṭho bhavissāmi idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattissati’;
atk-abh03a:439_15: idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ kilesasallekhanatthāya saṃvattissatī”ti piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:439_18: Yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ tena teneva yāpanabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-abh03a:440_0: Gavā khīranti gāvito khīraṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:440_3: Evamevanti yathā etesu pañcasu gorasesu sappimaṇḍo aggo;
atk-abh03a:440_4: evamevaṃ imesu pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu yvāyaṃ appicchatādīni nissāya piṇḍapātiko hoti.
atk-abh03a:440_5: Ayaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
atk-abh03a:440_6: Imesu pana pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu dveva janā piṇḍapātikā,
atk-abh03a:443_2: Sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabboti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:444_0: Paccekasambuddho tenātiādīsupi tena paccekasambodhiñāṇena so puggalo paccekasambuddho.
atk-abh03a:444_2: Tena dukkhassa antakaraṇena te puggalā avasesā arahanto.
atk-abh03a:444_3: Tena itthattaṃ anāgamanena so puggalo anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:444_4: Tena itthattaṃ āgamanena te puggalā sotāpannasakadāgāmino daṭṭhabbāti.
atk-abh03a:447_3: Evaṃ puggaloti iminā kāraṇena puggalo ekavāraṃ nimuggo tathā nimuggova hoti.
atk-abh03a:447_4: Etassa hi puna bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti.
atk-abh03a:447_5: Makkhaligosālādayo viya heṭṭhā narakaggīnaṃyeva āhāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:448_0: Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjati.
atk-abh03a:448_3: Hāyatiyevāti caṅkavāre āsittaudakaṃ viya ekantena parihāyateva.
atk-abh03a:448_5: Imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:448_8: pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi puna buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakatāya tehi guṇehi parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ
atk-abh03a:448_9: saṅghabhedakammañca katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena niraye nibbatti.
atk-abh03a:448_10: Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā padumaniraye nibbatto.
atk-abh03a:449_0: Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatīti appahonakakālepi na hāyati,
atk-abh03a:449_3: Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā upanibandhāpeti.
atk-abh03a:449_5: Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ vā dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:449_6: medhābalavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakālepi tato uttariṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:449_7: Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:450_0: Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketīti sotāpanno puggalo uṭṭhahitvā gamanamaggaṃ gantabbaṃ disaṃ vā āloketi nāma.
atk-abh03a:451_0: Ummujjitvā pataratīti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho patarati nāma.
atk-abh03a:452_0: Patigādhappatto hotīti anāgāmipuggalo uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti, tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:453_0: Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhatīti sabbakilesoghaṃ taritvā paratīraṃ gantvā nibbānathale ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:453_1: Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.
atk-abh03a:454_0: Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggapaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:454_1: Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-abh03a:454_3: Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-abh03a:454_6: So majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ,
atk-abh03a:454_10: Chaṭṭho taritvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:454_11: Sattamo pārimatīraṃ gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhātvā varavatthāni nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā
atk-abh03a:454_12: nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā nānālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha uttamabhojanaṃ bhuñji.
atk-abh03a:455_0: Tattha satta jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā.
atk-abh03a:455_2: Paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:455_3: Ummujjitvā nimuggapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimattakena ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā nimuggapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:455_4: Majjhe nadiyā ṭhito viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:455_5: Uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokento viya gantabbamaggaṃ gantabbadisaṃ vā olokento sotāpanno.
atk-abh03a:455_7: Taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvattitadhammatāya ṭhito anāgāmī.
atk-abh03a:455_8: Nhatvā pārimatīraṃ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo.
atk-abh03a:455_9: Thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaraṃ āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:459_4: Kāmāvacarattabhāveneva arahattappatti ca anupādisesanibbānappatti ca hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:460_0: Idha vihāyāti idha kāmāvacare attabhāve vihāya suddhāvāsattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ niṭṭhā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:460_1: Antarāparinibbāyiādayo hi idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā ito cutā suddhāvāsesu uppajjitvā tena attabhāvena
atk-abh03a:468_0: Suvibhatto asaṃkiṇṇo, yo yo attho yahiṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh03a:469_0: Tato tato taṃ gahetvā, pahāya ativitthāraṃ.
atk-abh03a:470_0: Visuddhimagge yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ anādāya saṅkhatā;
atk-abh03a:474_0: Sampattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, saddhammaṃ sukhumaṃ sivaṃ;
atk-abh03a:489_0: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh03a:491_0: Yamakapāṭihīrāvasānasmiñhi bhagavā tidasapure pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā
atk-abh03a:491_1: mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā devaparisāya abhidhammakathaṃ kathento dhammasaṅgaṇīvibhaṅgadhātukathāpuggalapaññattippakaraṇāni
atk-abh03a:491_2: desayitvā kathāvatthudesanāya vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako mahāpañño moggaliputtatissatthero nāma
atk-abh03a:491_3: uppannaṃ sāsanamalaṃ sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
