atk-abh03a:491_4: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhājessatī”ti tassokāsaṃ karonto yā cesā puggalavāde
atk-abh03a:491_5: tāva catūsu pañhesu dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti,
atk-abh03a:491_6: taṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya tantiyā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-abh03a:491_7: Athāvasesaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ vitthāranayeneva kathetvā vutthavasso suvaṇṇarajatasopānamajjhe maṇimayena
atk-abh03a:491_8: sopānena devalokato saṅkassanagare oruyha sattahitaṃ sampādento yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-abh03a:492_0: Athassa mahākassapappamukho vasīgaṇo ajātasatturājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh03a:492_1: Tato vassasatassa accayena vajjiputtakā bhikkhū dasa vatthūni dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:492_2: Tāni sutvā kākaṇḍakassa brāhmaṇassa putto yasatthero susunāgaputtaṃ kālāsokaṃ nāma rājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh03a:492_3: dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antare sattatherasatāni uccinitvā tāni dasavatthūni madditvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ
atk-abh03a:493_0: Tehi pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi niggahitā dasasahassā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū pakkhaṃ pariyesamānā attano
atk-abh03a:493_1: anurūpaṃ dubbalapakkhaṃ labhitvā visuṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulaṃ nāma akaṃsu.
atk-abh03a:493_2: Tato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni –
atk-abh03a:493_4: Gokulikanikāyato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni –
atk-abh03a:493_7: Tesaṃyeva antare cetiyavādā nāma apare ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:493_8: Evaṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulato dutiye vassasate pañcācariyakulāni uppannāni.
atk-abh03a:494_0: Tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate theravādato bhijjitvā dve ācariyavādā uppannā –
atk-abh03a:494_2: Tattha vajjiputtakavādato bhijjitvā apare cattāro ācariyavādā uppannā –
atk-abh03a:494_7: Puna tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate mahisāsakavādato bhijjitvā sabbatthivādā dhammaguttikāti dve ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:494_8: Puna sabbatthivādakulato bhijjitvā kassapikā nāma jātā.
atk-abh03a:494_9: Kassapikesu bhinnesu apare saṅkantikā nāma jātā.
atk-abh03a:494_10: Saṅkantikesu bhinnesu suttavādā nāma jātāti theravādato bhijjitvā ime ekādasa ācariyavādā uppannā.
atk-abh03a:494_13: mahāsaṅghikānañca cha ācariyavādāti sabbeva aṭṭhārasa ācariyavādā dutiye vassasate uppannā.
atk-abh03a:496_0: Aññaṃ pakkhaṃ labhitvāna, adhammavādī bahū janā.
atk-abh03a:502_0: Atthaṃ dhammañca bhindiṃsu, vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasu.
atk-abh03a:505_0: “Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ, aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu te;
atk-abh03a:506_0: Byañjanacchāyāya te bhikkhū, bahuṃ atthaṃ vināsayuṃ.
atk-abh03a:508_0: Patirūpaṃ suttaṃ vinayaṃ, tañca aññaṃ kariṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:536_0: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:538_0: Pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:546_7: Purimakānaṃ pana aṭṭhārasannaṃ ācariyavādānaṃ vasena pavattamāne sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho asoko dhammarājā divase divase buddhapūjāya satasahassaṃ,
atk-abh03a:546_11: catūsu dvāresu bhesajjatthāya satasahassanti pañcasatasahassāni pariccajanto sāsane uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-abh03a:547_0: Titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ patthayamānā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni –
atk-abh03a:547_4: Pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva kese chinditvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā uposathakammādikaraṇakāle saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisanti.
atk-abh03a:547_5: Te bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā
atk-abh03a:547_6: anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh03a:547_10: keci “dhammañca vinayañca vobhindissāmā”ti tathā tathā paggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:547_11: Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho na tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi.
atk-abh03a:548_1: aññadatthu duggahitagāhinā bālena amaccena anekesu bhikkhūsu jīvitā voropitesu vippaṭisārī ahosi.
atk-abh03a:548_2: So tañca vippaṭisāraṃ tañca sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ vūpasametukāmo “ko nu kho imasmiṃ atthe paṭibalo”ti saṅghaṃ pucchitvā “moggaliputtatissatthero,
atk-abh03a:548_3: mahārājā”ti sutvā saṅghassa vacanena ahogaṅgāpabbatato theraṃ pakkosāpetvā iddhipāṭihāriyadassanena therassa
atk-abh03a:548_4: ānubhāve nibbicikiccho attano kukkuccaṃ pucchitvā vippaṭisāraṃ vūpasamesi.
atk-abh03a:548_5: Theropi taṃ rājuyyāneyeva vasanto satta divasāni samayaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-abh03a:548_6: So uggahitasamayo sattame divase asokārāme bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā
atk-abh03a:548_7: sāṇipākārantare nisinno ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato ekato kāretvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-abh03a:548_21: Rājā paṭhamameva samayassa uggahitattā nayime bhikkhū aññatitthiyā imeti ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni datvā uppabbājesi.
atk-abh03a:549_9: karotu bhikkhusaṅgho uposatha’nti ārakkhaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-abh03a:549_12: Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero yāni ca tadā uppannāni vatthūni,
atk-abh03a:549_14: sabbesampi tesaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ satthārā dinnanayavaseneva tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ vibhajanto sakavāde
atk-abh03a:549_15: pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ āharitvā imaṃ parappavādamathanaṃ āyatilakkhaṇaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-abh03a:550_0: Tato saṭṭhisatasahassasaṅkhyesu bhikkhū uccinitvā tipiṭakapariyattidharānaṃ pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh03a:550_1: sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero ca yasatthero ca dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu;
atk-abh03a:550_2: evameva saṅgāyanto sāsanamalaṃ visodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi.
atk-abh03a:550_3: Tattha abhidhammaṃ saṅgāyanto imaṃ yathābhāsitaṃ pakaraṇaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh03a:556_0: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti.
atk-abh03a:562_1: Tattha puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti ayaṃ pucchā.
atk-abh03a:562_6: Bhagavatā hi imasmiṃ pakaraṇe nānappakārānaṃ laddhīnaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tantivasena mātikā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh03a:562_7: Sā therena satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā tantivasena vibhattā.
atk-abh03a:562_8: Na hi thero yattakā ettha vādamaggā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:562_9: tattakehi vādīhi saddhiṃ vādena viggāhikakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-abh03a:562_10: Evaṃ santepi pana tāsaṃ tāsaṃ kathānaṃ atthassa sukhāvadhāraṇatthaṃ sakavādīpucchā,
atk-abh03a:562_13: paravādīpaṭiññāti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvāva atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-abh03a:563_0: Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti hi ayaṃ sakavādīpucchā.
atk-abh03a:563_4: Sāsane vajjiputtakā ceva samitiyā ca bahiddhā ca bahū aññatitthiyā.
atk-abh03a:563_9: Saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti ettha saccikaṭṭhoti māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtākārena aggahetabbo bhūtaṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:563_12: rūpañca upalabbhatī”tiādinā khandhāyatanadhātuindriyavasena sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:563_21: so hi yaṃ taṃ parato vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-abh03a:563_23: taṃ gahetvā yasmā pana bhagavā saccavādī na visaṃvādanapurekkhāro vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:563_25: sadevakaṃ pana lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti,
atk-abh03a:563_26: tasmā yo tena vutto “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti,
atk-abh03a:563_27: so saccikaṭṭhaparamattheneva atthīti laddhiṃ gahetvā “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:564_0: Athassa tādisassa lesavacanassa chalavādassa okāsaṃ adadamāno sakavādī yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:564_4: asassato sanimitto animitto”ti evaṃ paridīpito rūpādisattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo āgato;
atk-abh03a:565_1: tasmā tena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena so puggalo upalabbhatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:565_3: ruppanādibhedena vā sappaccayādibhedena vā ākārena yo saccikaṭṭhaparamattho upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:565_6: So hi tathārūpaṃ puggalaṃ anicchanto avajānāti.
atk-abh03a:566_1: Yasmā te purimāya vattabbapaṭiññāya pacchimā navattabbapaṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:566_4: Taṃ niggahaṃ dosaṃ aparādhaṃ sampaṭicchāhīti attho.
atk-abh03a:566_5: Evaṃ niggahaṃ ājānāpetvā idāni taṃ ṭhapanāya ceva anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānañca vasena pākaṭaṃ karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:566_6: Tattha hañci puggalo upalabbhatīti yadi puggalo upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:566_8: Ayaṃ tāva paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ lakkhaṇabhūtā anulomaṭhapanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:566_9: Tena vata retiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa pāpitattā anulomapāpanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:566_18: Yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa āropitattā anulomaropanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:566_19: Yaṃ tassa pariyosāne micchātipadaṃ tassa purato idaṃ te’ti āharitabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:567_0: No ce pana vattabbetiādi “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhittapakkhassa ṭhapitattā paṭilomato niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ lakkhaṇabhūtā paṭilomaṭhapanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:567_1: No ca vata retiādi paṭilomapakkhe niggahassa pāpitattā paṭilomapāpanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:567_2: Puna yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi paṭilomapakkhe niggahassa āropitattā paṭilomaropanā nāma.
atk-abh03a:567_3: Idhāpi pariyosāne micchātipadassa purato idaṃ teti āharitabbameva.
atk-abh03a:568_2: tena vata bho so upalabbhatīti vattabbo.
atk-abh03a:568_3: Yaṃ pana tattha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti,
atk-abh03a:568_4: no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo upalabbhatī”’ti,
atk-abh03a:568_5: idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ tāva anulomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti.
atk-abh03a:568_6: Atha na vattabbo dutiyapañhe “tato so upalabbhatī”ti,
atk-abh03a:568_8: Yaṃ panettha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti,
atk-abh03a:568_9: no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo upalabbhatī”’ti,
atk-abh03a:568_10: idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ paṭilomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti.
atk-abh03a:568_11: Evametaṃ niggahassa ca anulomapaṭilomato catunnaṃ pāpanāropanānañca vuttattā upalabbhatītiādikaṃ anulomapañcakaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:568_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi anulomato pāpanāropanāhi eko,
atk-abh03a:568_13: paṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi ekoti dve niggahā katā.
atk-abh03a:568_14: ‘Ājānāhi niggaha’nti etasseva panettha puggalo upalabbhatīti paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamassa niggahassa
atk-abh03a:568_15: dvīhākārehi āropitattā ekovāyaṃ niggahoti paṭhamo niggaho.
atk-abh03a:569_3: So hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti gahitattā “nupalabbhatī”ti asampaṭicchanto evaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:569_6: Puna itaro attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhaṃyeva sandhāya yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:569_8: Sakavādī ‘puggalo’ti upādāpaññattisabbhāvatopi dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ ekato katvā pucchitattāpi na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:570_0: Idāni kiñcāpi tena paṭhamaṃ paramatthasaccavasena nupalabbhanīyatā sampaṭicchitā,
atk-abh03a:570_2: Paravādī pana ‘nupalabbhatī’ti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāya yaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ paṭiññātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:570_3: taṃ pacchā paṭikkhittanti bhaṇḍanassa paṭibhaṇḍanaṃ viya attano katassa niggahakammassa paṭikammaṃ karonto ājānāhi paṭikammanti āha.
atk-abh03a:570_4: Idāni yathāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā vādaṭṭhapanaṃ katvā anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi niggaho pākaṭo kato,
atk-abh03a:570_5: evaṃ paṭikammaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:570_7: Yasmā panettha ṭhapanā nāma paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato “ayaṃ tava doso”ti dassetuṃ ṭhapanamattameva hoti,
atk-abh03a:570_8: na niggahassa vā paṭikammassa vā pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:570_10: Tasmā idaṃ anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānaṃ vasena catūhākārehi.
atk-abh03a:570_11: Paṭikammassa katattā paṭikammacatukkaṃ nāmāti ekaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:571_1: Evaṃ paṭikammaṃ katvā idāni yvāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:571_2: tassa tameva chalavādaṃ nissāya dukkaṭabhāvaṃ dassento tvañce pana maññasītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:571_3: Tattha tvaṃ ce pana maññasīti yadi tvaṃ maññasi.
atk-abh03a:571_4: Vattabbe khoti idaṃ paccanīke āmantāti paṭiññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:571_5: No ca vattabbeti idaṃ pana na hevāti avajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:571_6: Tena tava tatthāti tena kāraṇena tvaṃyeva tasmiṃ nupalabbhatīti pakkhe –
atk-abh03a:571_8: Hevaṃ niggahetabbeti puna na hevāti avajānanto evaṃ niggahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:571_9: Atha taṃ niggaṇhāmāti athevaṃ niggahārahaṃ taṃ niggaṇhāma.
atk-abh03a:571_10: Suniggahito ca hosīti sakena matena niggahitattā suniggahito ca bhavasi.
atk-abh03a:572_0: Evamassa niggahetabbabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ niggaṇhanto hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:572_2: Pariyosāne pana idaṃ te micchāti idaṃ tava vacanaṃ micchā hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:572_3: Idaṃ chalavādena catūhi ākārehi niggahassa katattā niggahacatukkaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:573_1: Evaṃ niggahaṃ katvāpi idāni “yadi ayaṃ mayā tava matena kato niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:573_2: yo mama tayā heṭṭhā anulomapañcake kato niggaho,
atk-abh03a:573_3: sopi dunniggaho”ti dassento ese ce dunniggahitetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:573_4: Tattha ese ce dunniggahiteti eso ce tava vādo mayā dunniggahito.
atk-abh03a:573_5: Atha vā eso ce tava mayā kato niggaho dunniggaho.
atk-abh03a:573_6: Hevamevaṃ tattha dakkhāti tatthāpi tayā mama heṭṭhā kate niggahe evamevaṃ passa.
atk-abh03a:573_7: Idāni yvāssa heṭṭhā sakavādinā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:573_8: taṃ “vattabbe kho”tiādivacanena dassetvā puna taṃ niggahaṃ aniggahabhāvaṃ upanento no ca mayaṃ tayātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:573_9: Tattha no ca mayaṃ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāyātiādīsu ayamattho –
atk-abh03a:573_10: yasmā so tayā mama kato niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:573_11: tasmā mayaṃ tayā tattha anulomapañcake āmantāti etāya paṭiññāya evaṃ paṭijānantā puna na hevāti paṭikkhepe
atk-abh03a:573_14: īdisena pana niggahena dunniggahitā mayaṃ homa.
atk-abh03a:574_0: Idāni yaṃ niggahaṃ sandhāya “dunniggahitā ca homā”ti avoca,
atk-abh03a:574_3: Evamidaṃ anulomapaṭilomato catūhi pāpanāropanāhi niggahassa upanītattā upanayanacatukkaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:575_1: Idāni “na hevaṃ niggahetabbe”tiādikaṃ niggamanacatukkaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:575_2: Tattha na hevaṃ niggahetabbeti yathāhaṃ tayā niggahito,
atk-abh03a:575_4: Etassa hi niggahassa dunniggahabhāvo mayā sādhito.
atk-abh03a:575_7: tasmā yaṃ maṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci puggalo…pe…
atk-abh03a:575_10: Tena hi ye kate niggaheti yena kāraṇena idaṃ micchā,
atk-abh03a:575_11: tena kāraṇena yo tayā niggaho kato,
atk-abh03a:575_19: Ettāvatā sakavādino pubbapakkhe sati paravādino vacanasāmaññamattena chalavādena jayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:577_1: Idāni yathā paravādino pubbapakkhe sati sakavādino dhammeneva tathena sujayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:577_2: tathā vāduppattiṃ dassetuṃ puggalo nupalabbhatīti paccanīkānulomapañcakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:577_5: Suddhasammutisaccaṃ vā paramatthamissakaṃ vā sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya yo saccikaṭṭhoti puna anuyogo paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:577_6: sammutivasena nupalabbhatīti navattabbattā missakavasena vā anuyogassa saṃkiṇṇattā na hevanti paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:577_7: Paṭiññātaṃ paṭikkhipatīti vacanasāmaññamattena ājānāhi niggahantiādivacanaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:577_8: Evamayaṃ puggalo nupalabbhatīti dutiyavādaṃ nissāya dutiyo niggaho hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:578_1: Idāni dhammena samena attano vāde jayaṃ dassetuṃ anulomanaye pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:578_3: Laddhiyā okāsaṃ adatvā paramatthavasena puna anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:578_5: Tato paraṃ dhammena samena attano jayadassanatthaṃ ājānāhi paṭikammantiādi sabbaṃ sakavādīvacanameva hoti.
atk-abh03a:578_6: Tattha sabbesaṃ paṭikammaniggahopanayananiggamanacatukkānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:578_10: Tattha purimapañcake paravādissa sakavādinā kato niggaho suniggaho.
atk-abh03a:578_11: Sakavādissa pana paravādinā chalavādaṃ nissāya paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo dujjayo.
atk-abh03a:578_12: Dutiyapañcake sakavādissa paravādinā kato niggaho dunniggaho.
atk-abh03a:578_13: Paravādissa pana sakavādinā dhammavādaṃ nissāya paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo sujayoti paṭhamasaccikaṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:584_0: Dhammena hi jayo nāma, adhammena kuto jayo.
atk-abh03a:591_1: Evaṃ suddhikasaccikaṭṭhaṃ vitthāretvā idāni tameva aparehi okāsādīhi nayehi vitthāretuṃ puna puggalo upalabbhatītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:591_4: Puna sabbatthāti sarīraṃ sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:591_5: rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassanādosañca ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra’nti āpajjanadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:591_8: Tattha yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāya “sabbattha na upalabbhatī”ti vutte sarīrato bahi upalabbhatīti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:591_10: paṭhamaṃ anujānitvā pacchā avajānātīti chalavādassa vasena paṭikammaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:594_1: Dutiyanaye sabbadāti purimapacchimajātikālañca dharamānaparinibbutakālañca sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:594_2: sveva khattiyo so brāhmaṇotiādīnaṃ āpattidosañca dharamānaparinibbutānaṃ visesābhāvadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:597_1: Tatiyanaye sabbesūti khandhāyatanādīni sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:600_1: Evametāni tīṇi anulomapaccanīkapañcake anulomamattavaseneva tāva paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā puna paccanīkānulomapañcake
atk-abh03a:600_3: Tattha anulomapañcakassa pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā āgate paccanīke vuttanayeneva paccanīkassa ca pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:600_5: Ettāvatā suddhikassa ceva imesañca tiṇṇanti catunnaṃ saccikaṭṭhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ saccikaṭṭhe anulomapaccanīkassa
atk-abh03a:600_6: paccanīkānulomassa cāti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccanīkānaṃ vasena ayaṃ aṭṭhamukhā nāma vādayutti niddiṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:600_8: Yā ekekasmiṃ mukhe ekekassa niggahassa vasena aṭṭhakaniggahoti pāḷiyaṃ likhiyati.
atk-abh03a:608_2: Tattha rūpañcāti yathā rūpaṃ paramatthato upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:608_3: kiṃ te puggalopi tatheva upalabbhatīti sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:608_4: atthi puggaloti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:608_5: Yadi te rūpaṃ viya paramatthato puggalo atthi,
atk-abh03a:608_6: rūpato vedanādīnaṃ viya puggalassāpi aññattaṃ āpajjatīti anuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:608_9: Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsabhedassa saccikaṭṭhaparamatthassa vasena sakavādīpakkhamūlake anulomapaccanīke sattapaññāsa anulomapañcakāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:608_13: Tattha “vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti vacanamattena puggalassa atthitaṃ rūpassa ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena
atk-abh03a:608_14: upalabbhanīyataṃ dassetvā ubhinnaṃ aññattaṃ paṭijānāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti anuyogo paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:611_1: Idāni rūpādīheva saddhiṃ opammavasena saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:611_2: Tattha rūpavedanānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā ca puggalarūpānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññapucchā cāti pucchādvayampi sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:611_4: Paravādinā anuññātena upaladdhisāmaññena rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ aññattānuyogo sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:611_7: Dhammato panettha rūpamūlakādīnaṃ cakkānañca vasena sakavādīpakkhe vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni dassitāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh03a:611_16: Evaṃ sabbānipi vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:612_1: Paravādīpakkhepi rūpaṃ upalabbhatīti anulomavaseneva rūpavedanādīnaṃ aññattapaṭiññaṃ kāretvā puna atthi
atk-abh03a:612_2: puggaloti suttaṃ nissāya chalavasena puggalassa rūpādīhi upaladdhisāmaññaṃ āropetvā aññattānuyogo kato.
atk-abh03a:612_4: Dhammatopi sakavādīpakkhe vuttanayena vīsādhikāni nava paṭikammapañcakasatāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:615_2: tena yasmā rūpādīsu sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhaparamatthesu aññatarena bhavitabbaṃ;
atk-abh03a:615_15: Ayañca rūpādīsu ekadhammatopi puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:615_18: aññātāvindriyaṃ puggaloti sakalaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāya āraddho.
atk-abh03a:615_19: Sakalaṃ pana paccattalakkhaṇavasena ekato vattuṃ na sakkāti tantivasena anuyogalakkhaṇamattametaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:615_21: Vādakāmena pana imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā yathā yathā paravādissa okāso na hoti,
atk-abh03a:616_1: rūpasmiṃ puggalotiādīsu yathā ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ nissāya tayo mahābhūtā,
atk-abh03a:616_2: vatthurūpaṃ nissāya viññāṇaṃ rūpasminti vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-abh03a:616_8: Yathā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ nissayavasena “vedanāya rūpaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:616_11: Sabbānuyogesu pana ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena ceva samayavirodhena ca paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:616_13: Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhesu ekekasmiṃ cattāri cattāri katvā niggahavasena aṭṭhavīsādhikāni dve pañcakasatāni dassitāni.
atk-abh03a:616_15: Yā panettha atthi puggaloti vutte sakavādissa paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:620_2: Tattha yasmā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ seso saccikaṭṭhaparamattho paccayapaṭibaddhatāya sappaccayo,
atk-abh03a:620_6: nibbānaṃ vuttappakārābhāvato appaccayaṃ asaṅkhataṃ sassataṃ animittanti idaṃ saccikaṭṭhassa lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:620_7: Tasmā yadi puggalopi saccikaṭṭhaparamatthova tassāpi iminā lakkhaṇena bhavitabbanti sandhāya puggalo sappaccayotiādayo aṭṭhapi anuyogā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:620_10: Evametāni sakavādīpakkhe anulomapaccanīke anulomamattavasena aṭṭha pañcakāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:621_2: Tattha yasmā paravādinā suttavasena sammutisaccaṃ sādhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:621_5: Chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ “ājānāhi paṭikamma”ntiādi sabbaṃ idhāpi saṅkhittameva.
atk-abh03a:624_8: taṃ ekatthaṃ vā bhaveyya nānatthaṃ vā.
atk-abh03a:624_18: Tena taṃ vadāmi “yadi te yo puggalo,
atk-abh03a:624_23: Tato puggalavādī yasmā puggalassa upalabbhataṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:624_26: upalabbhati ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:624_28: mama puggalo atthi puggaloti satthu vacanato upalabbhati.
atk-abh03a:624_31: atha kho ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggaloti.
atk-abh03a:624_36: koci na puggaloti ayaṃ panettha attho.
atk-abh03a:624_38: puggalopi hi rūpādīsupi yo koci dhammo upalabbhatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:624_42: puggalo ke hi ci upalabbhati ke hi ci na upalabbhatīti.
atk-abh03a:624_44: puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa atthato ekatte yadi upalabbhatīti anuññāto dhammo puggalato anaññopi koci puggalo koci na puggalo,
atk-abh03a:624_48: So puggalassa anupaladdhiṃ anicchanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:624_53: apica yasmā “puggalo upalabbhatisaccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti ayaṃ puggalavādino paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:625_8: atthi na sabbo puggaloti ettakaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:625_9: tasmā naṃ sakavādī sampaṭicchāpetvā idāni naṃ evaṃ anuyuñjati.
atk-abh03a:625_10: Tayā hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya “puggalo atthī”ti laddhi gahitā,
atk-abh03a:625_20: Atha naṃ asampaṭicchanto na hevāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:628_2: Rūpadhātuyā hi puggalavādī rūpiṃ puggalaṃ paññapeti,
atk-abh03a:628_4: Tassa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sabbāpi pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:628_6: So hi rūpīti vutte rūpakāyasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:628_7: Kāmīti vutte vītarāgasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā natthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:628_8: Arūpīti vuttepi arūpakkhandhasabbhāvato ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:628_9: Dvīsupi nayesu sattoti puggalassa vevacanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:629_1: Idāni yasmā so “kāye kāyānupassī”ti āgataṭṭhāne añño kāyo añño puggaloti icchati,
atk-abh03a:629_2: tasmā taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ kāyoti vā sarīranti vātiādi sakavādīpucchā hoti.
atk-abh03a:629_3: Tattha kāyaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti kāyaṃ appetabbaṃ allīyāpetabbaṃ ekībhāvaṃ upanetabbaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ katvā pucchāmīti attho.
atk-abh03a:629_8: Same samabhāge tajjāteti samo samabhāgo tajjātiko.
atk-abh03a:629_12: Puggaloti vā jīvoti vāti pucchāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:629_13: Añño kāyoti puṭṭho pana kāyānupassanāya evaṃladdhikattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:629_14: Aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho pana āhacca bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ asakkonto avajānāti.
atk-abh03a:630_1: Paravādīpakkhe pana añño kāyo añño puggaloti puṭṭho sakavādī ṭhapanīyapañhattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:633_2: Tattha yasmā puggalavādī “sa sattakkhattuparamaṃ sandhāvitvāna puggalo”tiādīni suttāni nissāya puggalo sandhāvatīti laddhiṃ gahetvā voharati,
atk-abh03a:633_3: tasmāssa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sandhāvatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:633_11: So ca añño cāti puṭṭho ekaccasassatadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:633_12: Neva so na aññoti puṭṭho amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:633_13: Puna cattāropi pañhe ekato puṭṭho catunnampi diṭṭhīnaṃ bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna yānissa suttāni nissāya
atk-abh03a:633_14: laddhi uppannā tāni dassento tena hi puggalo sandhāvatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:634_2: kiṃ so asmiñca parasmiñca loke ekoyevā”ti adhippāyena svevāti niyametvā puṭṭho sassatabhayā paṭikkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:634_3: puna daḷhaṃ katvā tatheva puṭṭho yasmā so puggalova na añño bhāvo,
atk-abh03a:634_6: Sveva manussoti puṭṭho manussasseva devattābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:635_1: Puna puṭṭho “ahaṃ tena samayena sunetto nāma satthā ahosi”ntiādisuttavasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:635_2: Athassa sakavādī devamanussupapattīnaṃ nānattato vacanaṃ micchāti pakāsento manusso hutvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:636_1: Tattha hevaṃ maraṇaṃ na hehitīti evaṃ sante maraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:636_2: Ito paraṃ yakkho petoti attabhāvanānattavasena anuyoganānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:637_0: 82. Khattiyotiādīni jātivasena ceva aṅgavekallādivasena ca vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:638_1: Puna na vattabbanti paravādinā puṭṭho idhaṭṭhakassa upapattivasena paralokassa gamanābhāvato paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:638_2: sakavādissa puna sotāpannassa bhavantarepi sotāpannabhāvāvijahanato dutiyapaṭiññāpi tasseva.
atk-abh03a:639_0: 88. Puna devaloke upapannassa manussattābhāvadassanena anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:640_1: Tato paraṃ anañño avigatoti ettha anaññoti sabbākārena ekasadiso.
atk-abh03a:640_3: Na hevanti devaloke upapannassa manussabhāvābhāvato evamāha.
atk-abh03a:641_1: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā anuyutto “sveva puggalo sandhāvatī”ti laddhiyā anujānāti.
atk-abh03a:641_2: Hatthacchinnotiādi ākāravigamanadassanena avigato sandhāvatīti laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:642_1: Sarūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe iminā rūpakāyena saddhiṃ agamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:642_3: So hi tassa laddhiyā sarūpova gantvā mātukucchiṃ pavisati.
atk-abh03a:642_5: Taṃ jīvanti yena rūpasaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:642_6: kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:642_7: Paravādī idha sarīranikkhepā suttavirodhā ca paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:643_2: Taṃ jīvanti yena vedanādisaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:643_3: Kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:643_5: aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti etissā hi laddhiyā pañcapi khandhā sarīranti adhippetā.
atk-abh03a:644_1: Arūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe antarābhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:644_2: Dutiye arūpā rūpaṃ upapajjamānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Aññaṃ,
atk-abh03a:644_3: jīvanti yaṃ rūpasaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya arūpo sandhāvati,
atk-abh03a:645_2: Aññaṃ jīvanti yaṃ vedanādisaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya avedano aviññāṇo sandhāvati,
atk-abh03a:646_1: Rūpaṃ sandhāvatītiādīsu ye rūpādayo khandhe upādāya puggalaṃ paññapeti,
atk-abh03a:646_2: kiṃ te tasmiṃ puggale sandhāvante tampi rūpaṃ sandhāvatīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:646_3: Paravādī “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti sattasseva sandhāvanavacanato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:646_4: Puna puṭṭho yasmā rūpādidhamme vinā puggalo natthi,
atk-abh03a:646_5: tasmā tasmiṃ sandhāvante tenapi rūpena sandhāvitabbanti saññāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:647_1: Rūpaṃ na sandhāvatītiādīsu yasmā te rūpaṃ puggalo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:647_4: kiṃ te rūpaṃ na sandhāvatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:647_5: Itaro puggale sandhāvante na sakkā tassa upādānabhūtena rūpena sandhāvitunti saññāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:648_1: āyasmato matena rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyā viya,
atk-abh03a:648_4: rūpādīnaṃ sandhāvane asati tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu so tava puggalo bhijjati ce,
atk-abh03a:648_10: Athāpi tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu so puggalo na bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:652_4: So hi rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyāya viya,
atk-abh03a:652_6: rūpādīni upādāya puggalassa paññattiṃ paññāpanaṃ avabodhanaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:652_8: Puna yathā rukkhupādānā chāyā rukkho viya,
atk-abh03a:652_9: indhanupādāno ca aggi indhanaṃ viya aniccādidhammo,
atk-abh03a:652_10: evaṃ te rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādayo viya aniccoti imamatthaṃ puṭṭho attano laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:653_1: Nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlotiādīsu nīlarūpena saddhiṃ puggalassa ekattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:653_2: ekasarīre nīlādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:654_1: Kusalaṃ vedananti etthāpi vedanāya saddhiṃ ekattaṃ ekasantāne bahūnaṃ kusalavedanānaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:654_3: Saphalotiādīni puṭṭho tathārūpassa vohārassa abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:658_1: Rūpaṃ upādāya vedanaṃ upādāyāti ettha aññepi rūpamūlakā dukatikacatukkā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:658_2: Yasmā pana khandhe upādāya puggalassa paññatti,
atk-abh03a:658_3: tasmā dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi upādāya paññattiṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:658_4: Ekasantāne pana dvinnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:659_4: evaṃ tassa puggalassāpi āpajjatīti dassetuṃ yathā rukkhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:659_7: Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:660_2: Negaḷikoti tena bandhako yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti yasmā yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavā hoti,
atk-abh03a:661_1: Citte cittetiādīsu sarāgādicittavasena sarāgāditaṃ sandhāya cittānupassanāvasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:661_2: Jāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho puggalassa khaṇikabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:661_4: Puna na vattabbaṃ “kumārako”ti vā “kumārikā”ti vā puṭṭho lokavohārasamucchedabhayena vattabbanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:662_1: Idāni paravādī aññenākārena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo na vattabbaṃ puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:662_2: Tattha na vattabbanti kiṃ te iminā evaṃ bahunā upādāpaññattānuyogena,
atk-abh03a:662_5: Tato sakavādinā āmantāti vutte nanu yo passatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:662_13: nanu yo yaṃ rūpaṃ yena cakkhunā passati,
atk-abh03a:662_14: so taṃ rūpaṃ tena cakkhunā passanto puggaloti.
atk-abh03a:662_15: Sakavādī kiñcāpi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ cakkhumeva rūpaṃ passati,
atk-abh03a:662_19: passati arahā cakkhunā rūpa”ntiādisammutivasena pana āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:663_1: Tato chalavādaṃ nissāya paravādinā puggalassa vattabbatāya sādhitāya tameva vādaṃ parivattetvā puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:663_2: Tattha yo na passatīti andho asaññasatto arūpaṃ upapanno nirodhaṃ samāpanno,
atk-abh03a:663_3: anandhopi ca aññatra dassanasamayā na passati nāma.
atk-abh03a:664_1: Suttasaṃsandanāyaṃ dibbassa cakkhuno rūpagocarattā rūpaṃ passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a:664_3: Tatiyavāre “rūpaṃ disvā puggalaṃ vibhāvetī”ti laddhito ubho passatīti āha.
atk-abh03a:664_4: Yasmā pana passitabbaṃ nāma diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātanti catubbidhe rūpasaṅgahe rūpāyatanameva saṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:667_2: Tattha kamme sati niyamato tassa kārakenapi bhavitabbanti laddhiyā pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:667_7: Idāni yasmā paravādī puggalaṃ sandhāya kattāti pucchati,
atk-abh03a:668_1: Tassa kattā kāretāti ettha yadi yaṃ yaṃ upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:668_2: tassa tassa kattā puggalo te upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:668_3: kiṃ tassāpi kārako ca kārāpako ca añño puggalo upalabbhatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:668_5: Puna puṭṭho yasmā puggalaṃ mātāpitaro janenti nāmaṃ karonti posenti,
atk-abh03a:668_7: Ye ca pana taṃ kalyāṇamittā vā ācariyā vā tāni tāni vijjāṭṭhānasippāyatanāni sikkhāpenti,
atk-abh03a:668_8: te kārāpakā nāmāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:668_9: Purimakammameva tassa kattā ceva kārāpetā cāti adhippetaṃ.
atk-abh03a:669_2: yadi kammānaṃ kārakassa kattā tassāpi kattā tassāpi kattā attheva,
atk-abh03a:669_3: evaṃ sante purimena purimena avassaṃ pacchā pacchā puggalo kātabboti imināpi te kammānaṃ kārakena puggalena āyatiṃ añño puggalo kātabbo,
atk-abh03a:669_7: Paccayābhāvena paccayapaṭibaddhassa dukkhassa abhāvā yaṃ nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:669_9: Atha vā tassa tassevāti yadi kammaṃ kammamattaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:669_13: Evaṃ sante yā esā kammavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:669_16: Ito aparāsupi upalabbhati sāmaññena kārakapucchāsu puggalaṃyeva sandhāya “kattā kāretā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:670_1: Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ kattāti pañho “saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:671_1: Vipāko upalabbhatītiādi vipākapaṭisaṃvedīvasena puggalaṃ dassentassa laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:671_3: vipākapavattito aññassa vedakassa abhāvā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:672_1: Tassa paṭisaṃvedīti tassa vipākapaṭisaṃvedakassa paṭisaṃvedī yasmā pana paṭisaṃveditabbo nāma vipāko,
atk-abh03a:672_4: Puna puṭṭho yasmā puññavipāke ṭhitattā vipākapaṭisaṃvedī puttaṃ vā patiṃ vā mātā vā jāyā vā paricumbati parisajjati,
atk-abh03a:672_5: tasmā tathārūpaṃ paṭisaṃveditaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti paravādī.
atk-abh03a:673_0: Tassa tassevāti yadi vipāko vipākamattaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:673_2: tassāpi paṭisaṃvedī tassāpi paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi.
atk-abh03a:673_3: Evaṃ sante yā esā vipākavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:673_5: Ito paraṃ upalabbhatisāmaññena paṭisaṃvedīpucchāsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:674_1: Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti pañho “vedanavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:675_1: Dibbaṃ sukhantiādi kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ bhājetvā dassanavasena āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:676_0: 148. Mahāpathavīādīni hi ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedayitānaṃ uppatti appaṭisiddhā.
atk-abh03a:677_2: Tattha so karotīti yaṃ tvaṃ kattāti ca paṭisaṃvedīti ca vadesi,
atk-abh03a:678_1: Puna puṭṭho “idha nandati pecca nandatī”tiādisuttavasena paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:678_2: Athassa vacanokāsaṃ paṭibāhanto sakavādī sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti āha.
atk-abh03a:679_1: Tattha añño karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ aññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:679_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho “manussabhūto katvā devabhūto paṭisaṃvedetī”ti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:679_3: Evaṃvādino pana paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:680_1: So ca añño cāti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:680_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho purime dvepi naye ekato katvā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:680_3: Evaṃvādino pana sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:681_1: Neva so karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:681_2: Tato paravādī suttavirodhavaseneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho yasmā manusso devalokūpapattiyā kammaṃ katvā na manussabhūtova paṭisaṃvedeti,
atk-abh03a:681_5: tasmā kārakato vedako neva so hoti,
atk-abh03a:681_8: Evaṃvādino pana asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṃkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:681_9: Apica imasmiṃ vomissakanaye ādito paṭṭhāya imināpi nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:681_10: Yasmā hi ayaṃ puggalavādī kammānaṃ kārakañceva vedakañca icchati,
atk-abh03a:681_14: ubhohi vāpi na bhavitabbanti idamāpannaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:681_15: Evamāpannameva anuyogaṃ anuyuñjanto sakavādī “so karotī”tiādayo cattāropi vikappe āha.
atk-abh03a:682_0: Pariyosāne pana cattāropi pañhā ekato puṭṭhā.
atk-abh03a:682_1: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭijānanā ca sayaṃkatādidosappatti ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:682_2: Ito paraṃ “kalyāṇapāpakānī”ti avatvā heṭṭhā vuttanayā eva “kammaṃ atthī”tiādinā vikappena dassitā.
atk-abh03a:686_2: Tattha āmantāti sakavādinā paṭiññāte paravādī “bahiddhā anindriyabaddharūpe iddhividhādivisesādhigamo natthi,
atk-abh03a:686_4: tasmā iddhādinibbattakena puggalena bhavitabba”nti maññamāno nanu atthi koci iddhiṃ vikubbatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:689_8: “Arahā hutvā na arahā”ti panettha moghapañhattā na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:691_4: Puna puṭṭho puggalaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:692_0: 211. Añño puggalotipañhepi saṅkhatehi khandhehi aññattaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:693_0: 212. Khandhā saṅkhatātiādi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāni sarūpena dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:694_0: 213. Rūpaṃ saṅkhatantiādi khandhe vibhāgato dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:696_1: Puna na uppādo paññāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho “dukkhameva hi sambhoti,
atk-abh03a:696_2: dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti cā”tiādivacanato puggalassa uppādādayo nāma na yujjantīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:701_1: Vedanaṃ vediyamānapañhe vedanaṃ vediyamāno pariggahitavedano yogāvacarova pajānāti,
atk-abh03a:703_0: 226. Pārāyanagāthāya suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti sattasuññatavasena khandhalokaṃ olokehīti attho.
atk-abh03a:704_2: Paravādissa hi “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti gāthāya yo avekkhati,
atk-abh03a:704_7: Idaṃ pañcavokāravasena anujānitvā puna taṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:704_8: Vinā rūpenāti idaṃ catuvokāravasena anujānitvā puna aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:704_9: “Abbhantaragato”ti ca “bahiddhā nikkhamitvā”ti ca idaṃ “saha rūpena vinā rūpenā”ti heṭṭhā vuttassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:704_11: ito vā etto vā anikkhamitvā rūpaparicchedavaseneva ṭhito hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:705_3: Evaṃ sabbasuttānaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:706_1: Vuttaṃ bhagavatā sappikumbhotiādi “sabbāva desanā yathārutavaseneva atthato na gahetabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:706_2: Yathā hi suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā kato suvaṇṇavikāro kumbho suvaṇṇakumbhoti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:706_3: na evaṃ sappiṃ gahetvā kato sappissa vikāro sappikumbho nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:706_8: na evaṃ bhattaṃ vā yāgu vā atthi.
atk-abh03a:706_9: Kālaparicchedaṃ pana akatvā divase divase dassāmāti paññattavasena “niccabhattaṃ dhuvayāgū”ti vuccatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:707_0: “Atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādīsupi yathā rūpādayo dhammā paccattalakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena atthi,
atk-abh03a:707_3: Iti iminā lokavohārena lokasammutiyā lokaniruttiyā atthi puggaloti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:707_7: Rūpādidhammā pana vināpi lokasammutiṃ paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena paññāpanato atthīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:708_0: Buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā sammutikathā ca paramatthakathā ca.
atk-abh03a:708_2: brahmātiādikā sammutikathā nāma. Aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā, khandhā, dhātuyo,
atk-abh03a:709_1: brahmāti vāti vutte jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:709_2: tassa bhagavā āditova sattoti vā puggaloti vā posoti vā devoti vā brahmāti vā katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_3: Yo paramatthadesanāya aniccanti vā dukkhanti vātiādīsu aññataraṃ sutvāva jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:709_5: Tathā sammutikathāya bujjhanakasattassa na paṭhamaṃ paramatthakathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_6: Sammutikathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_7: Paramatthakathāya bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_8: Paramatthakathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_9: Pakatiyā pana paṭhamameva paramatthakathaṃ kathentassa desanā lūkhākārā hoti.
atk-abh03a:709_10: Tasmā buddhā paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ kathetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-abh03a:709_11: Te sammutikathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti.
atk-abh03a:709_12: Paramatthakathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti. Ayañhi –
atk-abh03a:715_1: dve bhagavato desanā paramatthadesanā ca khandhādivasena,
atk-abh03a:715_4: Tasmā “atthi puggalo”ti vacanamattato abhiniveso na kātabbo.
atk-abh03a:723_7: dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādīni hi suttāni nissāya sammitiyā vajjiputtakā
atk-abh03a:723_8: sabbatthivādino ekacce ca mahāsaṅghikā arahatopi parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:723_9: tasmā te vā hontu aññeyeva vā,
atk-abh03a:723_11: tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ parihāyati arahā arahattāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:723_12: Tatra parihāyatīti dve parihāniyo pattaparihāni ca appattaparihāni ca.
atk-abh03a:723_13: Tattha “dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyī”ti ayaṃ pattaparihāni nāma.
atk-abh03a:723_14: “Mā vo sāmaññatthikānaṃ sataṃ sāmaññattho parihāyī”ti ayaṃ appattaparihāni.
atk-abh03a:723_17: Sakasamaye pana imaṃ pattaparihāniṃ nāma lokiyasamāpattiyāva icchanti,
atk-abh03a:723_19: Parasamayepi naṃ sabbasāmaññaphalesu sabbabhavesu sabbakālesu sabbesañca puggalānaṃ na icchanti.
atk-abh03a:723_20: Taṃ pana tesaṃ laddhimattamevāti sabbaṃ laddhijālaṃ bhindituṃ puna sabbatthātiādinā nayena desanā vaḍḍhitā.
atk-abh03a:724_0: Tattha yasmā paravādī kamena parihāyitvā sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa arahato parihāniṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:724_2: Yasmā ca rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhitassa na icchati,
atk-abh03a:724_3: kammārāmatādīnaṃ pana parihāniyadhammānaṃ bhāvato kāmabhave ṭhitasseva icchati,
atk-abh03a:724_5: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho kāmabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:724_6: Sabbasmimpi hi kāmabhave parihānikarā kāmaguṇā atthi,
atk-abh03a:726_2: Dutiye ayonisomanasikaroto rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā sabbadā parihāyanato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:726_3: Tatiye parihānikaradhammasamāyoge sati muhuttameva parihāni nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:726_4: tato pubbe aparihīnassa pacchā parihīnassa ca parihāni nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:727_0: Sabbeva arahantoti pañhānaṃ paṭhamasmiṃ tikkhindriye sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:727_3: Tesañhi sabbesampi parihāni na hotīti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:728_6: “catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṃ karonto satasahassehi parihīne seṭṭhī seṭṭhittā parihīno hotī”ti.
atk-abh03a:728_7: Tato sakavādinā ekadesena parihāniṃ sandhāya “āmantā”ti vutte sabbasāpateyyā parihīno hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:728_8: Tathā aparihīnattā sakavādī na hevāti vatvā atha naṃ “evameva arahāpi parihāyati ca.
atk-abh03a:728_9: Na ca catūhi phalehī”ti uppannaladdhikaṃ dutiyaṃ bhabbapañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:728_10: Paravādī seṭṭhino abhabbatāya niyamaṃ apassanto paṭijānitvā arahato catūhi phalehi parihānibhabbataṃ
atk-abh03a:728_11: puṭṭho “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti vacanassa ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā laddhiyaṃ ṭhito sotāpattiphalato
atk-abh03a:731_2: Tattha yasmā keci arahatova parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:731_9: Sotāpannassa pana tepi sabbathāpi na icchantiyeva,
atk-abh03a:731_11: Tattha tesaṃ laddhivasena paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:731_12: “Parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā”ti hi pañhasmiṃ ye anāgāmino parihāniṃ na icchanti,
atk-abh03a:731_14: Ye pakatianāgāmino vā arahattā parihāyitvā ṭhitaanāgāmino vā parihāniṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:732_1: Yaṃ panettha “sotāpattiphalassa anantarā arahattaṃyeva sacchikarotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:732_2: taṃ parihīnassa puna vāyamato arahattappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:733_1: Tato paraṃ “parihāni nāmesā kilesappahānassa vā mandatāya bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:733_3: saccānaṃ vā adassanenā”ti evamādīnaṃ vasena anuyuñjituṃ kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:733_4: Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānādhippāyameva suttānaṃ panattho āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:734_1: Samayavimutto arahā arahattā parihāyatīti ettha mudindriyo samayavimutto,
atk-abh03a:734_4: vasippatto jhānalābhī ceva sabbe ca ariyapuggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:734_5: So pana taṃ attano laddhiṃ gahetvā samayavimutto parihāyati,
atk-abh03a:737_2: Tattha uccāvacāti uttamahīnabhedato uccā ca avacā ca.
atk-abh03a:737_11: Tāya cetāya uccāvacāya paṭipadāya na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yanti,
atk-abh03a:737_12: ekamaggena dvikkhattuṃ nibbānaṃ na gacchantīti attho. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:737_16: Nayidaṃ ekaguṇaṃ mutanti tañca idaṃ pāraṃ ekavāraṃyeva phusanārahaṃ na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:738_0: Atthi chinnassa chediyanti chinnassa kilesavaṭṭassa puna chinditabbaṃ kiñci atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:738_1: Itaro tikkhindriyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho mudindriyaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:738_3: Tattha oghapāsoti kilesogho ceva kilesapāso ca.
atk-abh03a:739_1: Katassa paṭicayoti bhāvitassa maggassa puna bhāvanā.
atk-abh03a:740_1: Parihānāya saṃvattantīti paravādinā ābhate sutte pañca dhammā appattaparihānāya ceva lokiyasamāpattiparihānāya ca saṃvattanti.
atk-abh03a:740_2: So pana pattassa arahattaphalassa parihānāya sallakkheti.
atk-abh03a:740_4: Itaropi asamayavimuttaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā itaraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:740_5: Kāmarāgavasena vā pavattamānaṃ taṃ paṭikkhipitvā itarathā pavattamānaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:740_6: Rāgādīnaṃ pana atthitaṃ puṭṭho paṭijānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:741_1: Kiṃ pariyuṭṭhitoti kena pariyuṭṭhito anubaddho ajjhotthato vā hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:741_4: Rāgo upacayaṃ gacchatīti bhāvanāya pahīnaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-abh03a:741_6: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pana dassanena pahīnattā upacayaṃ na icchati.
atk-abh03a:746_6: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti seyyathāpi sammitiyā,
atk-abh03a:746_7: te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. “Tīhi,
atk-abh03a:746_9: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
atk-abh03a:746_11: Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti idaṃ suttaṃ nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:746_12: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṃ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:746_13: Tattha hatthasaṃvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro.
atk-abh03a:746_16: Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā pabbajjāvasena anuyogo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:747_1: Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṃ maggapaṭilābhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:747_2: Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:747_4: Puna “atthi devesū”ti pañhepi maggabhāvanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:749_0: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā,
atk-abh03a:749_2: yattha atthīti evaṃ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṃ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:750_1: Suttānuyoge kuhiṃ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:751_2: yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a:753_1: Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti,
atk-abh03a:753_2: sotāpannādīnampi siyāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṃ saṃsandanapucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:753_5: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:753_6: So idha anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato “puna maggabhāvanaṃ vinā upapattivaseneva
atk-abh03a:753_8: Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṃ bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṃ idhāgamanaññeva natthi.
atk-abh03a:753_9: Iti so anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyaṃ puṭṭho paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:754_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe “anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva natthī”ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:754_2: na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:754_4: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-abh03a:755_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:755_1: Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato vaseneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:756_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṃ vaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:756_1: Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena tassa akuppapaṭivedhaṃ icchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:757_0: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṃ udāharaṇaṃ paravādissa, dutiyaṃ sakavādissa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:760_2: Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṃ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṃ
atk-abh03a:760_4: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:764_2: Tattha yesaṃ “jhānalābhī puthujjano saha saccābhisamayā anāgāmī nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:764_3: tassa puthujjanakāleyeva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīnā”ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:764_4: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ jahati puthujjanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:764_5: jhānavikkhambhitānaṃ pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ apassantassa paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:764_6: Yasmā pana tesaṃ jhānavikkhambhitānampi anāgāmimaggeneva accantaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:764_10: Tato paraṃ anāgāmimaggaṭṭhena saddhiṃ puthujjanasaṃsandanaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:765_1: Tato paraṃ anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:765_2: Arahatte saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho dassanamaggena uddhambhāgiyānaṃ pahānābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:766_0: Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ tayo maggeti puṭṭho tathārūpāya bhāvanāya abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:766_1: Puna puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:766_3: Katamena maggenāti puṭṭho anāgāmimaggenāti jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:766_4: Puna saṃyojanappahānaṃ puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ anāgāmimaggena tesaṃ kilesānaṃ appaheyyattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:766_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho paṭhamamaggasseva jhānānāgāmimaggabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:770_3: ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tiādivacanato “sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā khandhasabhāvaṃ na vijahanti,
atk-abh03a:770_16: vedanaṃ vā rūpena anānaṃ ekalakkhaṇameva katvā sabbamatthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:770_17: Yampi natthi tampatthīti yampi chaṭṭhakhandhādikaṃ sasavisāṇādikaṃ vā kiñci natthīti siddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:770_19: Sabbamatthīti yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti,
atk-abh03a:770_20: yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti hevamatthīti iminā idaṃ pucchati –
atk-abh03a:770_22: sā diṭṭhi ayāthāvakattā micchādiṭṭhīti evaṃ yā amhākaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-abh03a:770_23: sā diṭṭhi yāthāvakattā sammādiṭṭhīti evaṃ tava samaye atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:770_24: Itaro sabbesupi etesu nayesu vuttappakārāya atthitāya abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:770_25: Imesu pana sabbesupi nayesu “ājānāhi niggaha”nti ādiṃ katvā sabbo kathāmaggabhedo vitthārato veditabboti ayaṃ tāvettha vādayutti.
atk-abh03a:773_1: Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti atītānāgataṃ pahāya paccuppannarūpameva appiyaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ karitvā.
atk-abh03a:773_2: Rūpabhāvaṃ jahatītipañhe niruddhassāpi rūpassa rūpakkhandhasaṅgahitattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:773_3: Rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti paṭilomapañhepi rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitattāva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:773_4: Odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti ettha kiñcāpi na sabbaṃ vatthaṃ odātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:773_5: iminā pana vatthanti avatvā “odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā”ti vutte sakavādinā ekatthatā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:773_6: Odātabhāvaṃ jahatīti pañhe vaṇṇavigamaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:773_7: Vatthabhāvaṃ jahatīti ettha pana paññattiyā avigatattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:774_1: Atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho “yadi jaheyya,
atk-abh03a:774_2: anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā siyā”ti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:774_3: Anāgataṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho pana “yadi na jaheyya,
atk-abh03a:775_1: Evaṃ suddhikanayaṃ vatvā puna khandhavasena dassetuṃ atītaṃ rūpantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:777_2: Tattha hañci atītaṃ nvatthīti yadi atītaṃ no atthīti attho.
atk-abh03a:777_3: Atītaṃ atthīti micchāti atītañca taṃ atthi cāti micchā eva.
atk-abh03a:777_4: Taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti puṭṭho anāgatakkhaṇeyevassa paccuppannatāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya kālanānattena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:778_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ uppādato pubbe anāgataṃ ahosi,
atk-abh03a:778_2: Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī”ti vadatā taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ
atk-abh03a:778_3: paccuppannanti laddhivasena “anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:778_5: Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvato na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:779_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yasmā taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:779_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:779_4: yaṃ anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ na hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:779_5: kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā na hotī”tiadhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:779_8: eva anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti nāma tāva hotu,
atk-abh03a:779_9: puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:779_10: Taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti pañhepi paccuppannakkhaṇeyevassa atītatāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya kālanānattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:780_0: Dutiyapañhe puṭṭho yaṃ atītabhāvato pubbe paccuppannaṃ ahosi,
atk-abh03a:780_2: Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hotī”ti vadatā “taññeva paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:780_3: taṃ atīta”nti laddhivasena “paccuppannaṃ vā atītaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:780_5: Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvato na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:781_0: Dutiyapañhe yasmā taṃ paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:781_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taññeva paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:781_4: yaṃ paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:781_5: kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā na hotī”ti adhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:781_7: taṃ natthitāya eva paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti nāma tāva hotu.
atk-abh03a:781_8: Puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:781_9: Ubhayaṃ ekato katvā āgate tatiyapañhepi imināvupāyena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh03a:782_3: paccuppannassa ca anāgate vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:782_7: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti? Itaro –
atk-abh03a:782_8: “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiye pañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:782_9: Atha naṃ sakavādī “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti
atk-abh03a:782_10: paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:782_12: nanu “tayā taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatassa hotibhāvo paccuppannassa ca hutvābhāvo paṭikkhittoti.
atk-abh03a:783_0: Dutiyapañhe ca taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti paṭiññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:783_1: Evaṃ sante anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:783_2: Paccuppannampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:783_4: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:783_5: Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:784_0: Dutiyavārepi yadi taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ,
atk-abh03a:784_2: atītassa ca paccuppanne vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:784_6: “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti?
atk-abh03a:784_7: Itaro taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītantipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:784_8: Atha naṃ sakavādī “taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti

atk-abh03a:874_21: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṃ,
atk-abh03a:875_0: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:876_1: Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti,
atk-abh03a:876_2: tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṃ pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-abh03a:876_4: Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ channaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṃ aññataranti na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:876_5: Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti yaṃ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṃ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṃ paṭicca vattabbaṃ siyā nānākaraṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:876_7: Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:877_1: Idāni yaṃ sakavādinā “āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:877_2: tena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ pucchituṃ puna āsavānaṃ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva honti.
atk-abh03a:877_3: Tesaṃ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṃ ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇanti anuññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:877_5: Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a:877_8: Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:877_12: Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:880_3: atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi,
atk-abh03a:880_8: maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:881_3: Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a:881_4: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṃ vivittaṃ nissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:881_7: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:881_10: suññatamanasikāro nibbānārammaṇo”ti imaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā “dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotī”ti puṭṭho lesokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:881_14: Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṃ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a:881_15: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:881_16: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:882_1: Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca,
atk-abh03a:882_2: kiṃ te evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:882_3: Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva.
atk-abh03a:882_5: Pāḷiyaṃ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:882_6: Tato paraṃ sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesañāṇānaṃ anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti.
atk-abh03a:882_10: Pāḷiyaṃ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva dassetvā satta ñāṇāni saṅkhittānīti.
atk-abh03a:885_3: Yathā pana malīnaṃ vatthaṃ dhoviyamānaṃ malā vimuccati,
atk-abh03a:885_4: evaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:885_8: Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe cittaṃ vimuccati nāma.
atk-abh03a:885_9: Tadā ca evarūpaṃ cittaṃ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:886_0: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti,
atk-abh03a:889_3: maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:889_4: te sandhāya vimuttaṃ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:890_3: ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṃ hoti kiṃ evaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:890_7: Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā honti,
atk-abh03a:890_8: tathā idampi ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttanti āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:890_9: Tato paravādī kaṭādīnaṃ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:890_11: Na hi taṃ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:890_13: Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:890_14: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:890_15: evaṃ sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti,
atk-abh03a:890_17: ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṃ ekadesaṃ sotāpannotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:891_0: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṃ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca,
atk-abh03a:891_1: ekasmiṃ khaṇe vimuttaṃ ekasmiṃ vimuccamānaṃ āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:892_4: Tasmā yaṃ tassa yogino evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati,
atk-abh03a:892_8: yadi te vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṃ vimuccamānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:893_1: kiṃ evaṃ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi atthī”ti codanatthaṃ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:893_2: Paravādināpi tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ apassantena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:893_4: tatiyā natthī”ti anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:893_7: rāgasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ rattaṃ vippayuttaṃ arattanti dveva koṭiyo,
atk-abh03a:893_11: Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva koṭiyo dassetuṃ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:893_17: Vimuccamānaṃ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a:896_2: Tattha yesaṃ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:896_5: maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:896_6: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā,
atk-abh03a:896_8: tasmā aṭṭhamako puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:896_10: Anusayapañhe pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:898_1: Maggo bhāvitoti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe bhāveti,
atk-abh03a:901_2: Tattha yesaṃ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma,
atk-abh03a:901_5: te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:901_7: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṃ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:901_12: tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṃ atthi mano atthi manindriyantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:904_2: Tattha yesaṃ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṃ maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:905_1: dibbacakkhu maṃsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṃ mattameva taṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:906_4: na tādisaṃ itarassāti evametesaṃ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a:907_0: Upādiṇṇaṃ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṃ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṃsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:907_5: maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṃ nissāya maṃsacakkhupaccayā dibbacakkhu uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:907_6: tañca rūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādoti icchati,
atk-abh03a:907_8: Kāmāvacaraṃ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati,
atk-abh03a:907_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā rūpāvacaraṃ nāma jātanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:908_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṃ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:908_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:909_3: Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:909_5: Puna puṭṭho maṃsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbacakkhu hotīti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:912_2: Tattha ekaṃyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṃ atthitāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:912_3: Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:915_3: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:915_6: Puna yathākammūpagatañca manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:915_8: Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā dvinnaṃ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:916_1: Āyasmā sāriputto yathākammūpagataṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātīti idaṃ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti,
atk-abh03a:916_3: tasmā taṃ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:916_4: Teneva kāraṇena “atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:916_7: Idānissa vikkhepaṃ karonto sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:916_8: Imañhi gāthaṃ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva abhāvena āha,
atk-abh03a:916_11: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi,
atk-abh03a:916_13: Tena vuttaṃ “tena hi na vattabbaṃ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a:919_2: Tattha yesaṃ tāvatiṃse deve upādāya tatuttari devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti,
atk-abh03a:919_6: Tato yasmā saṃvaro nāma saṃvaritabbe asaṃvare sati hoti,
atk-abh03a:920_0: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṃvare sati asaṃvarassa asaṃvare ca sati saṃvarassa pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:921_1: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:922_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṃvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṃvarābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:922_5: Evaṃ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:925_2: Tattha yesaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:925_3: “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:925_7: Tato naṃ sakavādī “kiṃ te taṃ ṭhānaṃ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṃ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:925_8: Taṃ sabbaṃ tato parañca pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:928_2: Tattha yesaṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti vacanato na vattabbaṃ “tasmiṃ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:933_1: Idāni gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:933_2: Tattha yesaṃ yasakulaputtādīnaṃ gihibyañjane ṭhitānaṃ arahattappattiṃ disvā “gihi assa arahā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:933_7: Paravādī pana adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:937_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”’ti. ;
atk-abh03a:938_0: Imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ atthi arahatotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:941_2: Tattha yesaṃ “opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī”tivacanāni ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:941_3: “yesaṃ vā upahaccaparinibbāyī”ti padaṃ parivattitvā “upapajjaparinibbāyī”ti pariyāpuṇantānaṃ saha upapattiyā arahā hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:941_10: Tasmāssa imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ saha upapattiyā sotāpannotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:942_0: 389. Sāriputtotiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:946_8: kiṃ tassa teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṃ maggo phalantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:946_9: Cakkhu anāsavanti puṭṭho tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:947_1: Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:947_2: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:947_4: Sakavādī pana taññevāti anuññātattā “maggo anāsavo hutvā”tiādīhi codeti.
atk-abh03a:950_2: Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca.
atk-abh03a:950_5: Yesaṃ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:950_7: tesaṃ pattidhammo nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:950_9: Athassa “yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi phalehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:950_10: evaṃ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo,
atk-abh03a:950_11: tehi te arahato samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī”ti codanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phassehītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:950_12: Taṃ sabbaṃ paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:951_1: Sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti na paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dutiyajjhānalābhī;
atk-abh03a:952_1: Tehi ca aparihīnoti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā parihāyanti,
atk-abh03a:952_5: te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti,
atk-abh03a:952_7: Svāyamattho parato “arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā”tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh03a:955_1: Arahā chahi upekkhāhīti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:955_2: Arahā hi chasu dvāresu upekkhānaṃ uppattibhabbatāya tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:958_3: Tasmā yesaṃ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto,
atk-abh03a:958_7: te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:959_0: Atītāyāti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:959_3: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ tena tāya karaṇīyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:959_5: Lesokāsaṃ pana adatvā dukkhaṃ parijānātītiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:960_0: Anāgatapañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:960_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṃ maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:960_2: Bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotīti puṭṭho tasmiṃ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:961_1: Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:961_2: Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṃ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:961_3: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:961_4: Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā satataṃ samitanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:962_2: Nanu bodhipaṭilābhāti pañhe pana yasmiṃ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṃ maggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:962_4: Tassa adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:962_5: Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddhoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:962_9: Itaro “bodhipaṭilābho nāma bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva.
atk-abh03a:962_10: Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe ñāṇa”nti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:962_11: Tato sakavādinā bodhipaṭilābhā bodhīti puṭṭho vacanokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a:966_2: Tattha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī”ti imaṃ suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato bodhisattova hotīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:967_0: Cakkavattisattoti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi,
atk-abh03a:968_2: So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti,
atk-abh03a:971_2: Tattha yesaṃ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “bodhisatto kassapabhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:971_6: Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa nāmaṃ,
atk-abh03a:971_7: bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṃ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:971_11: Kevalañhi naṃ buddhā attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā –
atk-abh03a:971_18: Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:972_3: na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:973_0: Sāvako jātiṃ vītivattoti yāya jātiyā sāvako,
atk-abh03a:973_1: taṃ vītivatto aññasmiṃ bhave asāvako hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:976_2: Tattha yesaṃ “catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:976_6: Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi samannāgatakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:979_6: Puna sabbe saṃyojanāti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:979_7: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:984_9: Evaṃ catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti.
atk-abh03a:984_11: Tasmā “idaṃ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti avatvā aviseseneva “vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:984_15: Puna yaṃkiñcīti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:984_16: Paṭipannassāti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:984_17: Yasmā pana taṃ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:984_18: tasmā vimuttaṃ nāma na hotīti codanatthaṃ puna sakavādī sotāpannassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:987_2: Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā “uḷāro bhagavā”tiādinā nayena asekhe jānanti,
atk-abh03a:987_7: Jānāti passatīti idaṃ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:987_8: Gotrabhunotiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:987_9: Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho “uḷāro bhagavā”ti jānātīti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṃ asekhañāṇanti icchati,
atk-abh03a:987_11: Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:990_3: tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ viparītañāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:990_10: Tato sakavādī “lakkhaṇapathavīpi sasambhārapathavīpi nimittapathavīpi pathavīdevatāpi sabbā pathavīyeva,
atk-abh03a:990_11: tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ na hoti.
atk-abh03a:990_13: Kiṃ te idaṃ etesu aññatara”nti codetuṃ anicce niccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:991_3: Sabbeva pathavīti sabbaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ lakkhaṇapathavīyeva hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:991_6: atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:991_9: atthi ca koci taṃ pathaviṃ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:991_12: taṃ tathā samāpajjantassa ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:991_14: tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṃ maggañāṇampi te viparītaṃ hotū”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:994_3: taṃ “bhabbo esa dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti,
atk-abh03a:994_4: tasmā “aniyatassa puthujjanasseva sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:994_9: Yaṃ panassa ñāṇaṃ disvā bhagavā “bhabbo aya”nti jānāti,
atk-abh03a:995_0: Athassa sakavādī ayuttavāditaṃ dīpetuṃ niyatassāti viparītānuyogamāha.
atk-abh03a:995_1: Tattha paṭhamapañhe maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:995_3: Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:995_4: Puna paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:995_5: Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:995_9: Puna paṭhamapañhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:995_11: Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṃ katvā taṃmūlakā atthi niyāmotiādayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:995_12: Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti,
atk-abh03a:995_13: tasmā taṃ sandhāya atthi niyāmoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:995_22: Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:998_3: sabbaṃ lokuttaramevā”ti gahetvā “sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:998_9: Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:998_15: kiṃ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā”ti pucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:998_16: Tena hi sabbaṃ ñāṇanti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā,
atk-abh03a:998_17: tasmā sabbanti vacanaṃ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
atk-abh03a:1001_3: Ye pana evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi “saccārammaṇamevā”ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a:1001_5: te ayuttavādinoti tesaṃ vādavisodhanatthaṃ ayaṃ kathā āraddhā.
atk-abh03a:1001_14: tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni kareyyā”ti codetuṃ tena ñāṇenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1004_2: Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva gahetvā “taṃ ñāṇaṃ cittārammaṇamevā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1004_8: tasmā na vattabbaṃ taṃ cittārammaṇaññevā”ti codanatthaṃ nanu atthi kocītiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1004_11: Puna phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ na vattabbanti puṭṭho phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṃ hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1004_12: Kiṃ panetaṃ phassapariyāye ñāṇanti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1004_15: tadeva dassetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ nanu cetopariyāye ñāṇantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1004_16: Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1007_7: Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṃ icchanti,
atk-abh03a:1007_12: kiṃ tena anantaraṃ anāgataṃ mūlādivasena jānātī”ti codetuṃ anāgataṃ mūlatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1007_16: Tato ca taṃ hinoti pavattayatīti hetu.
atk-abh03a:1007_27: Yasmā pana anantaraṃ cittaṃ etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-abh03a:1007_29: Anāgataṃ hetupaccayatanti yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā,
atk-abh03a:1007_34: Gotrabhunotiādi yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1007_36: Pāṭaliputtassāti suttaṃ yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1007_38: Yasmā panetaṃ na sabbasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇassa sādhakaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1010_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṃ aniccato diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti vacanaṃ nissāya
atk-abh03a:1010_7: Atha naṃ “yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1010_9: Evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekato abhāvā teneva ñāṇena taṃ jānitabbaṃ hotī”ti codanatthaṃ tenāti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1010_10: Tattha paṭhamapañhe teneva taṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1010_12: Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṃ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ passatīti adhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:1010_13: Tena ñāṇena taṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1010_14: Tena phassena taṃ phassantiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1010_15: Yaṃ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ nanu sabbasaṅkhāretiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1010_16: Tattha nayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1010_18: Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1013_2: Tattha “buddhāpi sattānaṃ ariyaphalappattiyā dhammaṃ desenti sāvakāpi,
atk-abh03a:1013_3: iti iminā sāmaññena buddhānaṃ viya sāvakānampi tena tena sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1013_7: Atha naṃ “yadi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1013_8: yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṃ ekabījī,
atk-abh03a:1013_11: kiṃ te evaṃ sāvakopī”ti codetuṃ sāvako phalassa kataṃ paññapetīti āha.
atk-abh03a:1014_0: Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattītiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1014_3: idaṃ opara”nti evaṃ phalānaṃ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:1014_5: tāsaṃ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṃ tesaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena taṃ taṃ phalaṃ jānanti,
atk-abh03a:1014_6: kiṃ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1015_0: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattītiādīnipi “yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1015_3: sakkoti so etā paññattiyo attano balena jānituṃ vā paññapetuṃ vā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1015_4: Sāvako jinotiādi “yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1015_5: evaṃ sante sveva jino”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1015_7: Aññāṇīti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto,
atk-abh03a:1015_8: na panassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi.
atk-abh03a:1021_2: Tattha niyāmoti “bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti vacanato ariyamaggo vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1021_3: Yasmā pana tasmiṃ uppajjitvā niruddhepi puggalo aniyato nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1021_4: tasmā “so niyāmo niccaṭṭhena asaṅkhato”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1022_2: Niyāmo saṅkhatotipañhe niruddhepi magge niyāmassa atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1022_3: Sotāpattiniyāmotiādipañhesupi anulomato ca paṭilomato ca imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1022_4: Pañca asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho pañcannaṃ asaṅkhatānaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1022_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho catunnaṃ sammattaniyāmānaṃ niyāmavacanato nibbānassa ca asaṅkhatabhāvato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1025_2: Tattha yesaṃ nidānavagge “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā”tiādivacanato
atk-abh03a:1026_1: Avijjā asaṅkhatāti ādayo pañhā avijjādīnaṃyeva paṭiccasamuppādabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttā.
atk-abh03a:1026_2: Yena panatthena tattha ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1027_1: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti yā tattha dhammaṭṭhitatātiādi yena suttena laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā,
atk-abh03a:1027_4: yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā “ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”ti vuttā na sā aññatra avijjādīhi visuṃ ekā atthi.
atk-abh03a:1027_6: Uppannepi hi tathāgate anuppannepi avijjāto saṅkhārā sambhavanti,
atk-abh03a:1027_8: tasmā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti yā etasmiṃ pade saṅkhāradhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
atk-abh03a:1027_9: Tesaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭheneva niyāmatāti dhammaniyāmatāti avijjā vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1027_12: Paravādī laddhivasena paṭijānitvā puna dve asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1027_14: Heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pana tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1030_4: tathāni avitathānī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “cattāri saccāni niccāni asaṅkhatānī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1030_11: Nirodhe vatthusaccaṃ nāma natthi asaṅkhatameva tanti.
atk-abh03a:1030_18: na ca bādhanalakkhaṇādīhi aññāni dukkhādīni nāma atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1031_0: Dukkhasaccanti pañhe laddhivasena lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1031_2: Ito paraṃ suddhikapañhā ca saṃsandanapañhā ca sabbe pāḷianusāreneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1031_3: Avasāne laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āhaṭasuttaṃ atthassa micchā gahitattā anāhaṭasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1034_2: Tattha yesaṃ “cattāro āruppā āneñjā”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “sabbepi te dhammā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1037_6: Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana abhāvena na vattabbā “saṅkhatāti vā asaṅkhatā”ti vā.
atk-abh03a:1037_14: na tathā taṃ keci uppādenti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1037_18: Tena hīti yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1037_20: Idaṃ pana asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hotīti vuttampi avuttasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1040_9: Yesaṃ pana “duvidhopi yasmā saṅkhato na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1043_2: Tattha yesaṃ tāḷacchiddādīsu ñāṇappavattiṃ nissāya “sabbopi ajaṭākāso sanidassano”ti laddhi,
