atk-abh03a:1043_4: te sandhāya ākāso sanidassanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1043_8: Cakkhuñca paṭiccātipañhesu evarūpassa suttassa abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā tulantarikādīnaṃ upaladdhiṃ nissāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1043_9: Dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ antaranti ettha rukkharūpaṃ cakkhunā disvā antare rūpābhāvato ākāsanti manodvāraviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1046_2: Tattha yesaṃ pāsāṇaudakajālarukkhacalanānañceva pañcindriyapatiṭṭhokāsānañca vaṇṇāyatanaṃ kāyaviññattikāle
atk-abh03a:1046_7: Sesaṃ sabbattha pāḷianusārena ceva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1046_8: Pathavīdhātu sanidassanāti ādiṃ katvā kāyakammaṃ sanidassananti pariyosānakathā niṭṭhitā.
atk-abh03a:1050_2: Tattha yasmā dāmādīhi balibaddādayo viya keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1050_3: tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā,
atk-abh03a:1050_4: evaṃ sante ekavidhena rūpasaṅgahotiādi niratthaka”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1050_6: te sandhāya aññenatthena saṅgahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1050_9: taṃ dassetuṃ nanu atthi keci dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1050_11: Yā panesā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ yathā dāmena vātiādikā upamā āhaṭā,
atk-abh03a:1050_12: sakavādinā taṃ anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā “hañci dāmena vā”ti tassa laddhi bhinnāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1050_14: yadi te dāmādīhi balibaddādayo saṅgahitā nāma,
atk-abh03a:1050_15: atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:1053_2: Tattha yasmā tilamhi telaṃ viya na vedanādayo saññādīsu anupaviṭṭhā,
atk-abh03a:1053_3: tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:1053_4: evaṃ sante ñāṇasampayuttantiādi niratthakaṃ hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1053_6: te sandhāya aññenevatthena sampayuttataṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1053_9: Yo panesa paravādinā “yathā tilamhi tela”ntiādiko upamāpañho āhaṭo,
atk-abh03a:1053_10: so yasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ viya tilatelānaṃ lakkhaṇato nānattavavatthānaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:1053_12: teneva tilaṃ nibbattetvā gahite purimasaṇṭhānena tilo nāma na paññāyati,
atk-abh03a:1056_4: iti natthi cetasiko dhammo”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1056_9: Phassikāti tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassantassa pucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1056_12: evaṃ sopi phassanissitattā phassikoti vutte doso natthīti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1059_5: “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dāna”nti āgataṭṭhāne cāgacetanā dānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1059_11: Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravādisaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyacetanaṃ dāti khaṇḍeti lunāti vāti dānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1059_13: Evametaṃ tividhampi atthato cetasiko ceva dhammo deyyadhammo cāti duvidhaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1059_19: Atha naṃ deyyadhammavasena codetuṃ labbhāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1059_20: annādīni viya so na sakkā dātunti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1059_21: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭhe “abhayaṃ detī”ti suttavasena paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:1059_22: Phassapañhādīsu pana phassaṃ detītiādivohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.
atk-abh03a:1060_2: Na hi acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ deti,
atk-abh03a:1060_6: hitacittena aniṭṭhaṃ akantaṃ bhesajjaṃ dentassa nimbabījādīhi viya nimbādayo aniṭṭhameva phalaṃ nibbatteyya.
atk-abh03a:1060_8: tasmā aniṭṭhepi deyyadhamme dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalameva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1061_0: Evaṃ paravādinā cetasikadhammassa dānabhāve patiṭṭhāpite sakavādī itarena pariyāyena deyyadhammassa dānabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1061_2: Paravādī pana cīvarādīnaṃ iṭṭhavipākataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1061_6: Tasmā tena hi na vattabbanti iṭṭhaphalabhāveneva na vattabbatā yujjati.
atk-abh03a:1064_4: bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamāno”ti ca evamādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā yesaṃ paribhogamayaṃ nāma puññaṃ atthī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1064_8: Atha naṃ “puññaṃ nāma phassādayo kusalā dhammā,
atk-abh03a:1064_10: tasmā phassādīhi te vaḍḍhitabba”nti codetuṃ paribhogamayo phassotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1064_11: Taṃ sabbaṃ itarena tesaṃ avaḍḍhanato paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1064_12: Latāviyātiādīni “kiriyāya vā bhāvanāya vā vināpi yathā latādīni sayameva vaḍḍhanti,
atk-abh03a:1064_13: kiṃ te evaṃ vaḍḍhantī”ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1064_14: Tathā panassa avaḍḍhanato na hevāti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1065_1: Na samannāharatīti pañhe paṭiggāhakānaṃ paribhogena purimacetanā vaḍḍhati,
atk-abh03a:1065_2: evaṃ taṃ hoti puññanti laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1065_3: Tato anāvaṭṭentassātiādīhi puṭṭho dāyakassa cāgacetanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1065_4: Tattha anāvaṭṭentassāti dānacetanāya purecārikena āvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa aparivaṭṭentassa.
atk-abh03a:1065_7: Āvajjanañhi bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā attano gatamagge uppajjamānaṃ dānacetanaṃ samannāharati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1065_8: Evaṃkiccena iminā cittena asamannāharantassa puññaṃ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1065_10: Āvajjanena hi tadanantaraṃ uppajjamānaṃ manaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1065_18: ābhogassa vā anantaraṃ taṃ puññaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1066_1: Dvinnaṃ phassānantiādīsupi ekakkhaṇe dāyakassa dvinnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1066_2: dāyakassa ca paribhuñjantassa cāti ubhinnaṃ phassādayo sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1066_3: Apicassa pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1066_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī pariyāyassa dvāraṃpidahitvā ujuvipaccanīkavasena codetuṃ kusalādipañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1066_6: Tatrāpi kusalākusalānaṃ ekassekakkhaṇe sampayogābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1066_7: Paribhogamayaṃ pana cittavippayuttaṃ uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1067_1: Suttasādhane ārāmaropakādīnaṃ anussaraṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādivasena antarantarā uppajjamānaṃ puññaṃ sandhāya sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1067_2: Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisandoti idaṃ appamāṇavihārino dinnapaccayattā ca “evarūpo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”ti anumodanavasena ca vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1067_4: Yasmā pana paṭiggāhakena paṭiggahetvā aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññaṃ hotiyeva,
atk-abh03a:1070_3: petā kālaṅkatā tahi”nti vacanaṃ nissāya “yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ teneva yāpentī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1070_5: te sandhāya ito dinnenāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1070_8: Añño aññassa kārakoti aññassa vipākadāyakānaṃ kammānaṃ añño kārako,
atk-abh03a:1070_9: na attanāva attano kammaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1070_10: Evaṃ puṭṭho pana itaro suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1070_11: Dānaṃ dentanti dānaṃ dadamānaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:1070_12: Tattha yasmā attano anumoditattā ca tesaṃ tattha bhogā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1070_13: tasmāssa iminā kāraṇena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassāpi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1070_14: Na hi te ito dinneneva vatthunā yāpenti.
atk-abh03a:1073_3: ādhipaccasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha issarānaṃ bhāvo issariyaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:1073_11: “Phasso hotī”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhesu vipākesu phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo hoti.
atk-abh03a:1073_12: So ca saññādayo ca sukhavedanādīhi sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:1074_1: Kammavipāko paresaṃ sādhāraṇoti pañhe phassādayo sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1074_2: kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpañca pathavīādīnaṃyeva ca sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1074_4: Sabbe sattā pathaviṃ paribhuñjantīti pañhe pathaviṃ anissite sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1074_6: Pathaviṃ aparibhuñjitvā parinibbāyantīti pañhe āruppe parinibbāyantānaṃ vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1074_9: Sakasamaye pana katokāsassa kammassa uppannaṃ vipākaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:1074_10: Tesañca laddhiyā pathavī sādhāraṇavipākattā uppannavipākoyeva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1074_11: Taṃ vipākabhāvena ṭhitaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ na yujjatīti codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:1074_13: Cakkavattisattassa kammavipākanti pañhe asādhāraṇaṃ phassādiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1074_15: Pathavīsamuddasūriyacandimādayo hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇakammavipākoti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1075_2: Ādhipaccaṃ nāma sesajane attano vase vattetvā tehi garukātabbaṭṭhena adhipatibhāvo.
atk-abh03a:1075_3: Tattha kammaṃ paṭilābhavasena taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1078_2: Tattha yesaṃ “atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha dubbaṇṇatā nāma jarā.
atk-abh03a:1079_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti pañhe jarāmaraṇena nāma aniṭṭhavipākena bhavitabbanti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1079_2: Teneva kāraṇena kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa kusalavipākataṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1080_2: Abyākatānaṃ avipākānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthi,
atk-abh03a:1081_2: Appāyukatā nāma āyuno ciraṃ pavattituṃ asamatthatā.
atk-abh03a:1081_3: Tattha akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassa dubbaṇṇarūpassa kammapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1081_5: Utusamuṭṭhānādino pana taṃpaṭilābhavasena āyuno ca upacchedakavasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:1084_5: te sandhāya natthi ariyadhammavipākoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1085_0: Sotāpattiphalaṃ na vipākotiādīsu sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ apacayagāmitaṃ sandhāya ariyaphalānaṃ navipākabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-abh03a:1085_2: So hi ācayagāmittikassa evaṃ atthaṃ dhāreti –
atk-abh03a:1085_6: Tasmā evaṃ paṭijānāti ca paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1086_1: Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ savipākaṃ ācayagāmītiādikā pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1086_3: Lokiyañhi kusalaṃ vipākacutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca ācinantaṃ gacchatīti ācayagāmi.
atk-abh03a:1086_4: Lokuttarakusalaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca apacinantaṃ gacchatīti apacayagāmi.
atk-abh03a:1086_7: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyettha sakavādino paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1089_2: Tattha yasmā vipāko vipākassa aññamaññādipaccayavasena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1089_7: Tassa vipākoti tassa vipākadhammadhammassa vipākassa yo vipāko,
atk-abh03a:1089_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tappaccayāpi aññassa vipākassa uppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1089_11: Evaṃ sante panassa kusalākusalassa viya tassāpi vipākassa vipāko,
atk-abh03a:1089_12: tassāpi vipākoti vaṭṭānupacchedo āpajjatīti puṭṭho samayavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1090_0: Vipākoti vātiādimhi vacanasādhane pana yadi vipākassa vipākadhammadhammena ekatthatā bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1090_2: Vipāko ca vipākadhammadhammo cāti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo –
atk-abh03a:1090_3: so hi catūsu vipākakkhandhesu ekekaṃ aññamaññapaccayādīsu paccayaṭṭhena vipākadhammadhammataṃ paccayuppannaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1090_4: ca vipākaṃ maññamāno “vipāko vipākadhammadhammo”ti puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1090_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī “yasmā tayā ekakkhaṇe catūsu khandhesu vipāko vipākadhammadhammopi anuññāto,
atk-abh03a:1090_6: tasmā tesaṃ sahagatādibhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ evamāha.
atk-abh03a:1090_8: Taññeva akusalanti yadi te vipāko vipākadhammadhammo,
atk-abh03a:1096_2: Tattha asurakāyena saddhiṃ chagatiyoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1096_8: gatiyo”ti lomahaṃsanapariyāye paricchinnānaṃ gatīnaṃ vasena codetuṃ nanu pañca gatiyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1096_10: Kasmā pana sakavādī cha gatiyo na sampaṭicchati,
atk-abh03a:1096_11: nanu “catūhāpāyehi ca vippamutto”ti ettha asurakāyopi gahitoti.
atk-abh03a:1096_17: asurakāyoti visuṃ ekā gati nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1097_0: Idāni etameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ nanu kālakañcikātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1097_1: Tattha samānavaṇṇāti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā bībhacchā virūpā duddassikā.
atk-abh03a:1097_6: Sukkapakkhe samānavaṇṇāti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā abhirūpā pāsādikā dassanīyā pabhāsampannā.
atk-abh03a:1097_10: Nanu atthi asurakāyoti idaṃ asurakāyasseva sādhakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1097_11: Tassa pana visuṃ gatiparicchedābhāvena na gatisādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1100_2: Tattha yesaṃ “antarā parinibbāyī”ti suttapadaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “antarābhavo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1100_4: iddhimā viya aniddhimā mātāpitisamāgamañceva utusamayañca olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vā atirekasattāhaṃ vā tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1100_8: Atha naṃ ye ca bhagavatā tayo bhavā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1100_11: yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1100_12: tena kāmabhavādīnaṃyeva aññatarena bhavitabbaṃ pañcavokārabhavādinā viya,
atk-abh03a:1100_17: Kāmabhavassa cātiādi yadi antarābhavo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1100_18: imesaṃ bhavānaṃ antarā dvinnaṃ sīmānaṃ sīmantarikā viya bhaveyyāti codetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1100_19: Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto sabbapañhe paṭikkhipati kevalaṃ laddhiyā,
atk-abh03a:1100_21: Teneva naṃ sakavādī ‘no vata re’ti paṭisedheti.
atk-abh03a:1101_1: Pañcamī sā yonītiādīnipi yathāparicchinnayoniādīsu so samodhānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1101_2: atha tena tato tato atirekena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:1101_3: Antarābhavūpagaṃ kammanti yadi sopi eko bhavo,
atk-abh03a:1101_4: yathā kāmabhavūpagādīni kammāni atthīti satthārā vibhajitvā dassitāni,
atk-abh03a:1101_5: evaṃ tadupagenāpi kammena bhavitabbanti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1101_6: Yasmā pana parasamaye antarābhavūpagaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ kammaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1101_8: tadupageneva kammena antarābhave nibbattatīti tesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1101_10: Atthi antarābhavūpagā sattāti puṭṭhopi kāmabhavūpagāyeva nāma teti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1101_11: Jāyantītiādīni puṭṭhopi tattha jātijarāmaraṇāni ceva cutipaṭisandhiparamparañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1101_12: Rūpādivasena puṭṭhopi yasmā antarābhavasattassa anidassanaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1101_13: vedanādayopi aññesaṃ viya na oḷārikāti tassa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1102_1: Idāni kāmabhavo bhavo gatītiādi bhavasaṃsandanaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1102_3: yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1102_10: Itaro puna laddhimattavasena taṃ taṃ paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1103_1: Sabbesaññeva sattānaṃ atthi antarābhavoti puṭṭho yasmā nirayūpagaasaññasattūpagaarūpūpagānaṃ antarābhavaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1103_4: Ānantariyassātiādi yesaṃ so antarābhavaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1103_6: Taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a:1106_2: Tattha sakasamaye tāva kāmadhātūti vatthukāmāpi vuccanti –
atk-abh03a:1106_6: Kilesakāmā kamanīyaṭṭhena ceva kamanaṭṭhena ca kāmā,
atk-abh03a:1106_8: Kāmabhavo kamanīyaṭṭhena kamanaṭṭhena vatthukāmapavattidesaṭṭhenāti tīhi kāraṇehi kāmo,
atk-abh03a:1106_12: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya pañceva kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1106_15: te sandhāya kāmadhātunānattaṃ bodhetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1106_20: No ca vata re vattabbe pañcevāti imesu tappaṭisaṃyuttachandādīsu sati pañceva kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1106_21: Etepi hi chandādayo kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā ca dhātu cātipi kāmadhātu.
atk-abh03a:1107_1: Tattha paravādī channampi āyatanānaṃ vatthukāmabhāvena nakāmadhātubhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā puna manoti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1108_2: Yasmā pana kāmaguṇamatte bhavoti vohāro natthi,
atk-abh03a:1108_4: Kāmaguṇūpagaṃ kammantiādi sabbaṃ kāmaguṇamattassa nakāmadhātubhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1108_7: Tattha jāyanti jiyanti miyanti cavanti upapajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1108_8: na kāmaguṇesūti iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:1111_4: kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya rūpāyatanādīni pañcevāyatanāni kāmāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1111_6: tesaṃ kilesakāmasseva nippariyāyena kāmabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1114_2: Tattha “rūpino dhammā rūpadhātu nāmā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1114_6: Atha naṃ sakavādī yasmā rūpadhātu nāma rūpabhavo,
atk-abh03a:1114_10: Sāva kāmadhātūti puṭṭho bhūmiparicchedena virodhaṃ passamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1114_11: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho attano laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1114_12: Evaṃ sante pana dvīhi bhavehi samannāgatatā āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1114_13: tena taṃ sakavādī kāmabhavena cāti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1117_2: Arūpadhammesu pana vedanākkhandhameva gahetvā vedanā bhavotiādinā nayenettha desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:1117_3: Tattha kiṃ te arūpino dhammāti saṅkhaṃ gatā vedanādīsu aññatarā hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:1120_2: Tattha yesaṃ “rūpī manomayo sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo”ti suttaṃ nissāya brahmakāyikānaṃ ghānādinimittānipi
atk-abh03a:1120_3: āyatanānevāti kappetvā saḷāyataniko tesaṃ attabhāvoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1120_7: Atha naṃ yaṃ tattha āyatanaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1120_8: tassa vasena codetuṃ atthi tattha ghānāyatanantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1120_9: Tato paravādī yaṃ tattha ajjhattikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ ghānādikaṃ saṇṭhānanimittaṃ tadeva āyatananti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1120_10: Bāhirānaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ vasena puṭṭho ghānappasādādayo tattha na icchati,
atk-abh03a:1121_1: Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti tasmiṃyeva parasamaye ekacce ācariye sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1121_2: Te kira tattha cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni paripuṇṇāni icchanti,
atk-abh03a:1121_3: āyatanena ca nāma sakiccakena bhavitabbanti tehi ghānādīhi te gandhādayo ghāyanti sāyanti phusantītipi icchanti.
atk-abh03a:1121_4: Taṃ laddhiṃ sandhāya paravādī āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1122_1: Atthi tattha mūlagandhotiādīni pana puṭṭho atthibhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ asakkonto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1122_2: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittantiādi saṇṭhānamattasseva sādhakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1125_2: Tattha yesaṃ “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vacanato āruppabhavepi oḷārikarūpā nissaṭaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ atthīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1125_4: te sandhāya atthi rūpanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1128_2: Tattha yesaṃ kāyavacīviññattisaṅkhātaṃ rūpameva kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma,
atk-abh03a:1128_6: te sandhāya kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1128_10: atthi te so tassāti codetuṃ sārammaṇantiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1128_14: Parato pana kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitā vedanā saññā cetanā saddhātiādīsu vedanādīnaññeva cettha patthanā paṇidhīti labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1128_17: sotapatitattā pana evaṃ tanti gatāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1128_18: Rūpāyatanantiādi purimavāre “sabbantaṃ kusala”nti saṃkhittassa pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1128_20: vacīkammakathā “akusalena cittena samuṭṭhita”ntiādividhānañca sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1131_2: Tattha yesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ nāma cittavippayutto arūpadhammo,
atk-abh03a:1131_7: Natthi rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyūti pañhe upādinnarūpānampi tiṇakaṭṭhādīnampi santānavasena pavattimeva āyu
atk-abh03a:1131_8: ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanāti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1131_11: Atthi arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe arūpadhammānaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ jīvitindriyasantānaṃ nāma atthīti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1132_1: Rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe sattasantāne rūpino vā hontu arūpino vā,
atk-abh03a:1133_1: Nirodhasamāpannapañhesupi cittavippayuttaṃ arūpajīvitameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati ca paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:1133_2: Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yaṃ arūpapavatte asati atthi,
atk-abh03a:1133_6: Kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti sammāvācā sammākammanto jīvitindriyanti evamādayopi dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannātissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1133_7: Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yadi niruddhepi arūpapavatte saṅkhārakkhandho atthi,
atk-abh03a:1133_8: catunnampi khandhānaṃ atthitā hotūti codetuṃ atthi vedanākkhandhoti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1133_10: samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca pubbāparabhāgaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1134_2: Tassa hi laddhiyā asaññasattānaṃ paṭisandhikāle cittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-abh03a:1134_3: tena saha cittavippayuttaarūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppajjitvā yāvatāyukaṃ pavattati.
atk-abh03a:1134_4: Tasmā tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ natthīti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1134_8: Sakavādī pana taṃ anicchanto “sace tattha ekakkhaṇepi vedanādayo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1138_2: Tattha yena arahatā purimabhave arahā abbhācikkhitapubbo,
atk-abh03a:1138_3: so tassa kammassa hetu arahattā parihāyatīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1139_0: Handa hi arahantānaṃ abbhācikkhatīti idaṃ yassa kammassa hetu parihāyati,
atk-abh03a:1139_2: Atha naṃ sakavādī taṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānāpetvā “yadi evaṃ yehi arahanto na abbhācikkhitapubbā,
atk-abh03a:1139_3: te sabbe arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyu”nti codetuṃ ye kecītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1139_4: Itaro tassa kammassa arahattaṃ sampāpuṇane niyāmaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1144_2: Tattha sakasamaye saṅkhāre ādīnavato nibbānañca ānisaṃsato passantassa saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotīti nicchayo.
atk-abh03a:1144_3: Yesaṃ pana tesu dvīsupi ekaṃsikavādaṃ gahetvā “ānisaṃsadassāvinova saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1145_1: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti pañhasmiṃ ayamadhippāyo –
atk-abh03a:1145_2: ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1145_3: Nanu saṅkhāre aniccato manasikaroto saṃyojanā pahīyantīti ca puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1145_4: Tena te saṅkhāre ca aniccato manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1145_5: nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti idaṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1145_9: Sakavādī panassa adhippāyaṃ madditvā aniccamanasikārassa ānisaṃsadassāvitāya ca ekato paṭiññātattā dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1145_10: phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1145_17: Yadi tāva aniccādito manasikaroto pahānaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1145_20: anussavavasena nibbāne ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa vipassanācitteneva bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1145_23: Yasmā pana ariyamaggakkhaṇe aniccādimanasikārassa kiccaṃ nipphattiṃ gacchati puna niccatotiādigahaṇassa anuppattidhammabhāvato,
atk-abh03a:1145_25: tasmā kiccanipphattivasena aniccādito manasikaroto ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattivasena ca nibbāne ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1146_1: Nibbāne sukhānupassīti suttaṃ nibbāne sukhānupassanādibhāvameva sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1149_2: Tattha yesaṃ “nibbānaṃ maññatī”tiādīnaṃ ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā amatārammaṇaṃ saṃyojanaṃ hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1149_7: amatassa saṃyojaniyādibhāvo āpajjatīti codetuṃ amataṃ saṃyojaniyantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1149_10: Nibbānaṃ nibbānatoti āhaṭasuttaṃ pana diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1152_2: Tattha rūpaṃ sappaccayaṭṭhena sārammaṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1152_4: Yesaṃ pana avisesena rūpaṃ sārammaṇanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1152_6: te sandhāya ārammaṇatthassa vibhāgadassanatthaṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1152_9: Na vattabbanti pañhe olubbhārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1155_2: Tattha yesaṃ anusayā nāma cittavippayuttā ahetukā abyākatā,
atk-abh03a:1155_7: Atha naṃ anārammaṇena nāma evaṃvidhena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1155_9: Saṅkhārakkhandho anārammaṇoti pañhe cittasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1155_13: Sānusayoti pañhe pana appahīnānusayattā sānusayatā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:1155_19: Evarūpassa ca idaṃ nāma ārammaṇanti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1158_2: Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī ñāṇīti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1158_3: tassa ñāṇassa tasmiṃ khaṇe ārammaṇaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1161_3: tasmā tadārammaṇena cittena ārammaṇassa natthitāya anārammaṇena bhavitabbanti atītaṃ anārammaṇanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1164_4: Tattha asukacittaṃ nāma vitakkassārammaṇaṃ na hotīti niyamābhāvato siyā sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1164_5: vitakkavippayuttacittasabbhāvato pana na sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1164_6: Iti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1167_3: tasmā sabbaso vitakkayato vicārayato antamaso manodhātupavattikālepi vitakkavipphāro saddoyevāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1167_5: te sandhāya sabbasoti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1167_7: phassādivipphāropi saddo bhaveyyāti codetuṃ sabbaso phusayatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1167_9: Vitakkavipphāro saddo sotaviññeyyoti vitakkassa vipphāramattameva saddoti katvā pucchati,
atk-abh03a:1167_12: Nanu vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti idaṃ tasseva laddhiyā dasseti.
atk-abh03a:1167_15: Itaro pana “vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ sutvā ādisatī” ti vacanato sotaviññeyyovāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:1170_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇati,
atk-abh03a:1170_3: tasmā nayathācittassa vācā cittānurūpā cittānugatikā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1170_8: Atha naṃ “yadi taṃsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ na siyā,
atk-abh03a:1170_9: phassādayopi tasmiṃ khaṇe na siyu”nti codetuṃ aphassakassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1170_10: Na bhaṇitukāmotiādīsu yasmā aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇantopi bhaṇitukāmoyeva nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1171_1: Nanu atthi koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmītiādīsu cīvaranti bhaṇitukāmo cīranti bhaṇeyya.
atk-abh03a:1171_4: iti pubbabhāgena cittena asadisattā ayathācitto nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1171_7: iti acittakā sā vācāti atthaṃ sandhāya iminā udāharaṇena “nayathācittassa vācā”ti patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1174_2: Tattha yasmā koci aññatra gacchissāmīti aññatra gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1174_3: tasmā nayathācittassa kāyakammaṃ cittānurūpaṃ cittānugatikaṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1177_2: Tattha samannāgatapaññatti paṭilābhapaññattīti dve paññattiyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1177_4: Aṭṭha samāpattilābhino pana samāpattiyo kiñcāpi na ekakkhaṇe pavattanti,
atk-abh03a:1177_9: Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā yasmā jhānalābhīnaṃ atītānāgatāni jhānānipi atthi,
atk-abh03a:1182_2: Tattha yesaṃ “upapattesiyanti saṅkhaṃ gatassa bhavaṅgacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena saheva kiriyāti saṅkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1182_3: gatā kusalā vā akusalā vā cattāro khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcāti pañcakkhandhā uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:1182_4: Tesu hi anuppannesu bhavaṅge niruddhe santativicchedo bhaveyyā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1182_8: Tattha upapattesiyeti catūsupi padesu bahuvacanabhummatthe ekavacanabhummaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1182_9: Upapattesiyesu pañcasu khandhesu aniruddhesūti ayañhettha attho.
atk-abh03a:1182_11: Tattha paṭhamapañhe khandhalakkhaṇavasena kiriyavasena ca pañceva nāma te khandhāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1182_12: Dutiyapañhe purimapacchimavasena upapattesiyakiriyavasena ca nānattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1182_13: Dvinnaṃ pana phassānaṃ cittānañca samodhānaṃ puṭṭho suttalesābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1183_0: Kiriyā cattāroti rūpena vinā kusalā akusalā vā cattāro gahitā.
atk-abh03a:1183_1: Kiriyāñāṇanti paravādinā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgikkhaṇe arahato anuññātaṃ anārammaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1183_4: Mato maggaṃ bhāvetīti chalena pucchā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1183_5: Yasmā pana paṭisandhito yāva cuticittā satto jīvatiyeva nāma,
atk-abh03a:1186_9: evaṃ tampi rūpaṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ sārammaṇotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1186_10: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādino laddhianurūpena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1189_2: Tattha yesaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1189_9: na ca tāni maggagatikāni anibbānārammaṇattā alokuttarattā ca,
atk-abh03a:1189_10: na maggo pañcaviññāṇagatiko tesaṃ lakkhaṇena asaṅgahitattā”ti codetuṃ nanu pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1189_15: Evaṃ sante yadidaṃ “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā”tiādi lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1189_16: taṃ evaṃ avatvā “cha viññāṇā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
atk-abh03a:1189_20: tasmā sakavādī taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ paravādiṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re vattabbe pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1190_11: Te aniruddhaṃ vatthuṃ nissayaṃ katvā pavattanato asambhinnavatthukā,
atk-abh03a:1190_13: Te aniruddhāneva rūpādīni ārabbha pavattanato asambhinnārammaṇā,
atk-abh03a:1190_18: Te attano attanova rūpādigocare pavattanato na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhonti,
atk-abh03a:1190_19: maggo rūpādīsu ekampi gocaraṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:1190_20: Te kiriyamanodhātuṃ purecārikaṃ katvā uppajjanato na asamannāhārā na amanasikārā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1190_28: Te sampaṭicchanādīhi antaritattā na aññamaññassa samanantarā uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1190_30: Tesaṃ aññatra abhinipātā ābhogamattampi kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1190_33: tasmā sakavādī imehākārehi paravādiṃ maggassa apañcaviññāṇagatikabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re
atk-abh03a:1191_1: Suññataṃ ārabbhāti “yathā lokuttaramaggo suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha,
atk-abh03a:1191_4: Itaro “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti vacanato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1191_5: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “na nimittaggāhī”ti vacanato yaṃ tattha animittaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1192_6: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhīti ettha javanakkhaṇe na nimittaggāhitā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1195_0: 580-583. Idāni pañcaviññāṇā kusalāpītikathā nāma hoti. Sā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthato veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1198_2: Tattha ābhogo nāma kusalākusalavasena hoti satthārā ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti,
atk-abh03a:1198_4: taṃ ayoniso gahetvā “pañcaviññāṇā sābhogā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1201_2: Tattha “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”tiādivacanato yasmā lokiyena sīlena sīlavā lokuttaraṃ maggaṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh03a:1201_3: tasmā “purimena ca lokiyena maggakkhaṇe lokuttarena cāti dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato nāma hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1201_7: Atha naṃ “yadi so ekakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttarehi dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:1201_8: dvīhi phassādīhipi tena samannāgatena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ dvīhi phassehītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1201_10: Lokiyena ca lokuttarena cāti pañhe pubbe samādinnañca maggakkhaṇe uppannasammāvācādīni ca sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1202_2: Itaro pana taṃ vītikkamaṃ viya sallakkhento dussīlotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1205_2: Tattha yasmā sīle uppajjitvā niruddhepi samādānahetuko sīlopacayo nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1208_1: Idāni sīlaṃ na cittānuparivattītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1211_2: Tattha “ārāmaropā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti vacanato “samādānahetukaṃ sīlaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1214_3: vacīviññatti vacīkammanti gahitattā “viññatti sīla”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1214_7: Atha naṃ yasmā sīlaṃ nāma virati,
atk-abh03a:1214_10: Abhivādanaṃ sīlantiādi yathārūpaṃ viññattiṃ so “sīla”nti maññati taṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1214_11: Yasmā pana sā virati na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1217_2: Tattha cittavippayuttaṃ apuññūpacayañceva āṇattiyā ca pāṇātipātādīsu aṅgapāripūriṃ sandhāya “aviññatti dussīlya”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1217_9: asukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti evaṃ pāpasamādānaṃ katvā.
atk-abh03a:1217_10: Ubho vaḍḍhantīti puṭṭho dānakkhaṇe pāpassa anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1217_11: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho cittavippayuttaṃ pāpūpacayaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1223_3: Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne “sānusayo”ti vattabbo,
atk-abh03a:1223_10: te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1223_12: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sakkā pāḷimaggeneva jānitunti,
atk-abh03a:1226_2: Tattha maggañāṇena aññāṇe vigatepi puna cakkhuviññāṇādivasena ñāṇavippayuttacitte vattamāne yasmā taṃ maggacittaṃ na pavattati,
atk-abh03a:1226_7: Atha naṃ “yadi aññāṇe vigate ‘ñāṇī’ti paññatti na siyā,
atk-abh03a:1226_8: rāgādīsu vigatesu vītarāgādipaññattipi na siyāti puggalapaññattiyaṃ akovidosī”ti codetuṃ rāge vigatetiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1226_9: Itaro tesu vigatesu sarāgādibhāve yuttiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1226_10: Pariyosāne yasmā ñāṇapaṭilābhena so ñāṇīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-abh03a:1229_2: Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇādisamaṅgī paṭiladdhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ sandhāya “ñāṇī”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1229_3: na cassa taṃ tena cittena sampayuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1229_8: Atha naṃ “yadi te ñāṇaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ cittavippayuttesu rūpādīsu aññataraṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1229_11: Pariyosāne pana paññavāti puṭṭho paṭilābhavasena taṃ pavattiṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:1232_2: Tattha yesaṃ “lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe yogāvacaro idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:1232_3: evamassa idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsato ca idaṃ dukkhanti ñāṇaṃ pavattatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1232_6: maggakkhaṇe tathā vācābhāsanaṃ ñāṇappavattiñca sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1232_7: Yasmā pana so sesasaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ puthujjanova bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:1232_8: na ca tassa tathā ñāṇappavattīti icchati,
atk-abh03a:1232_11: Itaro pana sakasamaye tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1232_12: Iti ca danti cātiādi yadi tassa dukkhe ñāṇaṃ pavattati, i- kāra daṃ- kāra du- kāra kha-
atk-abh03a:1232_13: kāresu paṭipāṭiyā catūhi ñāṇehi pavattitabbanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1235_2: Tattha iddhipādabhāvanānisaṃsassa atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1235_4: te sandhāya iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1235_10: kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti ettha hi mahākappova kappoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:1235_14: Āyukappanaṃ āyuvidhānaṃ kammassa vipākavasena vā vassagaṇanāya vā āyuparicchedoti attho.
atk-abh03a:1236_0: Atha naṃ sakavādī “sace te iddhibalena samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:1236_2: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo’ti evaṃ paricchinnā āyukappā uddhaṃ mahākappaṃ vā mahākappekadesaṃ vā jīveyya
atk-abh03a:1236_3: iddhimayikenassa āyunā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ iddhimayiko so āyūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1236_9: iddhimā hi yāvatāyukaṃ jīvitappavattiyā antarāyakare dhamme iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā antarā akālamaraṇaṃ nivāretuṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:1237_0: Atītaṃ anāgatanti idaṃ avisesena kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti paṭiññātattā codeti.
atk-abh03a:1237_1: Dve kappetiādi “yadi iddhimā jīvitaparicchedaṃ atikkamituṃ sakkoti,
atk-abh03a:1237_2: na kevalaṃ ekaṃ anekepi kappe tiṭṭheyyā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1237_3: Uppanno phassotiādi na sabbaṃ iddhiyā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1240_2: Tattha yesaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi ekaggatā samādhānaṭṭhena samādhīti aggahetvā “satta rattindivāni
atk-abh03a:1240_10: Na hi ekaṃ paccuppannacittameva cittasantati nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1240_11: kiṃ te sabbāpi sā samādhī”ti codetuṃ atītātiādimāha,
atk-abh03a:1241_0: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhantiādi “cittasantatiyaṃ paccuppannameva cittaṃ kiccakaraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1241_2: kathaṃ taṃ samādhi nāma hotī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1241_10: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ purimapacchimavasena pavattamānassa samādhissa abbokiṇṇataṃ sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1244_2: Tattha “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “paṭiccasamuppādasaṅkhātā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma ekā atthi,
atk-abh03a:1244_7: Atha naṃ “yadi parinipphannānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ aññā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma parinipphannā atthi,
atk-abh03a:1244_8: tāyapi ca te dhammaṭṭhitatāya aññā ṭhitatā parinipphannā āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ tāya ṭhitatātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1244_10: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anantarapaccayatañceva aññamaññapaccayatañca sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1247_2: Tattha “aniccānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ aniccatāpi rūpādayo viya parinipphannā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1247_6: Atha naṃ “yadi te rūpādayo viya aniccatā parinipphannā,
atk-abh03a:1247_7: tassāpi aññāya parinipphannāya aniccatāya bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ tāya aniccatāyātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1247_8: Itaro dvinnaṃ aniccatāya ekato abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā puna yasmā sā aniccatā niccā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1247_11: Athassa sakavādī lesokāsaṃ adatvā yā tena dutiyā aniccatā paṭiññātā,
atk-abh03a:1247_12: tāyapi tato parāyapīti paramparavasena anupacchedadosaṃ āropento tāya tāyevātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1247_13: Jarā parinipphannātiādi yasmā uppannassa jarāmaraṇato aññā aniccatā nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1247_15: Tatrāpi paravādino purimanayeneva paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1248_4: evaṃ parinipphannānaṃ aniccatādīnaṃ tāni natthī”ti maññamāno ekantena paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1253_3: na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “saṃvaropi asaṃvaropi kamma”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1254_0: Atha naṃ yā sakasamaye cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā yathā sā kāyavacīmanodvāresu pavattamānā kāyakammādināmaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:1254_2: sopi cakkhundriyādīsu pavattamāno cakkhukammādināmaṃ labheyyā”ti codetuṃ cakkhundriyasaṃvaro cakkhukammantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1254_3: Itaro tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto catūsu dvāresu paṭikkhipitvā pañcame kāyadvāre pasādakāyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1254_5: So hi pasādakāyampi viññattikāyampi kāyindriyantveva icchati.
atk-abh03a:1254_9: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti suttaṃ tesu dvāresu saṃvarāsaṃvarameva dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1257_4: sañcetanikānaṃ kammāna”nti suttapadaṃ nissāya “sabbaṃ kammaṃ savipāka”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1257_8: kammaṃ vadāmī”ti satthārā avisesena cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā;
atk-abh03a:1257_10: abyākatā avipākāti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ sabbaṃ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1257_12: Puna sabbā cetanāti pañhesu abyākataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo,
atk-abh03a:1257_16: bhikkhave”ti suttaṃ sati paccaye diṭṭhadhammādīsu vipākapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1260_2: Tattha “so tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā brahmassaro hotī”tiādīni ayoniso gahetvā “saddo vipāko”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1260_5: Rūpadhammesu panāyaṃ vohāro natthī”ti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1260_7: Sukhavedanīyotiādi “vipāko nāma evarūpo hotī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1260_9: Mahāpuriso hi kammassa katattā suciparivāropi hoti,
atk-abh03a:1263_2: Tattha yasmā saḷāyatanaṃ kammassa katattā uppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1263_5: te sandhāya cakkhāyatanaṃ vipākoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1263_8: Saḷāyatanaṃ vipākoti ettha manāyatanaṃ siyā vipāko.
atk-abh03a:1266_3: tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1266_5: tesaṃ ṭhapetvā “ariyamaggaṃ añño tassa niyamo natthi,
atk-abh03a:1266_6: yena so sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato bhaveyyā”ti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1267_1: dve niyāmā sammattaniyāmo ca micchattaniyāmo ca.
atk-abh03a:1267_6: Tattha sattakkhattuparamo sotāpattimaggena avinipātadhammatāya ca phaluppattiyā ca niyamito.
atk-abh03a:1268_0: Abhabbo antarāti pañhesu ānantariyābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1268_2: Atthi so niyāmoti pañhe sattakkhattuparamatāya niyāmaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1268_3: Atthi te satipaṭṭhānātiādi niyāmasaṅkhāte maggadhamme dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1268_4: Tassa pana puna paṭhamamaggānuppattito tepi natthi,
atk-abh03a:1268_7: Nanu so sattakkhattuparamoti ettha bhagavā “ayaṃ puggalo ettake bhave sandhāvitvā parinibbāyissati,
atk-abh03a:1268_9: na bhavaniyāmaṃ nāma kiñci tena sattakkhattuparamo,
atk-abh03a:1273_2: Tattha yasmā dosasampayuttena cittena pāṇātipāto hoti,
atk-abh03a:1273_4: tasmā “diṭṭhisampanno sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1273_8: Sañcicca mātarantiādipañhesu pana “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso”ti suttabhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1273_9: Satthari agāravotiādi satthārādīsu sagāravassa sikkhāpadassa vītikkamābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1273_10: Itaro pana akusalavasena tassa agāravo nāma natthīti paṭikkhipitvā sagāravabhāvañca sampaṭicchitvā puna
atk-abh03a:1273_11: agāravoti puṭṭho tesu tesu kiccesu pasutatāya vikkhittānaṃ asatiyā amanasikārena cetiye abhivādanapadakkhiṇakaraṇābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1273_13: Puna ohadeyyātiādinā nayena puṭṭho tādisāya kiriyāya sañcicca akaraṇato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1276_2: Tattha ye duggatiñca duggatisattānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ taṇhañcāti ubhayampi duggatīti gahetvā puna tathā
atk-abh03a:1276_7: Āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyātiādi paravādino laddhiyā diṭṭhisampannassa duggati appahīnā,
atk-abh03a:1276_10: Nirayaṃ upapajjeyyātiādi duggatipahānameva duggatigāminitaṇhāpahānaṃ vā dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1282_3: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti “sakalampi kappaṃ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1282_7: Buddho ca loketi idaṃ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_8: Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi “yadi so sakalaṃ kappaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:1282_9: saṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_11: Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1282_14: Chandiddhipādotiādi “jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṃ, kiṃ tena,
atk-abh03a:1282_16: iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_17: Āpāyiko nerayikoti suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a:1285_4: taṃ mahaggataṃ lokuttaraṃ vā na paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a:1285_5: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva “so kusalacittaṃ na paṭilabhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1285_7: tesaṃ vibhāgadassanena taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1288_2: Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato anantarā vipākadāyakaṃ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṃ āṇattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1288_3: Tattha yassa niyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ karissati,
atk-abh03a:1288_4: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato hoti,
atk-abh03a:1288_6: Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ karissati,
atk-abh03a:1288_7: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato,
atk-abh03a:1288_8: bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitunti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1288_9: Yesaṃ pana “aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitu”nti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1288_11: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṃ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṃ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a:1288_14: Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva “so micchattaniyato”ti maññati.
atk-abh03a:1288_16: Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa dvinnaṃ niyāmānaṃ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1289_2: Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṃ payojetvā ṭhitassa “ananucchavikaṃ mayā kata”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjateva,
atk-abh03a:1289_4: Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṃ gahetvā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1290_1: Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṃ paṭisiddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1290_2: tameva puggalaṃ gahetvā anantarāpayutto puggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1290_4: Atha naṃ sakavādī “abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṃ kārako,
atk-abh03a:1290_5: kiṃ te tena tāni kammāni katānī”ti codetuṃ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1290_6: Itaro tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ arogatāya tathārūpaṃ kiriyaṃ apassanto “na heva”nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1291_0: Taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1291_1: Tañhi “mā kho mayā āṇattaṃ ākāsī”ti āṇattaṃ nivārentena paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1291_4: Evaṃ santepi panettha purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṃ maññamāno paravādī “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1291_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṃhaṭabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1292_1: Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1292_4: paṭisaṃhaṭakālato pubbe payuttakālaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1292_5: Payuttapubbatāmattaṃ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1292_6: Ayaṃ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1295_5: Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1295_6: Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:1295_8: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena “ayaṃ satto anāgate bodhiṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākato bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1295_9: Iti imaṃ vohāramattaṃ gahetvā “pacchimabhaviko bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti adhippāyena
atk-abh03a:1295_14: Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1295_17: Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ bodhisattassa bhabbataṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1295_20: So hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṃ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a:1298_2: Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṃ jahatīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1298_6: Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1298_7: Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1298_8: Tassa evaṃ jānatotiādi jānato passato āsavakkhayaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1301_2: Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṃyojanānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṃ upagato.
atk-abh03a:1304_4: sā cassa jhānanikanti jhānārammaṇā hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1304_8: Taṃ jhānaṃ tassa jhānassa ārammaṇanti pañhesu tasseva tadārammaṇataṃ apassanto suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1304_10: So tadassādetīti suttaṃ jhānalābhino jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṃ sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1307_2: Tattha “yaṃkiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:1307_3: so taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandati abhivadatī”ti sutte diṭṭhābhinandanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1307_7: te sandhāya atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1307_8: Tattha asātarāgoti asāte dukkhavedayite “aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanā.
atk-abh03a:1308_1: So taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha rāguppatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1308_2: samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ dukkhavedanameva vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya
atk-abh03a:1308_5: dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṃ kāmasukhaṃ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṃ abhinandati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1311_3: dhammataṇhāti imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā,
atk-abh03a:1311_9: Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:1311_10: Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā kāmataṇhā.
atk-abh03a:1311_11: “Bhavissati attā ca loko cā”ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a:1311_13: Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti padaṃ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṃ ārabbha pavattiṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1319_3: akusalaṃ vā kusalassa anantarā uppajjanakaṃ nāma natthīti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭisandhānaṃ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:1319_4: Ye pana yasmā ekavatthusmiññeva rajjati virajjati ca,
atk-abh03a:1319_5: tasmā taṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭisandahatīti laddhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitā,
atk-abh03a:1319_11: Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ paṇidahati ṭhapetīti paṇidhi.
atk-abh03a:1319_12: Kusalaṃ anāvaṭṭentassāti yaṃ taṃ akusalānantaraṃ paṭisandahantaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:1319_14: Itaro pana vinā āvajjanena kusalassa uppattiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1319_15: Kusalaṃ ayoniso manasikarototi idaṃ yadi akusalānantaraṃ kusalaṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1319_16: akusalasseva āvajjanena ayoniso manasikaroto uppajjeyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1319_18: Nanu yasmiṃyeva vatthusminti vacanaṃ ekārammaṇe sarāgavirāguppattiṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1322_2: Tattha upapattesiyena paṭisandhicittena saheva opapātikānaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:1322_5: Tāni ca kho yena kammunā paṭisandhi gahitā,
atk-abh03a:1322_6: tasseva aññassa vā katattāti ayaṃ sakasamaye vādo.
atk-abh03a:1322_7: Yesaṃ pana ekakammasambhavattā sampannasākhāviṭapānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ aṃkuro viya bījamattaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1322_12: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgītiādi saḷāyatane sati evarūpo hutvā okkameyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1322_14: Parato mātukucchigatassa pacchā kesāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1325_2: Tattha naccagītādīsu rūpadassanasaddasavanādīnaṃ lahuparivattitaṃ disvā “imāni viññāṇāni aññamaññassa anantarā uppajjantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1325_6: Sotaviññāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃyevāti yadi cakkhuviññāṇassa anantarā uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1325_7: vipākamanodhātu viya rūpārammaṇaṃ siyāti codetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1325_8: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti pañhesu suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā anantaruppattiṃ sallakkhento laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1325_9: Taññeva cakkhuviññāṇaṃ taṃ sotaviññāṇanti yathā paṭhamajavanānantaraṃ dutiyajavanaṃ manoviññāṇabhāvena taññeva hoti,
atk-abh03a:1325_10: kiṃ te tathā etampi dvayaṃ ekamevāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1325_12: Naccati gāyatītiādivacanaṃ ārammaṇasamodhāne lahuparivattitāya vokiṇṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1328_3: tañca kho “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato upādāyarūpanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1328_5: te sandhāya ariyarūpaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1328_11: Yaṃ kiñci rūpanti suttaṃ ṭhapetvā bhūtāni sesarūpassa upādābhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1331_2: Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne sānusayoti vattabbo,
atk-abh03a:1331_6: te sandhāya añño kāmarāgānusayoti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1331_8: Sānusayotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye anusayassa appahīnattā sānusayoti vattabbataṃ,
atk-abh03a:1334_2: Tattha yasmā aniccādito manasikarotopi rāgādayo uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:1337_5: Rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannāyeva ca nāma hontīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1337_9: Tattha anusetīti yathā kāmarāgo kāmavitakkasaṅkhātaṃ kāmadhātuṃ sahajātavasena anuseti,
atk-abh03a:1337_10: kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgo rūpadhātunti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1337_11: Pariyāpannoti yathā ca so tividhāya kāmadhātuyā kilesakāmavasena pariyāpannattā kāmadhātupariyāpanno,
atk-abh03a:1337_12: kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgopi rūpadhātupariyāpannoti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1337_13: Itaro panassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ laddhivasena āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1337_14: Atha naṃ tamatthaṃ sallakkhāpetuṃ kusalavipākakiriyasaṅkhātehi samāpattesiyādīhi saṃsanditvā pucchituṃ samāpattesiyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1337_16: Nanu kāmarāgotiādivacanampi kāmarāgasseva kāmadhātuyaṃ anusayabhāvaṃ pariyāpannatañca dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1340_2: Tattha vipākakiriyarūpanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ abyākataṃ avipākattā abyākatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1340_5: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā purimābyākataṃ viya diṭṭhigatampi abyākatanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1340_7: tesaṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ diṭṭhigataṃ abyākatanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1343_2: Tattha yasmā puthujjano jhānalābhī kāmesu vītarāgoti vattabbo hoti,
atk-abh03a:1348_4: tesaññeva yasmā ārammaṇānantarasamanantarapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1348_6: so yasmā tesaṃyeva anantarasamanantarapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1351_2: Tattha yesaṃ samaye “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ayameva tanti,
atk-abh03a:1351_7: te sandhāya avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ aññamaññapaccayatāpi atthīti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1351_10: Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjāti ettha sahajātaaññamaññaatthiavigatasampayuttavasena paccayatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1351_11: Upādānapaccayāpi taṇhāti ettha ṭhapetvā kāmupādānaṃ sesāni tīṇi upādānāni avijjāya saṅkhārā viya taṇhāya paccayā hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:1354_4: kathāvatthūnī”ti suttaṃ nissāya kālasaṅkhāto addhā nāma parinipphanno atthīti yesaṃ laddhi;
atk-abh03a:1354_5: tesaṃ “addhā nāma koci parinipphanno natthi aññatra kālapaññattimattā.
atk-abh03a:1354_6: Rūpādayo pana khandhāva parinipphannā”ti vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ addhā parinipphannoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1354_9: rūpādīsu anena aññatarena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1357_0: 722-723. Khaṇalayamuhuttakathāsupi eseva nayo. Sabbepi hete khaṇādayo addhāpariyāyā evāti.
atk-abh03a:1360_2: Tattha yasmā catūhi āsavehi uttari añño āsavo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1360_4: tasmā cattāro āsavā anāsavāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1360_9: evaṃ sante tehi maggādilakkhaṇappattehi bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ maggotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1363_2: Tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma aparinipphannattā lokiyanti vā lokuttaranti vā na vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1363_3: “Lokiyā dhammā lokuttarā dhammā”ti hi duke jarāmaraṇaṃ neva lokiyapade,
atk-abh03a:1363_5: Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ anādiyitvā lokuttarānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ lokuttaranti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1366_2: Tattha saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti nāma na koci dhammo,
atk-abh03a:1366_4: Iti sā neva lokiyā na lokuttarā.
atk-abh03a:1369_1: Idāni yasmā sā lokuttarā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1372_2: asuko na maraṇadhammo”ti sattānaṃ maraṇadhammatāya niyāmo natthīti saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannopi kālaṃ kareyyāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1372_4: tesaṃ samāpannāyapi maraṇadhammatāya maraṇasamayañca amaraṇasamayañca dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1372_6: Atha naṃ yasmā kālaṃ karontassa nāma maraṇantikehi phassādīhi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1373_0: Aphassakassa kālakiriyātiādīni puṭṭho sesasatte sandhāya paṭikkhipati visaṃ kameyyātiādīni puṭṭho samāpattiānubhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1373_2: Evaṃ sante pana samāpattiānubhāvo nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1374_2: Atthi so niyāmoti paravādissa pañhe pana yasmā evarūpo niyāmo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:1374_11: Yathā pana cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgissa kālakiriyā na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1377_2: Tattha saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanā asaññasamāpattipi nirodhasamāpattipi saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:1377_3: Iti dve saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyo lokiyā ca lokuttarā ca.
atk-abh03a:1377_7: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā avisesena saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti asaññasattupikāti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1377_11: Atha naṃ yasmā asaññasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa alobhādayo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1378_1: Idhāpi asaññīti pañhe idha saññāvirāgavasena samāpannattā asaññitā anuññātā,
atk-abh03a:1378_3: Tasmā imaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentena chalena patiṭṭhāpitā hoti.
atk-abh03a:1378_4: Idha vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sandhāya asaññitā anuññātā.
atk-abh03a:1378_5: Tatrāpi ito cutassa anāgāmino nirodhasamāpattimeva tasmāpi imāya paṭiññāya patiṭṭhāpitā laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1381_2: Tattha yesaṃ kammūpacayo nāma kammato añño cittavippayutto abyākato anārammaṇoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1381_4: te sandhāya aññaṃ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1381_7: phassāditopi aññena phassūpacayādinā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ añño phassotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1382_1: Kammena sahajātoti pañhesu cittavippayuttaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1383_1: Sārammaṇoti puṭṭho pana ekantaṃ anārammaṇameva icchati,
atk-abh03a:1383_3: Cittaṃ bhijjamānanti yadā cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1384_4: Tasmiṃ pana kamme niruddhe yāva aṃkuruppādā bījaṃ viya yāva vipākuppādā kammūpacayo tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1384_9: so ca yāva vipākuppādā tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1384_10: tasmā naṃ tesaṃ tiṇṇampi ekattaṃ pucchati vipāko sārammaṇoti idaṃ vipāko viya vipākadhammadhammopi ārammaṇapaṭibaddhoyevāti codanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1390_3: te yadi parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1390_6: Balappattiyā pana vasībhāvena ca addhā te parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhantīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1390_8: te sandhāya paro parassāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1393_2: Tattha “bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ upahattā”ti suttaṃ nissāya paro parassa sukhaṃ anuppadetīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1393_6: Dukkhaṃ anuppadetīti puṭṭho pana tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1393_7: Attano sukhantiādipañhe yaṃ attano parassa vā,
atk-abh03a:1393_12: na taṃ anuppadinnaṃ nāma bhavitumarahatīti laddhiyāpaṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1393_13: No ca vata retitādisassa sukhassa abhāvā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1393_14: Sukhadhammānaṃ upahattātivacanaṃ bhagavato paresaṃ sukhuppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1396_2: Tattha duvidho manasikāro nayato ca ārammaṇato ca.
atk-abh03a:1396_3: Tattha ekasaṅkhārassāpi aniccatāya diṭṭhāya sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti avasesesu nayato manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:1396_4: Atīte pana saṅkhāre manasikaronto na anāgate manasikātuṃ sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:1396_5: Atītādīsu aññataraṃ manasikaroto ārammaṇato manasikāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:1396_6: Tattha paccuppanne manasikaronto yena cittena te manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1396_8: Tattha yesaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādivacanaṃ nissāya “manasikaronto nāma adhigayha adhigaṇhitvā saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-abh03a:1397_0: Atha naṃ yasmā sabbe ekato manasikarontena yena cittena te manasikaroti,
atk-abh03a:1397_2: Tasmā taṃcittatāya codetuṃ tena cittenāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1397_3: Itaro ārammaṇaṃ katvā na sakkā jānitunti sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1397_4: Evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cittanti ñātattā pana tampi cittaṃ ñātameva hotīti sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1397_5: Atha vā taññeva tassa ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1397_7: yadā paññāya passatī”tiādīni nissāya uppannaladdhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1397_9: Tena phassenātiādīsu pana tathārūpaṃ suttaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.
atk-abh03a:1397_12: Sabbe saṅkhārātiādivacanaṃ nayato dassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1400_4: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “cattāro mahābhūtā hetū”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya aviseseneva rūpaṃ hetūti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1400_8: Alobho hetūti kiṃ te rūpaṃ alobhasaṅkhāto hetūti pucchati,
atk-abh03a:1400_11: Mahābhūtā upādāyarūpānaṃ upādāyahetūti ettha paccayaṭṭhena hetubhāvo vutto,
atk-abh03a:1405_2: Tattha “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ kusalampi akusalampī”tivacanaṃ nissāya kāyavacīkammasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaviññattivacīviññattirūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:1405_5: te sandhāya rūpaṃ kusalanti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1405_7: evaṃvidhena anena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ sārammaṇanti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1408_2: Tattha yaṃ kammassa katattā uppannā cittacetasikā viya kammassa katattā uppannaṃ taṃ rūpampi vipākoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1411_4: tasmā rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammānampi katattā rūpena rūpāvacarārūpāvacarena bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1411_6: te sandhāya atthi rūpaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaranti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1414_1: Idāni rūparāgo rūpadhātupariyāpanno arūparāgo arūpadhātupariyāpannoti kathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1414_3: tasmā rūparāgārūparāgehipi rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannehi bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1420_1: Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1420_2: Tattha yesaṃ arahato dānasaṃvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1420_11: Dānaṃ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1420_12: Itaro cittaṃ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1420_13: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1423_1: Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1423_4: sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmī”ti suttassa atthaṃ ayoniso
atk-abh03a:1423_12: arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ natthi arahantaghātakoti āha.
atk-abh03a:1423_13: Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṃ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1424_1: Visaṃ na kameyyāti pañhe “yāva pubbe katakammaṃ parikkhayaṃ na gacchati,

atk-abh03a:1428_2: Tattha “kammunā vattati loko”ti suttaṃ nissāya “sabbamidaṃ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ kammatova hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1428_6: Atha naṃ “evaṃ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ kammampi kammatoti āha.
atk-abh03a:1428_7: Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṃ kammaṃ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1429_3: tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati,
atk-abh03a:1429_4: tena te sabbamidaṃ kammavipākato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1429_5: Itaro bījato aṃkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa kammato nibbattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1429_6: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1429_9: Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1429_10: Atha naṃ “yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati,
atk-abh03a:1429_11: pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ saphaloti āha.
atk-abh03a:1429_12: Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṃvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṃ passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1429_13: Kammavipākassa pana idaṃ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1429_16: Kammunā vattatīti suttaṃ “natthi kamma”nti akammavāditaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “atthi kamma”nti kammavāditaṃ kammassakataṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a:1432_6: anindriyabaddhaṃ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1432_7: Imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā “yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
atk-abh03a:1432_11: tesaṃ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ indriyabaddhaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1432_13: Atha naṃ “yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’nti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1432_14: tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ indriyabaddhaññeva aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1432_15: Nanu anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.
atk-abh03a:1433_1: Na vattabbaṃ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1433_3: Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1433_5: Tasmā vināpi aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṃ dukkhanti vattabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1433_6: Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1433_8: Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:1433_10: itaraṃ pana dukkhamevāti idaṃ nānattaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1433_11: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṃ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṃ pariññātassa puna anuppattiṃ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a:1433_13: “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkāti,
atk-abh03a:1436_3: tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṃ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1436_7: Atha naṃ “yadi evaṃ samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ dukkhasamudayopīti āha.
atk-abh03a:1439_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1439_5: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,

atk-abh03a:1439_13: Āhutiṃ jātavedo vāti suttaṃ parasamayato āgataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1439_19: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho,
atk-abh03a:1442_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1442_3: na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkonti,

atk-abh03a:1445_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1445_4: tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati, khādati,

atk-abh03a:1445_13: Aṭṭha pānānīti idampi “yadi saṅgho na piveyya,

atk-abh03a:1448_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1448_3: na ca sakkā tesaṃ kiñci dātuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1448_5: nāpi tesaṃ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati,

atk-abh03a:1451_1: Idāni na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1451_3: lokānuvattanatthaṃ pana paribhuñjamānaṃ viya attānaṃ dasseti,
atk-abh03a:1451_4: tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti yesaṃ laddhi,

atk-abh03a:1454_5: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya,

atk-abh03a:1454_19: Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena visujjhati,

atk-abh03a:1459_10: Atha naṃ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca saññāpetuṃ nanu atthītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1459_11: Loke jātoti paravādī tusitapuraṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:1459_12: Satthārā panetaṃ manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1459_13: Lokaṃ abhibhuyyāti paravādī manussalokaṃ abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati,
atk-abh03a:1459_15: Anupalitto lokenāti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṃva sandhāya vadati,
atk-abh03a:1459_16: satthā pana lokadhammesu kilesehi anupalitto vihāsi.
atk-abh03a:1462_2: Tattha “tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya abhinimmitaṃ pesesi,

atk-abh03a:1468_2: Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena “bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti,

atk-abh03a:1471_9: Atha naṃ catūhi phalehi saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekato samodhānavasena codetuṃ catunnaṃ phassānantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1471_11: Arahattamaggenāti ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahānābhāvavasena codeti.
atk-abh03a:1471_12: Bhagavā sotāpannoti buddhabhūtassa sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1474_4: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,

atk-abh03a:1474_11: Atha naṃ “yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṃ appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati,

atk-abh03a:1474_19: Taññeva paṭhamanti “yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṃ viya anantaraṃ uppajjeyya,
atk-abh03a:1474_20: ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṃ lakkhaṇato taññeva taṃ bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1474_22: Vivicceva kāmehītiādīhi paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṃ desitabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1477_2: Tattha yesaṃ samaye “pañcakanaye pañca jhānāni vibhattāni,

atk-abh03a:1477_4: ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma esā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1478_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassāti “yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1478_3: So kevalaṃ laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca.
atk-abh03a:1479_1: Savitakko savicārotiādi “tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṃ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko,
atk-abh03a:1479_2: na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1480_1: Dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannānanti paṭhamadutiyāni sandhāya pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1480_2: Itaro “tesaṃ paccuppannānaṃyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma hotī”ti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1480_3: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddhanti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti na yuttāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1480_4: Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṃ jhānanti catukkanayavasena pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1480_5: Sakavādī tasmiṃ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1480_7: yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva,
atk-abh03a:1483_1: Idāni samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1483_2: Tattha “yasmā paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā,

atk-abh03a:1483_11: tasmiṃ asati yadi so saddaṃ suṇeyya,

atk-abh03a:1483_17: Dutiyassa jhānassātiādi “yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṃ natthi,
atk-abh03a:1486_1: Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:1486_2: Tattha “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṃ passatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,

atk-abh03a:1486_24: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1486_25: Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti vuccati,
atk-abh03a:1491_3: pahīnakilesassa ca atītāpi kilesā pahīnāva honti,

atk-abh03a:1495_4: sesakkhandhasuññatāpi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā na hotī”ti paṭilomadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

atk-abh03a:1499_2: Tattha maggavīthiyampi phalasamāpattivīthiyampi ariyamaggassa vipākacittaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāmāti sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1499_3: Yesaṃ pana tathā aggahetvā “kilesapahānañceva phaluppatti ca sāmaññaphalaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1499_8: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathā pāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1502_9: Na vattabbantiādi yāya laddhiyā patti asaṅkhatāti maññati,
atk-abh03a:1502_11: Tattha sakavādī “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhipanto kevalaṃ pattiyā rūpādibhāvaṃ na sampaṭicchati.
atk-abh03a:1502_12: Na hi patti nāma koci dhammo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1502_14: Itaro pana paṭikkhepamatteneva asaṅkhatāti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti,
atk-abh03a:1505_2: Tattha yesaṃ “rūpādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātā tathatā nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1505_3: sā ca saṅkhatesu rūpādīsu apariyāpannattā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1508_4: Ayaṃ nayo ṭhapetvā akusalaṃ sabbadhamme bhajati.
atk-abh03a:1508_5: Iṭṭhavipākaṃ nāma āyatiṃ upapattipavattesu iṭṭhaphalanipphādakaṃ puññaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1508_7: Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā anavajjabhāvamatteneva nibbānaṃ kusalanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1508_9: tesaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṭṭhena nibbānassa kusalatābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1511_2: Tattha yesaṃ “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1511_6: Mātughātakotiādi “niyatamicchādiṭṭhikassa ca mātughātakādīnañca samāne micchattaniyāme mātughātakādīhipi
atk-abh03a:1511_8: Itaro “niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko saṃsārakhāṇuko bhavantarepi niyatova ime pana ekasmiññeva attabhāve”ti laddhiyā na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1512_1: Vicikicchā uppajjeyyāti “ayaṃ niyato vā no vā”ti evaṃ uppajjeyyāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1512_3: Nuppajjeyyāti puṭṭho pana yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ āsevanto niyāmaṃ okkanto,
atk-abh03a:1512_5: Tato pahīnāti puṭṭho maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1512_7: Atha naṃ yasmā pahānaṃ nāma vinā ariyamaggena natthi,
atk-abh03a:1512_10: Puna katamenāti puṭṭho micchāmaggaṃ sandhāya akusalenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1513_2: Itaro yasmā “yepi te okkalā vayabhiññā natthikavādā akiriyavādā ahetukavādā”ti vacanato tissopi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyo ekassa uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:1514_1: Atha naṃ “na ca nāma so accantaniyāmo”ti codetuṃ hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1514_3: Nuppajjeyyāti pañhe yaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiyā sassatanti gahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1514_4: tadeva ucchijjissatīti gahetvā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1515_4: Imasmiññeva hi bhave abhabbo so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahitunti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-abh03a:1515_6: Sabbakālaṃ ummujjitvā nimujjatītiādi vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā attho pariyesitabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:1518_2: Tattha lokiyā saddhā saddhā eva nāma,
atk-abh03a:1518_10: Natthi lokiyā saddhātiādi yasmā lokiyāpi saddhādayova dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1518_11: na saddhādīhi aññaṃ saddhindriyādi nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1518_13: Atthi lokiyo manotiādi yathā te lokiyāpi manādayo dhammā manindriyādīni,
atk-abh03a:1518_14: evaṃ lokiyā saddhādayopi saddhindriyānīti upamāya tassatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1523_3: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1523_9: avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ asañciccapāṇaṃ hantvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1523_13: rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1523_14: Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva.
atk-abh03a:1523_15: Evaṃ adhippāyaṃ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1523_18: Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya saṅghabhedo ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1523_20: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti vacanaṃ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1523_21: Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1523_24: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1523_26: Itaro pana adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1526_4: Lokiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṃ kammassakatañāṇampi;
atk-abh03a:1526_6: Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṃ na itaraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1526_7: tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1529_3: natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1529_7: Atha naṃ “yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṃ,
atk-abh03a:1529_9: Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā”ti codetuṃ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1530_2: Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā,
atk-abh03a:1530_6: Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṃ ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1530_12: attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṃ paralokaṃ pattaṃ purisaṃ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti.
atk-abh03a:1530_13: Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno,
atk-abh03a:1530_14: tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṃ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1533_2: Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṃ assavaṇṇaṃ vikubbanti,
atk-abh03a:1533_4: Yesaṃ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā “atthi devesu tiracchānagatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1533_9: tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu”nti codetuṃ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1533_12: Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1536_2: Tattha yesaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti idañceva suttaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca
atk-abh03a:1536_8: sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1536_10: Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā.
atk-abh03a:1536_11: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1536_12: Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1536_13: na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṃ “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1536_15: Tenevāha “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:1539_2: Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṃ sandhāya “dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttara”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1539_9: ekekasmiṃ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇanānattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1539_11: Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1545_2: Tattha tisso saṅgītiyo sandhāya “sāsanaṃ navaṃ kata”nti ca “atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ karotī”ti
atk-abh03a:1545_3: ca “labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ kātu”nti ca yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1545_5: te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1545_7: Satipaṭṭhānātiādi sāsanaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānādayo ceva ariyadhammā,
atk-abh03a:1545_10: ṭhapetvā te aññesaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ karaṇena akusalādīnaṃ vā kusalādibhāvakaraṇena sāsanaṃ navaṃkataṃ nāma bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a:1545_13: labbhā vā evaṃ kātunti tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1548_2: Tattha yassa puggalassa yo dhammo paccuppanno,
atk-abh03a:1548_3: so tena avivitto nāmāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1548_4: Yasmā pana puthujjanena tedhātukā dhammā apariññātā,
atk-abh03a:1548_5: tasmā so ekakkhaṇeyeva sabbehipi tedhātukehi dhammehi avivittoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1548_9: Phassehītiādi sabbesaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1551_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sabbaṃ buddhavisayaṃ na jānāti,
atk-abh03a:1551_3: tasmā tassa tattha avijjāvicikicchāhi appahīnāhi bhavitabbanti saññāya “atthi kiñci saññojanaṃ appahāya arahattappattī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1551_7: Atthi kiñci sakkāyadiṭṭhītiādi arahato sabbasaṃyojanappahānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1551_8: Sabbaṃ buddhavisayanti pañhadvaye arahato sabbaññutaññāṇābhāvena paṭisedho kato,
atk-abh03a:1551_10: Itaro pana tesaṃ appahīnataṃ sandhāya tena hīti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1554_5: Sabhāgasantatiṃ pana parivattetvā visabhāgasantatikaraṇe vā sabhāgasantativaseneva ciratarappavattane vā yesaṃ atthāya kariyati,
atk-abh03a:1554_6: tesaṃ puññādīni kāraṇāni nissāya katthaci ijjhati,
atk-abh03a:1554_7: bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya pānīyassa sappikhīrādikaraṇe viya mahādhātunidhāne dīpādīnaṃ cirasantānappavattane viya cāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1554_8: Yaṃ pana āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño pāsādaṃ suvaṇṇantveva adhimucci,
atk-abh03a:1554_11: te sandhāya atthi adhippāyaiddhīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1554_15: Atha naṃ aniccādīnaṃ niccāditāya anuyuñjituṃ niccapaṇṇā rukkhā hontūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1554_17: Laddhipatiṭṭhāpane suvaṇṇo ca panāsīti rañño puññūpanissayena āsi,
atk-abh03a:1557_2: Tattha ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sarīravemattataṃ āyuvemattataṃ pabhāvemattatañca sesehi buddhadhammehi buddhānaṃ buddhehi hīnātirekatā nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1557_5: te sandhāya atthi buddhānanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1557_8: Itaro tesaṃ vasena hīnātirekataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1560_2: Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā uparīti samantato lokadhātusannivāsaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1560_3: sabbalokadhātūsu ca buddhā atthīti attano vikappasippaṃ uppādetvā “sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1560_8: Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1563_2: Tattha yasmā rūpādayo rūpādisabhāvena niyatā na taṃ sabhāvaṃ vijahanti,
atk-abh03a:1563_5: te sandhāya sabbe dhammāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1563_9: ito añño niyāmo nāma natthī”ti codetuṃ micchattaniyatātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1563_10: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:1563_21: Vedanādīhi panassa nānattapaññāpanatthaṃ esa vohāro hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1563_22: Tasmā “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata”nti vadantena rūpaṃ niyatanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:1563_23: Niyatañca nāma micchattaniyataṃ vā siyā sammattaniyataṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:1563_27: Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti ettha hi rūpaṃ rūpameva,
atk-abh03a:1563_30: Ito aññathā panassa niyatattaṃ natthīti puna teneva nayena codetuṃ micchattaniyatantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1563_32: Tena hi rūpanti laddhipi ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1566_3: tasmā sabbe kammā niyatā”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1566_8: Sace diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti deti,
atk-abh03a:1566_9: no ce ahosikammaṃ nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1566_10: Micchattasammattaniyāmavasena panetaṃ aniyatamevāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1571_3: tasmā atthi kiñci saṃyojanaṃ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1574_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti,
atk-abh03a:1574_7: Atha naṃ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti,
atk-abh03a:1574_10: Sato sampajānoti idaṃ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1577_2: Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1577_7: Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:1577_8: Iti naṃ iminā atthena codetuṃ evamāha.
atk-abh03a:1577_9: Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:1577_11: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha.
atk-abh03a:1580_2: Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ vasitvā nikkhantaṃ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1580_7: dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1580_12: kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti,
atk-abh03a:1583_2: Tattha acirajātānaṃ pana sotāpannānaṃ arahattappattiṃ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1583_3: disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti
atk-abh03a:1583_4: ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti ca idhāpi yesaṃ laddhiyo,
atk-abh03a:1586_4: sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṃ supinagatassa cittaṃ abyākata”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1586_9: Supinagatassa cittaṃ abbohārikanti idaṃ āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1586_10: Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṃ pavattati,
atk-abh03a:1586_11: vatthuvikopanaṃ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṃ paññapetuṃ.
atk-abh03a:1589_3: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāma.
atk-abh03a:1589_5: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṃ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1589_9: Atha naṃ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṃ nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṃ.
atk-abh03a:1592_4: Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṃ bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:1592_5: eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1592_9: Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṃ tathā saṇṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1592_11: cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1592_12: Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1592_15: Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti yasmā niccā na honti,
atk-abh03a:1592_16: tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṃ vadati.
atk-abh03a:1597_2: Tattha kāruññena vā ekena adhippāyena ekādhippāyo,
atk-abh03a:1597_3: saṃsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṃ buddhapūjādīni katvā paṇidhivasena eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:1597_4: Evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṃ ekādhippāyo methuno dhammo paṭisevitabboti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1600_2: Tattha iriyāpathasampanne ākappasampanne pāpabhikkhū disvā “arahantānaṃ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1603_14: Itaro pana paṭhamapañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1603_16: Tatiyakathāyaṃ issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyati.
atk-abh03a:1603_18: sassatādīnipi gaṇheyyāti codanatthaṃ sassato lokotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1606_2: Tattha mettākaruṇāmuditāyo sandhāya “na rāgo rāgapatirūpako”ti ca issāmacchariyakukkuccāni sandhāya “na
atk-abh03a:1606_3: doso dosapatirūpako”ti ca hasituppādaṃ sandhāya “na moho mohapatirūpako”ti ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ

atk-abh03a:1639_0: Tattha mūlavasena pucchāvissajjanaṃ katvā desitattā dasannaṃ tāva sabbapaṭhamaṃ mūlayamakanti vuttaṃ.

atk-abh03a:1639_10: anulomapaṭilomato pavattapucchāvasena pucchāyamakanti vā tidhā yamakabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1640_0: Idāni imesaṃ yamakānaṃ vasena desite imasmiṃ mūlayamake uddesavārassa tāva nayayamakapucchāatthavārappabhedavasena

atk-abh03a:1641_0: Tattha ye keci kusalā dhammāti kusalesu “kusalā nu kho,
atk-abh03a:1641_1: na kusalā nu kho”ti sandehābhāvato imasmiṃ pade sanniṭṭhānattho veditabbo.

atk-abh03a:1641_4: So ca kho veneyyānaṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne saṃsayadīpanatthaṃ vutto,
atk-abh03a:1642_0: Yathā ca kusalapadaṃ nissāya ime cattāro nayā,
