atk-abh03a:2031_14: Kammavegakkhittaṃ pana patitaṃ viya hutvā uppajjatīti sabbathāpi vipāke āsevanaṃ natthīti āsevanābhāvena vipākaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2031_15: Kusalākusalakiriyānantaraṃ uppajjamānampi cetaṃ kammapaṭibaddhavuttitāya āsevanaguṇaṃ na gaṇhātīti kusalādayopissa āsevanapaccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2031_17: Bhūmito pana ārammaṇato vā nānājātikattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2031_19: saṅkhārārammaṇañca anulomakusalaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa gotrabhukusalassa āsevanapaccayo hotiyevāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2031_20: Ayaṃ pana āsevanapaccayo jātito tāva kusalo akusalo kiriyābyākatoti tidhā ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:2031_21: Tattha kusalo bhūmito kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro arūpāvacaroti tividho hoti,
atk-abh03a:2031_22: akusalo kāmāvacarova kiriyābyākato kāmāvacaro rūpāvacaro arūpāvacaroti tividhova,
atk-abh03a:2031_23: lokuttaro āsevanapaccayo nāma natthīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2032_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha kāmāvacarakusalaṃ attano anantarassa kāmāvacarakusalasseva.
atk-abh03a:2032_2: taṃ attanā sadisavedanassa rūpāvacarakusalassa arūpāvacarakusalassa lokuttarakusalassāti imesaṃ rāsīnaṃ āsevanapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2032_8: so attanā sadisavedanassa rūpāvacarakiriyassa arūpāvacarakiriyassāti imesaṃ rāsīnaṃ āsevanapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2032_11: Vipāko pana ekadhammassāpi ekadhammopi vā koci vipākassa āsevanapaccayo natthīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2035_2: Kaṭattā ca rūpānanti kammassa kaṭattā uppannarūpānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2035_3: Kammapaccayenāti anekānampi kappakoṭīnaṃ matthake attano phalaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthena nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayenāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2035_4: Kusalākusalañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikkhaṇe phalaṃ na deti.
atk-abh03a:2035_9: tato aññasmiṃ khaṇe avijjamānampi kevalaṃ kaṭattāyeva diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye avasesapaccayasamāyoge
atk-abh03a:2035_10: sati phalaṃ uppādeti niruddhāpi purimasippādikiriyā viya kālantare pacchimasippādikiriyāya.
atk-abh03a:2035_12: Cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānanti yā kāci cetanā attanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2035_15: Kusalādīsu hi yā kāci sahajātacetanā sesadhammānaṃ cittapayogasaṅkhātena kiriyābhāvena upakārikā hoti.
atk-abh03a:2036_1: So hi jātibhedato kusalo akusalo vipāko kiriyāti catudhā bhijjati.
atk-abh03a:2036_2: Tattha kusalo bhūmito kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā bhijjati.
atk-abh03a:2036_4: kiriyā tidhāvāti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2037_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha sahajātā kāmāvacarakusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2037_2: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attano vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2037_5: Sahajātā rūpāvacarakusalacetanā attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca ekanteneva sahajātakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2037_6: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana attano vipākānañceva kaṭattārūpānañca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2037_7: Arūpāvacarā pana lokuttarā ca sahajātā kusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca,
atk-abh03a:2037_9: Uppajjitvā niruddhā panesā duvidhāpi attano attano vipākakkhandhānaññeva nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2037_10: Sahajātā akusalacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānañca catuvokāre
atk-abh03a:2037_12: Uppajjitvā niruddhā pana vipākakkhandhānañceva kaṭattārūpānañca nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2038_0: Kāmāvacararūpāvacarato vipākacetanā attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2038_3: Lokuttaravipākacetanā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2038_5: Tebhūmikā kiriyacetanā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātakammapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2038_7: sā arūpadhammānaññeva sahajātakammapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2041_1: Vipākapaccayaniddese vipākā cattāro khandhāti yasmā kammasamuṭṭhānāpi rūpā vipākā na honti,
atk-abh03a:2041_3: Evaṃ ayaṃ pāḷi arūpadhammānaññeva vipākapaccayavasena āgatā.
atk-abh03a:2041_4: Pañhāvāre pana “vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2041_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo”ti
atk-abh03a:2041_7: Idha pana sāvasesavasena desanā katāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2041_8: Ayaṃ pana vipākapaccayo vipākabhāvena jātito ekavidho,
atk-abh03a:2041_9: bhūmibhedato kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2042_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipāko attanā sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2042_4: catuvokāre sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva vipākapaccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2045_1: Āhārapaccayaniddese kabaḷīkāro āhāroti catusantatisamuṭṭhāne rūpe ojā āhāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2045_2: So pana yasmā kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitova āhārakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-abh03a:2045_5: Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitabbavatthukattā vā kabaḷīkāroti nāmametaṃ tassa.
atk-abh03a:2045_9: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2046_0: Ayaṃ pana āhārapaccayo saṅkhepato kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso, cetanā,
atk-abh03a:2046_2: Tattha ṭhapetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ sesā tayo arūpāhārā jātivasena kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedato catudhā bhijjanti.
atk-abh03a:2046_8: bhūmito kāmāvacarovāti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2047_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakāpi tayo kusalāhārā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2047_1: ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacaraṃ avasesā āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva āhārapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2047_3: Catubhūmakavipākāhārā pana sabbattha sampayuttakānaṃ āhārapaccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2047_4: Kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākā panettha pañcavokāre uppajjamānā pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassāpi āhārapaccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2047_6: āruppe uppannā rūpassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2047_7: Tebhūmakāpi tayo kiriyāhārā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2047_8: kāmāvacarārūpāvacarā pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva āhārapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2047_9: Catusantatisamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkārāhāro kiñcāpi “imassa kāyassā”ti avisesato vutto,
atk-abh03a:2047_10: visesato panāyamettha āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpassa janako ceva anupālako ca hutvā āhārapaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2047_11: sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvā āhārapaccayena paccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2050_2: Indriyapaccayenāti sayaṃ purejāto hutvā arūpadhammānaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā indriyapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2050_5: Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kaṭattārūpampi saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2050_7: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2051_0: Ayaṃ pana indriyapaccayo itthindriyapurisindriyavajjānaṃ samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ vasena ṭhito.
atk-abh03a:2051_2: kalalādikāle pana vijjamānesupi tesu itthiliṅgapurisaliṅgādīnaṃ abhāvā tāni neva tesaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2051_4: Indriyapaccayo hi attano vijjamānakkhaṇe avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2051_8: Iti indriyapaccayo samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ vasena ṭhitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2051_11: akusalo kāmāvacarova vipāko catudhāva kiriyāsaṅkhāto tidhā,
atk-abh03a:2051_12: rūpaṃ kāmāvacaramevāti evaṃ anekadhā bhijjatīti evaṃ tāvettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2052_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakopi kusalindriyapaccayo pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca indriyapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2052_2: Ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avasesā kusalākusalā āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2052_3: Catubhūmako vipākindriyapaccayo ekanteneva sampayuttakānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2052_4: Kāmāvacararūpāvacarā panettha pañcavokāre uppajjanato pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa,
atk-abh03a:2052_7: Āruppe uppannā lokuttaravipākā indriyā rūpassa paccayā na honti.
atk-abh03a:2052_8: Tebhūmakā kiriyindriyā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2052_9: kāmāvacarārūpāvacarā pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayataṃ pharanti.
atk-abh03a:2052_10: Cakkhundriyādivasena chabbidhe rūpindriye cakkhundriyaṃ kusalākusalavipākato sampayuttadhammānaṃ dvinnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2052_12: rūpajīvitindriyaṃ attanā sahajātarūpānaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇe indriyapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2052_13: Sahajātapaccayatā pana tassa natthīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2055_3: Pañcannaṃ pana viññāṇakāyānaṃ abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhāni upanijjhānākārassa abhāvato jhānaṅgānīti na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:2055_4: Tattha pacchinnattā pana sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ na uddhaṭameva.
atk-abh03a:2055_7: “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni jhānaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh03a:2055_9: Ayaṃ pana jhānapaccayo sattannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalākusalavipākakiriyavasena catudhā bhijjati,
atk-abh03a:2055_11: tidhāti dvādasadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2056_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2056_1: ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva jhānapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2056_7: Pañcavokāre pana taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassapi jhānapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2056_8: Tebhūmakampi kiriyajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca.
atk-abh03a:2056_10: taṃ sampayuttadhammānaññeva jhānapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2059_1: Maggapaccayaniddese maggaṅgānīti ahetukacittuppādavajjesu sesacittesu uppannāni paññā, vitakko,
atk-abh03a:2059_5: Maggassa pana hetupacchimakattā ahetukacittesu maggaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:2059_8: “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatāni maggaṅgāni sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”ti.
atk-abh03a:2060_0: Ayaṃ pana maggapaccayo dvādasannaṃ maggaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalādivasena catudhā,
atk-abh03a:2060_1: kusalādīnañca kāmāvacarādibhūmibhedato dvādasadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2060_2: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalamaggaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2060_3: ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva maggapaccayena paccayoti sabbaṃ jhānapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2060_4: viya vitthāretabbanti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2063_2: Ayaṃ pana sampayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato sabbepi arūpino khandhā.
atk-abh03a:2063_4: bhūmito ca kāmāvacarādīnaṃ vasena anekadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2063_5: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakesupi kusalakkhandhesu eko khandho tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2063_7: dve dvinnanti evaṃ sabbepi aññamaññaṃ sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2063_8: Akusalavipākakiriyakkhandhesupi eseva nayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2066_1: Vippayuttapaccayaniddese rūpino dhammā arūpīnanti idaṃ tāva hadayavatthuno ceva cakkhundriyādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2066_2: Rūpadhammesu hi eteyeva cha koṭṭhāsā arūpakkhandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2066_7: Arūpino hi khandhā cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantā viya uppajjanti.
atk-abh03a:2066_11: Ārammaṇadhammā pana vatthunissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattā hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkā.
atk-abh03a:2066_12: Iti sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato na te vippayuttapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2066_17: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Sota… ghāna… jivhā…
atk-abh03a:2066_19: Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayoti.
atk-abh03a:2067_0: Arūpino dhammā rūpīnanti idaṃ pana catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2067_1: Arūpadhammesu hi cattāro khandhāva sahajātapurejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:2067_2: nibbānaṃ pana arūpampi samānaṃ rūpassa vippayuttapaccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a:2067_6: sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2067_7: Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2067_8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2068_0: Ayaṃ pana vippayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhave vattamānā rūpārūpadhammā.
atk-abh03a:2068_1: Tesu rūpaṃ vatthuno cakkhādīnañca vasena chadhā bhinnaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2068_3: Tassa bhūmito kāmāvacarādivasena catudhā, ekadhā, tidhā,
atk-abh03a:2068_5: Āruppavipākañhi vippayuttapaccayo na hotīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2069_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha pañcavokārabhave uppannaṃ catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ akusalañca attanā samuṭṭhāpitacittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa
atk-abh03a:2069_2: Uppādakkhaṇaṃ pana atikkamitvā ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ pattassa purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikarūpakāyassa pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2069_3: Ettha ca tisamuṭṭhānikakāyoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa abhāvato brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ kāyo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2069_5: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassa ca sahajātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2069_7: Tividhampi panetaṃ purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2069_10: Chadhā ṭhitesu pana rūpesu vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākānaṃ sahajātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2069_11: pavatte uppajjamānānaṃ catubhūmakakusalānaṃ akusalānaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇavajjānaṃ tebhūmakavipākānaṃ tebhūmakakiriyānañca
atk-abh03a:2069_13: Cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purejātavippayuttapaccayena paccayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2072_1: Atthipaccayaniddese cattāro khandhātiādīhi sahajātavasena atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:2072_3: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti ettha sahajātapurejātavasena atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:2072_4: Evamayaṃ pāḷi sahajātapurejātānaññeva atthipaccayānaṃ vasena āgatā.
atk-abh03a:2072_8: indriyanti imesaṃ vasena āgatattā pacchājātaāhārindriyavasenāpi atthipaccayo labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2072_9: Idha pana sāvasesavasena desanā katāti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2073_7: “Cattāro khandhā arūpino”ti ettha hi sabbacittuppattivasena arūpaṃ arūpena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2073_9: “Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti ettha paṭisandhikhandhānañceva vatthuno ca vasena rūpārūpaṃ rūpārūpena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2073_13: rūpaṃ arūpassa cittacetasikā dhammā”ti ettha hi pañcavokāravasena arūpaṃ rūpassa vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2073_15: “Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā”tiādīsu vatthārammaṇavasena rūpaṃ arūpassa atthipaccayoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2074_0: Apicesa atthipaccayo nāma saṅkhepato khaṇattayappattaṃ nāmañceva rūpañca,
atk-abh03a:2074_10: Tattha pañca vatthūni ārammaṇāni ca purejātāneva,
atk-abh03a:2074_11: hadayavatthu sahajātaṃ vā hoti purejātaṃ vā.
atk-abh03a:2074_12: Pañhāvāre pana āgato āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2075_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakakusalopi sahajāto atthipaccayo pañcavokāre “eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā
atk-abh03a:2075_1: nayena aññamaññaṃ khandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avaseso āruppe
atk-abh03a:2075_3: Catubhūmako panesa pañcavokāre catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa pacchājāto kusalo atthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2075_5: Sopi hi pañcavokāre sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca,
atk-abh03a:2076_0: Vipākato pana kāmāvacararūpāvacaro atthipaccayo niyameneva paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhānañceva kaṭattārūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2076_1: Pavatte pana sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2076_3: Arūpāvacaravipāko pana āruppe uppannalokuttaravipāko ca attanā sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2076_4: Pañcavokāre lokuttaravipāko sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2076_6: Kiriyato rūpāvacaro atthipaccayo sampayuttakkhandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:2077_0: Rūpasaṅkhāto pana atthipaccayo sahajāto, purejāto, āhāro,
atk-abh03a:2077_3: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhāno ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2077_6: mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2077_7: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpaṃ kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākakkhandhānaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2077_8: Tesampi tisamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2077_11: mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2077_13: So duvidhopi heṭṭhā purejātapaccaye vuttanayeneva yojetvā gahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:2077_15: Idha panesa attano aniruddhakkhaṇe paccayabhāvena atthipaccayoti vutto.
atk-abh03a:2077_16: Rūpajīvitindriyampi heṭṭhā indriyapaccaye rūpajīvitindriyayojanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2077_17: Idha panetampi attano aniruddhakkhaṇeyeva paccayabhāvena atthipaccayoti vuttanti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2080_1: Natthipaccayaniddese samanantaraniruddhāti aññena cittuppādena anantarikā hutvā samanantaraniruddhā.
atk-abh03a:2080_4: Purimesu hi nirodhavasena pacchimānaṃ pavattanokāsaṃ adentesu tesaṃ paṭuppannabhāvo na siyāti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2080_8: Kevalaṃ pana tattha “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā manodhātuyā”tiādinā nayena paccayā ca paccayuppannā ca sarūpato dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2080_9: Idha pana “samanantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammāna”nti sabbepi te nirodhuppādavasena sāmaññato dassitāti.
atk-abh03a:2083_3: Iti natthipaccayassa ca imassa ca byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2086_1: Avigatapaccayaniddese cattāro khandhātiādīnaṃ sabbākārena atthipaccayaniddese vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2086_2: Imassapi hi paccayassa atthipaccayena saddhiṃ byañjanamatteyeva nānattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2089_0: Idāni evaṃ uddesaniddesato dassitesu imesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ñāṇacārassa visadabhāvatthaṃ anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvato,
atk-abh03a:2089_9: bhavabhedatoti imesaṃ dasannaṃ padānaṃ vasena pakiṇṇakavinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2089_10: Tattha anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvatoti etesu hi ṭhapetvā kammapaccayaṃ avasesesu tevīsatiyā paccayesu anekadhammā ekato paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2089_11: Kammapaccayo pana eko cetanādhammoyevāti evaṃ tāvettha anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvato vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2090_0: Ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccaye tāva amoho eko dhammo.
atk-abh03a:2090_2: sesānaṃ vīsatiyā paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2090_4: sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2090_6: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2090_8: sesānaṃ soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2090_9: Ārammaṇapaccaye rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo;
atk-abh03a:2090_12: Iminā nayena sabbesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayadhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2091_0: Adhipatipaccaye ārammaṇādhipatino ārammaṇapaccaye vuttanayeneva anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2091_1: Sahajātādhipatīsu vīmaṃsā amohahetu viya vīsatidhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2091_3: sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2091_5: sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2092_0: Anantarapaccaye “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu khandhesu vedanākkhandho hetupurejātakammāhāramaggapaccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2092_19: Sati tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2092_20: Jīvitindriyaṃ saddhāya vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2092_21: Hirottappaṃ tato indriyapaccayaṃ apanetvā sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2092_24: Viratiyo pana tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti aṭṭhārasadhā paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2092_26: micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti ekūnavīsatidhā.
atk-abh03a:2092_27: Ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ māno thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccanti ime hetupurejātakammavipākāhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā na honti,
atk-abh03a:2092_28: sesānaṃ pana soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti.
atk-abh03a:2092_29: Vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni tato adhipatipaccayaṃ apanetvā pannarasadhā viññāṇakkhandhassa.
atk-abh03a:2093_0: Sahajātapaccaye catūsu tāva khandhesu ekekassa dhammassa anekapaccayabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2093_2: Hadayavatthu tesañceva vippayuttassa ca vasena dasadhā paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2094_0: Ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccayādīsu yassa kassaci ekassa paccayassa yenākārena yenatthena yo paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2094_1: taṃ ākāraṃ taṃ atthaṃ avijahitvāva aññehipi yehākārehi yehi atthehi so tasmiññeva khaṇe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2094_2: tato anekapaccayabhāvato tassa vinicchayo veditabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:2094_7: Alobhādosā tato adhipatiindriyamaggapaccaye tayo apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:2094_10: Lobhadosamohā te tayo vipākañcāti cattāro apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:2095_3: arūpadhammānaṃ pana atītānāgatānaṃ vā rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāve sati ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayamattaññeva uttari labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2095_7: Vīriyaṃ tesañceva indriyamaggapaccayānañcāti imesaṃ vasena aparehipi dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2095_8: Cittaṃ tato maggapaccayaṃ apanetvā āhārapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā imesaṃ vasena adhipatipaccayato uttari dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2095_9: Ārammaṇādhipatino pana heṭṭhā ārammaṇapaccaye vuttanayeneva anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2096_6: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo vatthusahajātādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ abhāvopi veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2097_0: Nissayapaccayo nissayapaccayattaṃ avijahantova catuvīsatiyā paccayesu attano nissayapaccayattañceva anantarasamanantarapacchājātaāsevananatthivigatapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2097_1: ca cha apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2097_2: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova vatthunissayādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ ābhāvopi veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2098_8: Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaniddesova ārammaṇapurejāte panettha nissayaindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2098_10: Pacchājātapaccayo attano pacchājātapaccayabhāvaṃ avijahantova vippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi tīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2099_2: Nānākkhaṇiko upanissayaanantarasamanantaranatthivigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi pañcahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2099_5: Āhārapaccaye kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2100_0: Indriyapaccaye rūpino pañcindriyā indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantāva nissayapurejātavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_2: Rūpajīvitindriyampi indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantaññeva atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2100_7: Maggapaccayo maggapaccayattaṃ avijahantova yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti
atk-abh03a:2100_8: imesaṃ vasena aparehipi dvādasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2101_3: cha paccaye apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2101_4: Tattha rūpassa ca arūpassa ca paccayavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2101_6: apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehi aṭṭhārasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2101_8: Avigatapaccayo atthipaccayasadisoyevāti evamettha ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2102_0: Paccayasabhāgatoti etesu hi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayaāsevananatthivigatā sabhāgā,
atk-abh03a:2102_1: tathā ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayāti iminā upāyenettha paccayasabhāgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2103_3: vigatapaccayo avigatapaccayenāti iminā upāyenettha paccayavisabhāgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2104_4: aññamaññapaṭipakkhatāyāti imehi kāraṇehi yugaḷakato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2104_5: Anantarasamanantarā hi atthasarikkhatāya ekaṃ yugaḷakaṃ nāma;
atk-abh03a:2104_11: vigatāvigatapaccayā cāti evamettha yugaḷakatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2104_18: Sesā janakā ca ajanakā ca upatthambhakā cāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2105_0: Sabbaṭṭhānikāsabbaṭṭhānikatoti etesu ca sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayā sabbaṭṭhānikā nāma,
atk-abh03a:2105_1: sabbesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhānabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2105_9: Vuttāvasesāpi ekaccānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppattihetuto na sabbaṭṭhānikāti evamettha sabbaṭṭhānikā sabbaṭṭhānikatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2106_0: Rūpaṃ rūpassātiādivikappatoti etesu ca catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ekapaccayopi ekantena rūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2106_1: ekantena pana rūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva paccayo nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:2106_4: Purejātapaccayo hi ekantena rūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2106_5: Ekantena rūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi natthi,
atk-abh03a:2106_6: ekantena pana arūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva paccayo nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a:2106_9: So hi sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2106_10: Ekantena arūpameva hutvāpi ekantena rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2106_13: So hi ekantena arūpaṃ hutvā rūpasseva paccayo hoti;
atk-abh03a:2106_14: ekantena pana arūpadhammova hutvā rūpārūpānaṃ paccayopi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2106_17: So hi sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānampi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2106_18: Ekantena pana rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi natthi,
atk-abh03a:2106_22: Idañhi dvayaṃ ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2106_23: Ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā pana rūpārūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi atthi.
atk-abh03a:2106_26: So hi sabbopi ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo hotīti evamettha rūpaṃ rūpassātiādivikappatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2107_0: Bhavabhedatoti imesu pana catuvīsatiyā paccayesu pañcavokārabhave tāva na koci paccayo na labbhati nāma.
atk-abh03a:2107_1: Catuvokārabhave pana tayo purejātapacchājātavippayuttapaccaye apanetvā sesā ekavīsatimeva labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2107_3: Bāhire pana anindriyabaddharūpe sahajātaaññamaññanissayaatthiavigatavasena pañceva labbhantīti evamettha bhavabhedatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2111_1: ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2111_4: Te anāmasitvā yesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena te tikādayo vibhattā,
atk-abh03a:2111_5: te paccaye eva tāva iminā mātikānikkhepapaccayavibhaṅgasaṅkhātena vārena uddesato ca niddesato ca dassetvā,
atk-abh03a:2111_6: idāni ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2111_9: Te tikādayo imesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ekekaṃ tikadukaṃ nissāya sattahi mahāvārehi desanā katā.
atk-abh03a:2112_0: Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ paṭiccābhidhānavasena vutto paṭiccavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2112_1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sahajātābhidhānavasena vutto sahajātavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2112_3: Paṭiccābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto,
atk-abh03a:2112_5: Dvīsupi cetesu rūpārūpadhammavasena paccayā ceva paccayuppannadhammā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2112_8: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ paccayābhidhānavasena vutto pana paccayavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2112_12: Tadanantaro “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ nissayābhidhānavasena vutto nissayavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2112_14: Paccayābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto,
atk-abh03a:2112_16: Tato paraṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhābhidhānavasena vutto saṃsaṭṭhavāro nāma.
atk-abh03a:2112_17: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sampayuttābhidhānavasena vutto sampayuttavāro nāma.

atk-abh03a:2112_21: Dvīsupi cetesu arūpadhammavaseneva paccayā paccayuppannā ca veditabbā.

atk-abh03a:2112_25: tasmā so vāro pañhānaṃ sādhukaṃ vibhattattā pañhāvārotveva saṅkhyaṃ gato.
atk-abh03a:2113_0: Tattha yo tāva esa sabbapaṭhamo paṭiccavāro nāma,

atk-abh03a:2114_1: Tattha siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti parikappapucchā.
atk-abh03a:2114_4: kiṃ so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca siyāti atha vā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yo kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya,

atk-abh03a:2114_12: Kusalo dhammoti evaṃ sahuppattibhāvena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:2114_14: Taṃ pana paccayakaraṇaṃ purejātepi paccaye labbhati sahajātepi.
atk-abh03a:2114_16: Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalotiādīsupi eseva nayo.

atk-abh03a:2114_21: Parato pana vissajjane yaṃ na labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2115_0: Evamettha pucchānaṃ atthañceva pucchāgatiñca ñatvā idāni gaṇanavasena pucchāparicchedo veditabbo.

atk-abh03a:2115_3: puna tadevādiṃ katvā tikantā ca ekā,
atk-abh03a:2115_4: evaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalādikā satta pucchā,
atk-abh03a:2115_10: kusalākusalābyākatādikāti sabbāpi sattannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccaye ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā.

atk-abh03a:2165_0: Satāni tīṇi pucchānaṃ, navuti dve punāparā;

atk-abh03a:2170_0: Ekūnavīsatimūlake paṭhamaaṭṭhārasakena saddhiṃ sampayuttapaccayādīsu chasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cha ekūnavīsatikā honti.

atk-abh03a:2179_0: Dvāvīsatimūlake paṭhamaekavīsatikena saddhiṃ natthipaccayādīsu tīsu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena tayo dvāvīsatikā honti.

atk-abh03a:2189_2: ādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayātiādimāha.

atk-abh03a:2208_7: so therena pavattitanayeneva saṅgītikāle saṅgahaṃ āropito.
atk-abh03a:2209_0: Taṃ panassa saṅkhepanayaṃ dassetuṃ tikañca paṭṭhānavaranti ayaṃ gāthā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh03a:2209_8: Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti ete tikapaṭṭhānādayo suṭṭhu gambhīrā cha nayā anulomamhi veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2209_11: Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ anulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2209_12: “Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ anulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2210_1: cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2210_2: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā tasmiṃ dhammānulome paccayānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2210_3: Tasmā “cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2210_4: Imasmiṃ panokāse “hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ pavatte paccayānulome ete dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo
atk-abh03a:2210_6: Tesu anulome tikapaṭṭhāne kusalattikamattasseva vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2210_7: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2210_8: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2210_9: “Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2212_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya na hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2212_5: evaṃ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo vitthāretabbo”ti vatvā puna pariyosāne “yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2213_1: cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti etthāpi dve paccanīyāni –
atk-abh03a:2213_3: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “na kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2213_4: na kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2213_5: “Nahetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ paccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2213_7: cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2213_8: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2213_9: Tasmā “cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammapaccanīye tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2213_10: Imasmiṃ panokāse na hetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayapaccanīye ete dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2213_11: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.

atk-abh03a:2216_6: Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sattavīsādhikāni ekādasa pucchāsatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:2216_7: Dumūlake pana hetārammaṇapadānaṃ sesesu dvāvīsatiyā paccayesu ekekena saddhiṃ yojanāvasena dvāvīsati
atk-abh03a:2216_8: anulomapaccanīyānīti evaṃ anulome vuttesu sabbesu ekamūlakādīsu ekekaṃ padaṃ parihāpetvā avasesānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2216_10: Ekamūlakādīsu cettha yā pucchā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā,
atk-abh03a:2217_1: cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva dve anulomapaccanīyāni –
atk-abh03a:2217_3: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2217_4: na kusalo dhammo”ti anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2217_5: “Hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2217_7: cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2217_8: Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2217_9: Tasmā “cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammānulomapaccanīye tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.

atk-abh03a:2217_11: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.

atk-abh03a:2221_4: kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyānulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomaṃ nāma.
atk-abh03a:2221_5: “Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ paccayapaccanīyānulomadesanāvasena

atk-abh03a:2221_12: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2222_0: Tesu anulomatikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassapi vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2222_1: Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2222_2: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassapi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2222_3: “Cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayapaccanīyānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā.
atk-abh03a:2228_1: Idāni yā etā paṇṇattivāre kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ ādiṃ katvā nayamattaṃ dassentena aparimāṇā pucchā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2228_2: Tattha kusalākusalādīnaṃ sahuppattiyā abhāvato yā pucchā “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati
atk-abh03a:2228_5: tāyeva vissajjetuṃ ayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādinā nayena paṭiccavārassa niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2229_1: sace imā hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā sabbaso vissajjanaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2229_6: Tathā dassiyamānā pana sabbesu tikadukapaṭṭhānādīsu ekekasmiṃ tike, duke, dukatike, tikaduke, tikatike,
atk-abh03a:2229_7: dukaduke ca saṅkhepaṃ akatvā dassetabbāyeva bhaveyyuṃ. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a:2229_10: Dhammānulomapaccanīye ca tikapaṭṭhāne vitakkattikapītittikānaṃ vissajjane sabbāpetā vissajjanaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2229_11: tasmā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ekekasmiṃ tike yattakāhi pucchāhi bhavitabbaṃ sabbā kusalattike dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2229_12: Evaṃ dassitāsu hi yā tattha vissajjanaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2229_14: tā vuccamānā sakkā sukhena vijānitunti sukhena vijānanatthaṃ sabbāpi kusalattike dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2230_0: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti catubhūmakakusaladhammesu vedanākkhandhādibhedaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2230_2: tena saddhiṃ ekato uppattibhāvaṃ upagantvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2230_3: Kusalo dhammoti catubhūmakakusaladhammesuyeva saññākkhandhādibhedo eko dhammo.
atk-abh03a:2230_4: Uppajjatīti uppādato yāva nirodhagamanā uddhaṃ pajjati,
atk-abh03a:2230_7: uppādādayo tayopi khaṇe pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2231_0: Evaṃ “uppajjeyyā”ti pucchāya “uppajjatī”ti vissajjanaṃ vatvā idāni yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yo dhammo uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2231_1: taṃ dhammaṃ khandhavasena dassetuṃ kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2231_2: Tattha ekanti vedanādīsu catūsu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2231_3: Tayo khandhāti yo yo paccayabhāvena gahito,
atk-abh03a:2231_4: taṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā tayo khandhā.
atk-abh03a:2231_5: Tayo khandheti vedanādīsu yo eko khandho uppajjatīti gahito,
atk-abh03a:2231_7: Dve khandheti vedanāsaññādukādīsu chasu dukesu yekeci dve khandhe paṭicca.
atk-abh03a:2231_8: Dve khandhāti ye ye paccayabhāvena gahitā,
atk-abh03a:2231_9: te te ṭhapetvā avasesā dve khandhā kusalahetunā hetupaccayabhāvaṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2232_0: Yasmā pana eko khandho ekasseva dvinnaṃyeva vā,
atk-abh03a:2232_1: dve vā pana ekasseva paccayo nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:2232_4: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2232_5: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjatītiādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2232_6: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti idaṃ paṭiccatthassa sahajātatthattā yaṃ kusalena sahajātañceva hetupaccayañca labhati,
atk-abh03a:2233_1: rūpena saddhiṃ anuppattito āruppavipākañca na gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇeti kaṭattārūpasaṅkhātassa abyākatassa abyākataṃ paṭicca uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_5: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti idaṃ kaṭattārūpaggahaṇena vatthumhi gahitepi vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhānaṃ uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2234_0: Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2234_1: Ekaṃ khandhantiādīsu vuttanayeneva panettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2234_2: Evaṃ rūpābyākatamhi bhūte paṭicca bhūtānaṃ uppattiṃ vatvā idāni bhūte paṭicca upādārūpānaṃ uppattiṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2234_7: Yañhi heṭṭhā “cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpa”nti dassitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2234_8: taṃ na kevalaṃ khandheyeva ca paṭicca uppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2234_9: mahābhūtepi pana paṭicca uppajjatīti dassanatthamidaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2235_0: Kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭiccāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānāva mahābhūtā gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2235_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti ettha pana bhūtarūpampi upādārūpampi gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2235_2: “Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā”tiādinā nayena hi bhūtarūpampi khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2235_8: Iminā upāyena ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi pucchāvissajjanānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2236_1: Ārammaṇapaccaye tāva rūpassa ārammaṇapaccayavasena anuppattito tāsu navasu rūpamissakā pahāya tissova pucchā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2236_2: Teneva ca kāraṇena “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti vatvā “khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2238_0: 56. Anantarasamantaresupi rūpaṃ na labbhatīti ārammaṇapaccaye viya tissova pucchā.
atk-abh03a:2239_2: Heṭṭhā pana paccayavibhaṅge “okkantikkhaṇe”ti āgataṃ tampi iminā saddhiṃ atthato ekaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2239_4: Apica “tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti vacanato okkantīti pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyāvetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2239_6: Idha pana “kaṭattā ca rūpa”ntiādivacanato pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyeva adhippetā.
atk-abh03a:2239_7: Sā hi rūpassapi arūpassapi paccayabhāvañceva paccayuppannabhāvañca saṅgaṇhāti,
atk-abh03a:2239_9: Bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtanti anindriyabaddhesu pathavīpāsāṇādīsu mahābhūtaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2239_10: Paccayavibhaṅgavārasmiñhi cattāro mahābhūtāti ajjhattikañca bāhirañca ekato katvā gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2239_13: tasmā sabbaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2239_14: Asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭiccāti dvisantatisamuṭṭhānabhūtavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2239_15: Mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti idaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2240_2: vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti catunnampi khandhānaṃ ekato vatthunā aññamaññapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2241_2: tasmā yā heṭṭhā paccayavibhaṅgavāre cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ nissayapaccayatā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2241_4: Cakkhāyatanādīni hi purejātāni hutvā paccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:2242_1: Upanissayapaccaye rūpassa upanissayapaccayābhāvā tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2242_3: Tattha kiñcāpi na sabbe kusalākusalābyākatā ārammaṇūpanissayaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2243_1: Purejātapaccaye vatthuṃ purejātapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vatthunā purejātapaccayataṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2243_2: Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhanti ettha yaṃ vipākābyākatassa vatthu okkantikkhaṇe sahajātapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2243_4: Yepi kusalādayo āruppe purejātapaccayaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2243_6: Ārammaṇaṃ pana niyamato purejātapaccayabhāvaṃ na labhati.
atk-abh03a:2243_12: “Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandha”nti desanāya ca sabbāpi viññāṇadhātuyo gahitā,
atk-abh03a:2244_2: tasmā “uppajjati pacchājātapaccayā”ti evaṃ vattabbo ekadhammopi natthīti pacchājātapaccayavasena vissajjanaṃ na kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2245_1: Āsevanapaccaye kāmaṃ sabbā kiriyā āsevanapaccayaṃ na labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2246_8: Sesaṃ na ekantato kammasamuṭṭhānattā upādārūpanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2247_1: Vipākapaccaye kusalākusalaṃ kiriyañca na labbhatīti abyākatavaseneva vissajjanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2247_4: Upādārūpanti tadavasesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vijjamānakaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2248_1: Āhārapaccaye sabbesampi kusalādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca arūpāhāravasena uppatti veditabbā,
atk-abh03a:2248_6: Paccayavibhaṅgavāre āhārapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro dassito,
atk-abh03a:2248_7: idha pana kusalaṃ dhammanti pucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpāhārā dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2249_1: Indriyapaccaye paccayavibhaṅge indriyapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ cakkhundriyādīni dassitāni,
atk-abh03a:2249_2: idha pana kusalādipucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpindriyānaṃ paccayatā dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2252_1: Vippayuttapaccaye vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2252_5: Khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā vippayuttapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2252_7: Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2252_11: Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākatassa paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2254_5: Ime tevīsati paccayāti saṅkhipitvā dassitānaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2254_8: Ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlake paccayānulome paṭiccavārassa kusalattikavissajjane atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2256_1: Idāni ye ettha hetupaccayādīsu ekekasmiṃ paccaye vissajjanavārā laddhā,
atk-abh03a:2256_2: te gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā navātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2256_3: Tattha hetuyā navāti hetupaccaye nava pucchāvissajjanavārā honti.
atk-abh03a:2257_4: Dvādasasu hi paccayesu nava navāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2257_12: Āsevanapaccaye vipākāni ceva vīthicittāni ca na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2257_18: ekaṃ ekakanti sabbesupi tevīsatiyā paccayesu ekūnacattālīsādhikaṃ vārasataṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:2258_1: Evaṃ hetupaccayādike ekamūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetvā ito paresu dumūlakādīsu vitthāradesanaṃ saṅkhipitvā ekamūlake
atk-abh03a:2258_2: dassitāya desanāya labbhamānagaṇanaññeva ādāya vāraparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ dumūlake tāva hetupaccayā ārammaṇe
atk-abh03a:2258_5: bahugaṇanopi paccayo abahugaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇanova hoti.
atk-abh03a:2258_7: Hetuārammaṇaduke ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2258_8: Samānagaṇano pana samānagaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto aparihīnagaṇanova hoti.
atk-abh03a:2258_11: Vipāke ekanti hetuvipākaduke vipāke vuttaṃ ekameva vissajjanaṃ labbhatīti evaṃ tāva dumūlake vāraparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2259_4: Hetārammaṇādhipati tike ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2260_2: tasmā āsevanapaccayā kamme tīṇīti vatvā vipākaṃ aparāmasitvā āhāre tīṇīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2260_11: tasmā taṃ pahāya vipākavasena gaṇanāya dassanatthaṃ anantarāyeva “hetupaccayā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2260_12: vipākapaccayā āhāre eka”nti ekaṃ nayaṃ dassetvā pacchā tevīsatimūlakova dassito.
atk-abh03a:2260_13: Etesu pana dvīsu tevīsatimūlakesu kiñcāpi ekasmiṃ vipākapaccayo natthi,
atk-abh03a:2260_17: Tesu sāsevane āsevanassa vasena sabbattha tīṇeva vissajjanāni,
atk-abh03a:2260_18: savipāke vipākapaccayassa vasena ekamevāti ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2261_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ hetumūlakānantaraṃ “ārammaṇe ṭhitena sabbattha tīṇeva pañhā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2261_1: taṃ ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakepi dumūlakādīsupi sabbattha ārammaṇapade ceva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2261_3: tattha tayova pañhā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2261_4: Vipākapade pana vipākapadena saddhiṃ sesapaccayayojanāsu ca ekova pañho hotīti.
atk-abh03a:2261_5: Iti yaṃ heṭṭhā avocumha “bahugaṇanopi paccayo abahugaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇano hotī”ti,
atk-abh03a:2262_1: Idāni ye ārammaṇādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena ekamūlakādayo dassetabbā,
atk-abh03a:2262_2: tesu ekamūlako tāva hetuekamūlakeneva sadisoti ekasmimpi paccaye na dassito.
atk-abh03a:2262_3: Ārammaṇapaccayavasena pana dumūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi,
atk-abh03a:2262_7: avigate tīṇī”ti vattabbe ye hetupaccayādayo paccayā bahugaṇanā,
atk-abh03a:2262_8: tesaṃ ūnataragaṇanehi ca samānagaṇanehi ca saddhiṃ saṃsandane yā gaṇanā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2262_9: taṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayassa purimabhāge ṭhitampi hetupaccayaṃ pacchimabhāgeva ṭhapetvā “ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2262_11: ārammaṇapaccayo yena yena bahutaragaṇanena vā samānagaṇanena vā paccayena saddhiṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ gacchati,
atk-abh03a:2262_13: Vipākapaccayena pana saddhiṃ saṃsandane ekameva labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2262_14: taṃ vipākapaccayādikāya gaṇanāya āvi bhavissatīti idha na dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2262_16: timūlakādīsupi esāva gaṇanāti ārammaṇapaccayavasena timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
atk-abh03a:2263_0: Idāni adhipatipaccayādivasena dumūlakādīsu gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā hetuyā navātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2263_4: Iti yo yo paccayo ādimhi tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:2263_5: tena tena saddhiṃ samānagaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ādimhi ṭhitassa vasena gaṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a:2263_6: Tena pana saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2263_7: Yathā ca ārammaṇapaccayavasena evaṃ adhipatipaccayavasenāpi tato paresaṃ anantarādīnaṃ vasenāpi timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
atk-abh03a:2263_9: Teneva vuttaṃ “ekekaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakaṃ kātuna sajjhāyamaggena gaṇetabbā”ti.
atk-abh03a:2267_1: Paccayapaccanīyaṃ pana yasmā kusalapade na labbhati kusaladhammassa hetupaccayena vinā anuppattito,
atk-abh03a:2267_3: Tattha nahetupaccayāti hetupaccayapaṭikkhepo hetupaccayaṃ vinā aññena paccayena uppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2267_4: Vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato mohoti ayañhi sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sayaṃ hetupaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2267_5: aññassa pana sampayuttahetuno abhāvā na hetupaccayā uppajjatīti ṭhapetvā hetupaccayaṃ sesehi attano anurūpapaccayehi uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2268_1: Naadhipatipaccaye kāmaṃ adhipatipi attanā saddhiṃ dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvā naadhipatipaccayaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2268_4: Chandādīsu pana aññataraṃ adhipatiṃ akatvā kusalādīnaṃ uppattikāle sabbepi kusalādayo nirādhipatino.
atk-abh03a:2268_5: Tasmā mohaṃ viya visuṃ adhipatimattameva anuddharitvā sabbasaṅgāhikavasena esā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādikā desanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2269_8: Sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayepi hi paccakkhāya ekopi rūpārūpadhammo nuppajjati,
atk-abh03a:2270_1: Naaññamaññapaccayavibhaṅge paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākate khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti hadayavatthuvajjaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2271_3: Arūpaṃ pana kiñcāpi ārammaṇūpanissayapakatūpanissaye na labheyya,
atk-abh03a:2273_6: Pāḷi pana idhāpi naadhipatipaccaye vitthāritavasena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2274_1: Nakammapaccaye vipākacetanā nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ labhatīti na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2275_1: Najhānapaccaye pañcaviññāṇadhammā ceva ekaccañca rūpaṃ paccayuppannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2275_2: Pañcaviññāṇasmiñhi vedanā ca cittekaggatā ca dubbalattā upanijjhānalakkhaṇaṃ na pāpuṇantīti jhānapaccaye na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2278_1: Dumūlake nahetupaccayā nārammaṇe ekanti ettha kiñcāpi bahugaṇanena saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanassa saṃsandane
atk-abh03a:2278_3: Nārammaṇavasena pana arūpadhammānaṃ parihīnattā abyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattiṃ sandhāya “eka”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2278_5: Dveti vuttaṭṭhāne pana nahetuyā laddhavasena vāradvayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2279_1: Timūlakādīsu pana sabbesu nārammaṇapaccayassa aparihīnattā ekameva vissajjananti ayaṃ paccanīye nahetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2280_1: Nārammaṇapaccayādayo pana ekamūlake tāva purimena sadisattā idhāpi na dassitāyeva.
atk-abh03a:2280_4: Nādhipatiyā pañcāti nārammaṇapaccaye laddhavasena veditabbāti evaṃ sabbasaṃsandanesu ūnataragaṇanasseva paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2280_10: Iminā pana lakkhaṇena sabbesu dumūlakādīsu “ayaṃ paccayo mūlaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2280_13: ayaṃ sabbamūlako”ti sallakkhetvā ūnataragaṇanassa paccayassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2283_1: Idāni anulomapaccanīye gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ hetupaccayā nārammaṇe pañcātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2283_2: Tattha hetādhipatimaggapaccayesu anulomato ṭhitesu sahajātādayo cattāro sabbaṭṭhānikapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2283_3: āhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā cattāroti ime aṭṭha paccanīyato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2283_4: Hetupaccayādivasena hi uppajjamāno dhammo ime aṭṭha paccaye alabhanto nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2283_5: Ārammaṇaanantarasamanantaraupanissayasampayuttanatthivigatapaccayesu pana anulomato ṭhitesu arūpaṭṭhānikā paccanīkato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2283_6: Na hi ārammaṇapaccayādīhi uppajjamānā anantarasamanantarapaccayādayo na labhanti.
atk-abh03a:2283_9: Etesañhi paccayānaṃ vasena uppajjamāno sabbaṭṭhānike alabhanto nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2283_11: Evaṃ sesesu anulomato ṭhitesu ye ca labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2283_13: te sallakkhetvā sabbesupi dumūlakādīsu nayesu tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:2286_1: Idāni paccanīyānulome gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dvetiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2286_2: Tattha hetumhi paccanīkato ṭhite ṭhapetvā adhipatiṃ avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2286_3: Pacchājāto pana anulomato sabbattheva na labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2286_5: tesu purejātañca āsevanañca ṭhapetvā avasesesu sattasu paccanīkato ṭhitesu sesā arūpaṭṭhānikā anulomato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2286_9: sabbavipāko ca saddhiṃ kiriyamanodhātuyā āsevanato anuppajjamānopi anantarādayo labhati,
atk-abh03a:2287_0: Purejātapacchājātaāsevanavipākavippayuttesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ekaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2287_1: Kammapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite ṭhapetvā vipākapaccayaṃ avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2287_2: Āhārindriyesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ṭhapetvā sabbaṭṭhānike ceva aññamaññakammāhārindriyapaccaye ca avasesā anulomato na labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2287_6: Maggapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite hetādhipatipaccayā anulomato na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2287_7: Vippayuttapaccaye paccanīkato ṭhite purejātapaccayaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā anulomato labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2287_8: Evaṃ tesu tesu paccayesu paccanīkato ṭhitesu ye ye anulomato na labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2287_9: te te ñatvā tesaṃ tesaṃ paccayānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃ vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2288_1: Dumūlakādīsu ca nayesu yaṃ yaṃ paccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ye ye dukādayo dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2288_2: te te labbhamānālabbhamānapaccayavasena yathā yathā dassitā,
atk-abh03a:2288_4: Tattha yaṃ nahetuvasena dumūlakādayo naye dassentena nahetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayā…pe…
atk-abh03a:2288_5: nāsevanapaccayāti vatvā “yāva āsevanā sabbaṃ sadisa”nti vuttaṃ. Tassa,
atk-abh03a:2288_7: Yaṃ pana “nakamme gaṇite pañca gaṇhātī”ti sīhaḷabhāsāya likhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2288_9: nahetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā nakammapaccayāti evaṃ nakammapaccayena ghaṭite sahajāte ekanti evaṃ dassitā pañceva paccayā anulomato labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2288_11: Evaṃ aññesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā adhippetatthoyeva gahetabbo.
atk-abh03a:2288_12: Evarūpañhi byañjanaṃ attano saññānibandhanatthaṃ porāṇehi sakasakabhāsāya likhitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2289_0: Apica imasmiṃ paccanīyānulome paccayuppannadhammesupi atthi dhammo kammapaccayaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2289_2: So asaññesu ceva pañcavokāre pavatte ca rūpajīvitindriyavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2289_12: Ahetuke adhipatipaccayo natthīti imesampi pakiṇṇakānaṃ vasenettha gaṇanavāro asammohato veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2290_1: nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dveti ettha tāva ahetukamoho ceva ahetukavipākakiriyā ca paccayuppannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2291_1: Nārammaṇamūlake hetuyā pañcāti rūpameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2291_2: Tañhi kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākataṃ kusalābyākataṃ akusalābyākatañcāti pañca koṭṭhāse paṭicca uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2291_4: Aññamaññe ekanti bhūtarūpāni ceva vatthuñca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2292_1: Nādhipatimūlake hetuyā navāti anulome hetumhi vuttāneva.
atk-abh03a:2292_3: Timūlake dveti heṭṭhā nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe vuttasadisāneva.
atk-abh03a:2293_1: Napurejātamūlake hetuyā sattāti heṭṭhā “āruppe kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā nayena purejāte dassitāneva.
atk-abh03a:2293_4: Tasmā kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākatañca paṭicca uppattiṃ sandhāya tīṇīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2293_5: Iminā nayena “ekaṃ dve tīṇi pañca satta navā”ti āgataṭṭhānesu gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2293_6: “Cattāri cha aṭṭhā”ti imā pana tisso gaṇanā natthevāti.
atk-abh03a:2297_1: Sahajātavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajātoti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca tena sahajāto hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2297_4: sahajātattaṃ nāma paṭiccatta”nti idaṃ ubhinnampi etesaṃ vārānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2297_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu hi asahajātampi paṭicca uppajjatīti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:2297_8: Sahajātampi ca upādārūpaṃ bhūtarūpassa paccayo na hoti.
atk-abh03a:2297_10: sahajātavārena ca paṭiccāti vuttassa sahajātabhāvaṃ niyametuṃ ubhopete vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2297_11: Apica tathā bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanāvilāsena niruttipaṭisambhidāppabhedajānanavasena cāpi ete ubhopi vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:2300_1: Paccayavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayāti kusaladhamme patiṭṭhito hutvā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissayaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2300_2: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayāti kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ nissayapaccayaṃ katvā tayo khandhā uppajjanti hetupaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2300_4: Vatthuṃ paccayā vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā khandhāti idaṃ pañcavokāre pavattivasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2300_5: Pañcavokāre pavattiyañhi khandhānaṃ purejātaṃ vatthu nissayapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2300_6: Paṭiccaṭṭhassa pana sahajātaṭṭhattā paṭiccavāre esa nayo na labbhatīti paṭisandhiyaṃ sahajātameva vatthuṃ sandhāya “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2300_7: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2301_0: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato cāti kusalābyākatānaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2301_2: cittasamuṭṭhāne ca mahābhūte nissāya cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ upādārūpaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2301_3: Iti paccayabhūtassa abyākatassa nānattepi paccayuppannānaṃ hetupaccayavasena ekato uppattiṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2301_5: Evaṃ imasmiṃ hetupaccaye sahajātañca purejātañca nissayaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvā sattarasa pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2301_6: Tattha khandhā ceva bhūtā ca sahajātavasena,
atk-abh03a:2301_10: Ye panete ettha sattarasa pañhā vissajjitā,
atk-abh03a:2301_11: tesu ekādike ekāvasāne vissajjane kusalādīsu ekapaccayato eko paccayuppanno.
atk-abh03a:2302_2: Yaṃ panetaṃ ārammaṇapaccaye vatthuṃ paccayā khandhāti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2302_4: Cakkhuviññāṇādīni abyākataṃ nissāya ārammaṇapaccayena uppajjantānaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:2302_5: Puna vatthuṃ paccayāti pavatte vipākakiriyābyākatānaṃ uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2302_7: Evaṃ imasmiṃ ārammaṇapaccaye sahajātañca purejātañca paccayaṃ katvā satta pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2305_1: Aññamaññapaccaye ca yathā ārammaṇapaccayā evanti vissajjanasamataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2308_1: Kammapaccaye tīṇīti kusalaṃ paccayā kusalo abyākato kusalābyākato cāti evaṃ tīṇi veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:2309_1: Vippayuttapaccaye khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe nissāya vippayuttapaccayā uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2309_2: Khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti khandhā vatthuṃ nissāya vippayuttapaccayā uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2310_1: Idāni yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā sattarasātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2310_4: kusalena kusalābyākatanti evaṃ kusalavasena ekādikāni ekāvasānāni dve,
atk-abh03a:2312_5: ekaṃ ekakanti te sabbe sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā parato dukatikādivasena paccayasaṃsandane ūnataragaṇanassa vasena gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2312_6: Sakkā hi imāya gaṇanāya dukamūlādīsu vāraparicchede jānitunti puna “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo”ti
atk-abh03a:2312_7: anāmasitvā gaṇanavaseneva vāraparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇe sattātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2313_0: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2313_1: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhāti iminā nayena ārammaṇe laddhavissajjanāni vitthāretabbāni.
atk-abh03a:2314_1: Paccanīye pana kusalaṃ na labbhatīti akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayāti akusalameva ādiṃ katvā vissajjanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2315_1: Yaṃ panetaṃ paccanīye laddhavissajjanaparicchedaṃ gaṇanato dassetuṃ nahetuyā cattārītiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2315_5: Tesaṃ vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2315_6: Yo hi paccayo sattarasa vissajjanāni labhati,
atk-abh03a:2315_9: Evaṃ sesesupi adhikaparicchedaṃ ṭhapetvā samasamā ūnatarā ca labbhantīti.
atk-abh03a:2316_0: Ettha ca adhikatarā na labbhantīti ayamettha niyamo.
atk-abh03a:2316_1: Samasamā pana ūnatarā ca atthā virodhe sati labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2316_4: nārammaṇe pañcannaṃ āgatattā nahetuvasena cattārīti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:2316_5: nārammaṇena saddhiṃ ghaṭitattā pana ārammaṇadhammo virujjhatīti akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo,
atk-abh03a:2316_7: akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusaloti tīṇi vissajjanāni parihīnāni.
atk-abh03a:2316_8: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākatoti rūpavasena ekameva vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2316_9: Evaṃ sabbattha viruddhāviruddhaṃ ñatvā labbhamānaparicchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2317_0: Nānantare ekanti ahetukacittasamuṭṭhānassa ceva sesarūpassa ca vasena abyākatena abyākataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2317_2: Napurejāte dveti idhāpi nahetuvasena cattārīti vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-abh03a:2317_3: napurejātena saddhiṃ ghaṭitattā pana abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo,
atk-abh03a:2317_4: akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paccayā akusaloti vatthupurejātavasena dve vissajjanāni parihīnāni.
atk-abh03a:2317_5: Āruppe pana ahetukamohassa ahetukakiriyassa ca vasena dve vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:2317_7: Nonatthi novigatesu ekanti sabbassa rūpassa vasena abyākatena abyākataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2318_1: Nārammaṇamūlake pana naadhipatiyā pañcāti nārammaṇe laddhāneva.
atk-abh03a:2318_2: Nakamme ekanti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānañca kaṭattārūpañca aggahetvā sesarūpavasena abyākatena abyākataṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2319_2: Napacchājāte sattarasāti imānipi tattha laddhāni sattaraseva.
atk-abh03a:2319_4: Imināva nayamattadassanena sabbattha āgatānāgataṃ labbhamānālabbhamānañca veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:2321_1: Imināyeva pana lakkhaṇena anulomaṃ purato katvā anulomapaccanīye paccanīyaṃ purato katvā paccanīyānulome
atk-abh03a:2324_1: Nissayavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāyāti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena nissayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2324_4: nissayattaṃ nāma paccayatta”nti idaṃ ubhinnampi etesaṃ vārānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2324_5: Atthato hi etepi paṭiccasahajātā viya ninnānākaraṇā.
atk-abh03a:2324_7: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu hi anissāya vattamānaṃ nānākkhaṇikampi “paccayā uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2324_8: Aññamaññaṃ allīyitvā ṭhitakaṭṭhādīsu ca ekaṃ ekassa nissayapaccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2324_9: tathā upādārūpaṃ mahābhūtassa nissayapaccayo na hotiyeva.
atk-abh03a:2324_10: Iti paccayavārena nissayapaccayabhāvaṃ nissayavārena ca paccayāti vuttassa sahajātapurejātabhāvaṃ niyametuṃ ubhopete vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2324_11: Apica tathā bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanāvilāsena niruttipaṭisambhidāpabhedajānanavasena cāpi ete ubhopi vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:2327_1: Saṃsaṭṭhavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭhoti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ ekuppādādilakkhaṇena sampayogaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2327_2: Kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhoti kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ sampayuttapaccayaṃ katvā tayo khandhā uppajjanti hetupaccayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:2327_4: Imasmiṃ pana hetupaccaye arūpadhammasseva sampayogaṭṭhena paccayaṃ katvā tayo pañhā vissajjitā.
atk-abh03a:2328_1: Idāni yathāladdhāni vissajjanāni gaṇanavasena dassetuṃ hetuyā tīṇītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2328_5: Ekake pana abyākatena abyākatameva labbhatīti evamettha bāvīsatiyā paccayesu tīṇi,
atk-abh03a:2328_8: Tasmā tīṇi ekanti imesaññeva vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane yattha vipākapaccayo pavisati;
atk-abh03a:2329_1: Paccanīye pana kusalaṃ na labbhatīti akusalameva ādiṃ katvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2330_1: Yaṃ panettha paccanīye vissajjanaparicchedaṃ gaṇanato dassetuṃ nahetuyā dvetiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2330_2: tattha dve tīṇi ekanti tayo paricchedā.
atk-abh03a:2330_3: Tesaṃ vasena dukatikādīsu paccayasaṃsandane gaṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2330_4: Idhāpi adhikataragaṇanānaṃ ūnataragaṇanena saddhiṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanameva labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2330_10: tesupi vipāke paccayuppanne nakammanavipākā na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2331_1: Nahetupaccayā nādhipatiyā dveti nahetuyā laddhaṃ dvayameva.
atk-abh03a:2331_3: Nakamme ekanti ahetukakiriyacetanaṃ paccayuppannaṃ katvā abyākatena abyākataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2332_1: Anulomapaccanīye heṭṭhā vuttā nahetuādayo daseva paccanīyato labbhanti, na sesā.
atk-abh03a:2332_3: tesu hetumhi anulomato ṭhite jhānamaggā paccanīyato na labbhantīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:2333_4: Nakammapaccayā nahetupaccayā nādhipatipaccayā napurejātapaccayā ārammaṇe ekanti āruppe ahetukakiriyacetanāvasena abyākatena abyākataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2336_1: Sampayuttavāre kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayuttoti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayuttapaccayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2336_4: sampayuttattaṃ nāma saṃsaṭṭhatta”nti idaṃ ubhinnampi etesaṃ vārānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2336_5: Atthato hi etepi paṭiccasahajātā viya paccayanissayā viya ca ninnānākaraṇā.
atk-abh03a:2336_7: “Saṃsaṭṭhā yojitā hayā”tiādīsu hi asampayuttampi saṃsaṭṭhanti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:2336_8: “Yā sā vīmaṃsā kosajjasahagatā kosajjasampayuttā”tiādīsu asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vokiṇṇampi sampayuttanti.
atk-abh03a:2336_9: Iti saṃsaṭṭhavārena ekuppādalakkhaṇassa sampayuttassa saṃsaṭṭhabhāvaṃ sampayuttavārena ca saṃsaṭṭhassa
atk-abh03a:2336_11: Apica tathā bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanāvilāsena niruttipaṭisambhidāpabhedajānanavasena cāpi ete ubhopi vuttāti.
atk-abh03a:2338_0: Etesu pana chasu vāresu atthi koci paccayo ekantaṃ anulomato na tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a:2340_1: Pañhāvāre “siyā kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā kusalattike uddharitabbapucchānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2340_2: labbhamānavasena vissajjanaṃ dassetuṃ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2340_3: Kusalo ca nāmesa sayaṃ uppajjanto ṭhapetvā pacchājātañca vipākañca sesehi dvāvīsatiyā paccayehi uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2340_4: Kusalassa paccayo honto ṭhapetvā purejātapacchājātavipākavippayutte sesehi vīsatiyā paccayehi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2340_5: Tasmā yehi paccayehi kusalo kusalassa paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2340_6: te paccaye paṭipāṭiyā dassetuṃ hetupaccayenātiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2341_0: Tattha yā esā paccayavibhaṅgavāre viya “hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammāna”nti akatvā “hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”nti desanā katā,
atk-abh03a:2341_2: tattha hi suññaṭṭhaṃ dīpetuṃ dhammānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2341_3: Idha paccayato uppajjamānā dhammā rāsito uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a:2341_4: na ekekatoti rāsaṭṭhaṃ dīpetuṃ khandhānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2341_5: Paṭiccavārādīsu vā khandhavasena paccayuppannadesanā āruḷhāti tenevānukkamena idhāpi āruḷhāti.
atk-abh03a:2341_8: “Ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sesā dhammā”ti hi ādinā nayena vuccamāne asukadhammaṃ nāma nissāya asukadhammāti
atk-abh03a:2341_9: na sakkā asaṅkarato paccaye paccayuppanne ca jānituṃ,
atk-abh03a:2341_11: Tasmā asaṅkarato vibhāgadassanatthaṃ evaṃ āruḷhāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2341_12: Cittasamuṭṭhānānanti idaṃ yassa abyākatassa kusalo hetupaccayena paccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2341_14: Paccayavibhaṅge pana kusalādivasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā sāmaññato sabbesaṃ hetūnaṃ vasena uppannarūpadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:2341_18: Iminā upāyena sesesupi evarūpesu vissajjanesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2342_4: Datvāti taṃ cetanaṃ pariyodāpetvā visuddhaṃ katvā.
atk-abh03a:2342_7: Sampattaviratisamucchedaviratiyo pana loke sīlanti apākaṭattā na vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2342_10: Tattha samucchedavirati sekkhānaṃyeva kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-abh03a:2342_13: na cādinnamādiye”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ uposathadivasesu aṭṭhaṅgauposathakiriyaṃ katvā.
atk-abh03a:2342_14: Taṃ paccavekkhatīti taṃ kusalaṃ sekkhopi puthujjanopi paccavekkhati,
atk-abh03a:2342_16: Arahatopi hi pubbe kataṃ kusalaṃ kusalameva,
atk-abh03a:2342_19: Tasmā “etaṃ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassā”ti imasmiṃ adhikāre na labbhati.
atk-abh03a:2342_20: Pubbe suciṇṇānīti “datvā samādiyitvā katvā”ti hi āsanne katāni vuttāni,
atk-abh03a:2342_22: Dānādīhi vā sesāni kāmāvacarakusalāni dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2342_27: Vodānanti idaṃ pana sakadāgāmianāgāmino sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2342_28: Tesañhi taṃ cittaṃ vodānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:2342_30: Maggā vuṭṭhahitvāti maggaphalabhavaṅgātikkamavasena attanā paṭiladdhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā,
atk-abh03a:2342_31: suddhamaggatoyeva pana vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:2343_0: Kusalaṃ aniccatoti ettha vipassanūpagaṃ tebhūmakakusalameva veditabbaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2343_4: Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassātiādīhi puggalaṃ anāmasitvā dhammavasena dasseti.
atk-abh03a:2343_5: Tenevettha heṭṭhā gahitampi cetopariyañāṇaṃ puna vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2344_1: Assādetīti somanassasahagatalobhasampayuttacittehi anubhavati ceva rajjati ca.
atk-abh03a:2344_4: Rāgo uppajjatīti assādentassa rāgo uppajjati nāma.
atk-abh03a:2344_6: Diṭṭhi uppajjatīti abhinandantassa attā attaniyantiādivasena catūhipi cittehi sampayuttā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2344_9: akataṃ vata me kalyāṇanti vippaṭisārino domanassaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2344_10: Taṃ ārabbhāti tāni suciṇṇāni ārammaṇaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2345_1: Arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvāti maggavīthiyaṃ phalānantarassa bhavaṅgassa atikkamavasena vuṭṭhahitvā.
atk-abh03a:2345_3: Evaṃ kiriyābyākatassa ārammaṇapaccayaṃ dassetvā puna vipākābyākatassa dassetuṃ sekkhā vātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2345_7: taṃ kusalassa javanassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vipassitakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2345_10: Vipāko hi kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā gahitapaṭisandhikassa kusalārammaṇo hotiyeva,
atk-abh03a:2345_11: so pana dubbiññeyyattā idha na dassito.
atk-abh03a:2346_0: Kusalaṃ assādetītiādi akusalajavanāvasāne kusalārammaṇavipākaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2346_1: Viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassāti idaṃ dubbiññeyyampi samānaṃ mahaggatavipākassa tadārammaṇabhāvena anuppattito labbhamānakavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2346_2: Kiriyassāti arahattaṃ patvā asamāpannapubbe ākāsānañcāyatane paṭilomato vā ekantarikavasena vā samāpannakiriyāya.
atk-abh03a:2346_5: tassā kusalā khandhā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti ayañhettha attho.
atk-abh03a:2347_1: Rāganti attano vā parassa vā rāgaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2347_2: Attano rāgavasena panettha vaṇṇanā pākaṭā hoti.
atk-abh03a:2347_4: Vicikicchādīsu pana tīsu assādetabbatāya abhāvena “assādetī”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2347_6: sā assādetīti padassa parihīnattā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ na vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2347_7: Vicikicchādīsuyeva taṃ taṃ sabhāgaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa tassa anantarā vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2347_8: Imesu ca pana rāgādīsu “kiṃ me pāpadhammā uppajjantī”ti akkhantivasena vā,
atk-abh03a:2347_9: “kataṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ luddha”nti vippaṭisārādivasena vā domanassuppatti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2348_1: Cakkhuṃ aniccatoti vipassanānukkamena oḷārikāyatanāni vatthurūpañcāti ekādasa rūpāni pākaṭattā gahitāni.
atk-abh03a:2349_1: Phalaṃ paccavekkhanti nibbānaṃ paccavekkhantīti paccavekkhaṇakusalassa ārammaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2350_3: Arahato uttamadhammaṃ adhigatattā lokiyakusalesu garukāro natthīti aggamaggova dassito.
atk-abh03a:2351_1: Anantarapaccaye purimā purimāti ekabhūmakāpi nānābhūmakāpi kusalā ekato katvā vuttā.
atk-abh03a:2351_6: Kusalaṃ vuṭṭhānassāti ettha pana kusalanti tebhūmakakusalaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2351_14: Maggo phalassāti idaṃ yasmā lokuttaravipākaṃ javanavīthipariyāpannattā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2351_16: Anulomaṃ sekkhāyāti asekkhāya kusalaṃ anantaraṃ na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2351_27: Iti ye heṭṭhā paccayavibhaṅganiddese “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2351_35: tesaṃ vasena idha saṅkhepato anantarapaccayo vibhatto.
atk-abh03a:2355_0: Ayañhi anantarapaccayo na kevalaṃ sattadhāva niddesaṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2355_4: kiriyaṃ kusalassa akusalassa vipākassa kiriyassāti evaṃ dasadhāpi niddesaṃ labhati.
atk-abh03a:2355_10: kiriyaṃ kiriyassa kusalassa akusalassa kusalavipākassa akusalavipākassāti evaṃ sattarasadhā niddesaṃ labhati.
atk-abh03a:2356_0: Na kevalañca sattarasadhāva samasaṭṭhividhenāpi niddesaṃ labhateva. Kathaṃ?
atk-abh03a:2356_1: Kāmāvacarakusalañhi bhūmibhedena catubbidhassa kusalassa anantarapaccayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:2356_2: rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ sakasakabhūmikassevāti kusalaṃ kusalassa chabbidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2356_3: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ pana kāmāvacarakusalavipākassa akusalavipākassa rūpāvacaravipākassa arūpāvacaravipākassa lokuttaravipākassa;
atk-abh03a:2356_6: lokuttarakusalaṃ lokuttaravipākassāti kusalaṃ vipākassa dvādasavidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2356_7: Akusalaṃ akusalassa akusalavipākassa tebhūmakakusalavipākassāti pañcavidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2357_7: Evaṃ sabbathāpi vipākaṃ vipākassa pañcadasavidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2357_11: tathā arūpāvacaravipākañcāti vipākaṃ kiriyassa ca catubbidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2358_1: rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakiriyaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarānaññevāti kiriyaṃ kiriyassa pañcavidhena anantarapaccayo.
atk-abh03a:2358_5: Kāmāvacarakiriyaṃ pana kāmāvacarakusalassa akusalassāti kusalākusalānaṃ duvidhena anantarapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2359_3: catunnañca rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ pādakayogena soḷasannaṃ somanassalokuttarānanti ekavīsatiyā ca kusalānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2359_6: phalasamāpattivasena pavattānaṃ dvādasannaṃ lokuttaravipākānanti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā kusalānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:2359_7: dvattiṃsāya vipākānanti tepaññāsāya cittānaṃ anantarapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2359_9: Tatiyacatutthāni pana ṭhapetvā uparibhūmakakusalāni ca lokuttaravipākāni ca sesaekavīsaticittānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2360_0: Pañca rūpāvacarakusalāni attano attano pacchimānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2360_3: Eteneva ca nayena arūpāvacarakusalesu paṭhamaṃ attano vipākena saddhiṃ ekādasannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2360_6: catutthaṃ cuddasannaṃ phalasamāpattiyā cāti pannarasannaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ attano attano vipākasseva.
atk-abh03a:2360_7: Aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu ekekaṃ akusalaṃ ekādasannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ navannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2360_8: mahaggatavipākānaṃ attano attano pacchimassa cāti ekavīsatiyā.
atk-abh03a:2360_9: Dve domanassasahagatāni upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti sattannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2360_11: navannaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti ekavīsatiyā.
atk-abh03a:2361_2: Tāsu dvīsu somanassasahagatā dasannaṃ vipākamanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ bhavaṅgabhūtānaṃ tadārammaṇakāle attano
atk-abh03a:2361_9: Pañca rūpāvacaravipākā tebhūmakakusalavipākasahetukapaṭisandhicittānaṃ sattarasannaṃ āvajjanadvayassa cāti ekūnavīsatiyā.
atk-abh03a:2361_11: catunnaṃ arūpāvacaravipākacittānaṃ catunnaṃ manodvārāvajjanassa cāti navannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2361_14: catutthaṃ tīṇi heṭṭhimāni vajjetvā channaṃ cattāri lokuttaravipākāni tihetukavipākānaṃ terasannaṃ attano attano pacchimassa cāti cuddasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2362_2: Sā tadārammaṇakāle attano pacchimassa cutikāle paṭisandhivasena bhavaṅgavasena ca pavattānaṃ itaresampi
atk-abh03a:2362_3: navannaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ dvinnaṃ parittakiriyānañcāti dvādasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2362_4: Kiriyamanodhātu dasannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ hasituppādakiriyā pañcavokāre bhavaṅgavasena pavattānaṃ navannaṃ tihetukavipākānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2362_5: tadārammaṇavasena pavattānaṃ pañcannaṃ somanassasahagatavipākānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti aggahitaggahaṇena terasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2362_7: kāmāvacarakusalākusalānaṃ pañcavokāre bhavaṅgavasena pavattānaṃ pannarasannaṃ vipākacittānañcāti pañcacattālīsāya.
atk-abh03a:2363_1: tadārammaṇavasena pañcannaṃ somanassasahagatavipākānaṃ parikammavasena pavattamānānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2363_2: arahattaphalasamāpattiyā attano pacchimassa cāti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāvīsatiyā duhetukasomanassasahagatakiriyadvayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2363_3: yathāvuttānaṃ terasannaṃ bhavaṅgacittānaṃ pañcannaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti aggahitaggahaṇena
atk-abh03a:2363_7: parikammavasena pavattānaṃ ekissā rūpāvacarakiriyāya catunnaṃ arūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattiyā
atk-abh03a:2363_9: Duhetukaupekkhāsahagatakiriyadvayaṃ tesaṃyeva terasannaṃ bhavaṅgānaṃ channaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti aggahitaggahaṇena aṭṭhārasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2363_10: Rūpāvacarakiriyesu ekekaṃ navannaṃ pañcavokāre tihetukabhavaṅgānaṃ attano pacchimassa cāti dasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2363_12: catuvokāre ekassa attano pacchimassa cāti ekādasannaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2363_15: catutthaṃ cattāri phalasamāpattiñcāti tesu ekekaṃ yathāpaṭipāṭiyā ekādasannaṃ dvādasannaṃ terasannaṃ pañcadasannañca anantarapaccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2367_1: Upanissaye saddhaṃ upanissāyāti kammakammaphalaidhalokaparalokādīsu saddhaṃ upanissayaṃ katvā.
atk-abh03a:2367_2: Yathā hi puriso heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ udakaṃ atthīti saddahitvā pathaviṃ khanati,
atk-abh03a:2367_3: evaṃ saddho kulaputto dānādīnaṃ phalañca ānisaṃsañca saddahitvā dānādīni pavatteti.
atk-abh03a:2368_0: Sīlaṃ upanissāyātiādīsupi ime sīlādayo dhamme upanissayaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:2368_1: Sīlavā hi sīlānubhāvesu sīlānisaṃsesu ca kusalo sīlaṃ upanissāya sīlavantānaṃ dānaṃ deti,
atk-abh03a:2368_5: Bahussutopi dānādipuññakiriyāyattā sabbasampattiyo dānādīnañca saṅkilesavodānādibhedaṃ sutamayāya paññāya
atk-abh03a:2368_6: paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito sutaṃ upanissāya dānādīni pavatteti.
atk-abh03a:2368_7: Cāgavāpi cāgādhimutto attano cāgasampadaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti,
atk-abh03a:2368_8: sīlavanto hutvā dinnaṃ mahapphalanti sīlaṃ samādiyati,
atk-abh03a:2368_11: Paññavāpi idhalokaparalokahitañceva lokasamatikkamanupāyañca upaparikkhanto “sakkā imāya paṭipattiyā
atk-abh03a:2368_12: idhalokahitampi paralokahitampi lokasamatikkamanūpāyañca sampādetu”nti paññaṃ upanissāya dānādīni pavatteti.
atk-abh03a:2368_13: Yasmā pana na kevalaṃ saddhādayo dānādīnaṃyeva upanissayā,
atk-abh03a:2368_14: attano aparabhāge uppajjamānānaṃ saddhādīnampi upanissayā eva,
atk-abh03a:2368_15: tasmā saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā saddhāya sīlassa sutassa cāgassa paññāyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2369_0: Parikammanti anantaraṃ aggahetvā pubbabhāge parikammaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2369_4: tasmiṃ ijjhamāne ijjhanti evaṃ santepi tadadhimuttatāya sahitaṃ dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ tesaṃ parikammanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2369_5: Na hi etāni sabbesaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ samagatikāni honti.
atk-abh03a:2369_7: Dibbacakkhu dibbāya sotadhātuyāti dūre rūpāni disvā tesaṃ saddaṃ sotukāmassa dibbacakkhu sotadhātuvisuddhiyā upanissayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2369_8: Tesaṃ pana saddaṃ sutvā tattha gantukāmatādivasena dibbasotadhātu iddhividhañāṇassa upanissayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2369_9: Evaṃ sabbattha tassa tassa upakārakabhāvavasena upanissayapaccayatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2370_0: Maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattinti tena tena maggena sithilīkatapāripanthakattā pahīnapāripanthakattā
atk-abh03a:2370_1: ca taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ uppādentīti tesaṃ maggo samāpattiyā upanissayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2370_4: Evaṃiddhānañca panetāsaṃ pacchā tesu tesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyā maggova upanissayo nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:2371_0: Saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappetīti ahamasmi saddho pasannoti mānaṃ pavatteti.
atk-abh03a:2371_1: Diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vacane saddhāvaseneva gantvā paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhanto “atthi puggalo”tiādivasena diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:2371_2: Sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgaṃ paññanti ahamasmi sīlavā sutavā cāgī paññāsampannoti mānaṃ jappeti.
atk-abh03a:2371_3: Sīlasutacāgapaññāsu pana mānamaññanaṃ viya diṭṭhimaññanaṃ uppādento diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:2371_4: Rāgassātiādīsu saddhādisampadaṃ upanissāya attukkaṃsanakāle tesu ekeko dhammo rāgassa,
atk-abh03a:2371_10: Lokuttaraṃ pana santaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ akusalaviddhaṃsanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2371_11: Tasmā cando viya andhakāratamānaṃ na akusalassa upanissayo hotīti na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2372_1: Saddho hi saddhaṃ nissāya atisītaṃ atiuṇhanti anosakkitvā nānappakārāni navakammaveyyāvaccādīni karonto attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti,
atk-abh03a:2372_2: bhogaṃ uppādetvā puññāni karissāmīti pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-abh03a:2372_3: Sīlavāpi sīlānurakkhaṇatthaṃ abbhokāsikattādivasena attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti,
atk-abh03a:2372_5: Sutavāpi bāhussaccānurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjissāmīti vuttanayeneva paṭipajjanto attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti,
atk-abh03a:2372_7: Cāgavāpi cāgādhimuttatāya attano yāpanamattepi paccaye anavasesetvā pariccajanto,
atk-abh03a:2372_8: aṅgādipariccāgaṃ vā pana karonto attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti,
atk-abh03a:2372_9: pariccajitabbassa vatthuno uppādanatthaṃ pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-abh03a:2372_10: Paññavāpi uparūpari paññaṃ vaḍḍhessāmīti sappaññataṃ nissāya sītuṇhādīni agaṇetvā sajjhāyamanasikāresu yogaṃ karonto attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti,
atk-abh03a:2372_11: micchājīve ādīnavaṃ sammājīve ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā micchājīvaṃ pahāya parisuddhena ājīvena jīvitavuttiṃ
atk-abh03a:2373_0: Kāyikassa sukhassāti saddhādisampattiṃ upanissāya uppannāni sukhopakaraṇāni paribhuñjanakāle saddhādisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
atk-abh03a:2373_1: ca tesaṃ vasena avippaṭisāramūlakapāmojjapītisamuṭṭhānarūpaphuṭakāyassa ca sukhuppattikāle tesaṃ kaṭattā
atk-abh03a:2373_3: vuttanayeneva dukkhuppattikāle saddhādiguṇasampattiṃ asahamānehi payuttavadhabandhanādikāle ca kāyikassa dukkhassa,
atk-abh03a:2373_4: saddhādayo upanissāya pavattitaphalasamāpattikāle pana phalasamāpattiyā etesu ekeko upanissayapaccayena paccayo hotīti veditabbo.
